column3: Nãgá kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌinia iru bapari. Jesucristo piuji tachi pari. Mãga ooji tachi audú kꞌaripa kꞌinia bada perã. Mãgá tachia pida tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadaipia bɨ, piuruta pɨjida ma kꞌaurepa.

Pascua fiesta ewate pai naaweda, Jesupa kꞌawa baji ewari awara bɨda ichi na pꞌekꞌau eujãdeepa uchiaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichi Akꞌõremaa wãitꞌee; mãgɨ́ ewari paru. Ichia chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ kꞌinia iru bapachi. Mãgá ãchi kꞌinia iru bapachi ichi piurumaa.
Maperãpɨ piukꞌoodachida ma eujã pania wẽe bɨde, wãdai naaweda ma eujãdee Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌanapiitꞌee padamãi. Cuarenta años ãchia oo kꞌiniata oo pꞌanɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupijida.
Warrarã chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanapatakꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ. Ijãadai naaweda pꞌanapatapꞌedaakꞌa pꞌananáatɨ. Maapai Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, ne–inaa kꞌachia pariatua oopachida; pãchia oo kꞌiniata.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã ichiakꞌau bɨji ãchia oo kꞌiniata oodamerã. Mãga ooji akꞌɨpiitꞌee ichia chupɨria kꞌawaapari pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã, judiorã, judio–eerã paara.

Mãpai nãgɨ́ pedee uchiaji ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmari tꞌãideepa: —Jarra óoji trigo kilo apai tꞌerabaidamerã ewari aba mimiada pari; maa–e pɨrã cebada kilo õpeepai tꞌerabaidamerã ewari aba mimiada pari. Mamĩda olivo mãikꞌaapa uva tꞌõbaináaji, aceite paraamerã mãikꞌaapa vino paraamerã.
Mãga ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa akꞌɨpidai wãara oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ irua jara bɨkꞌa. Ma awara mãgá oodakꞌãri, irua parã pia akꞌɨi.

Ichia mãga jara bɨ na ewari na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopata jõmaweda akꞌɨitꞌee perã, kꞌawaaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mãga ooitꞌee ichia pëida Jesucristopa. Cristopa eperãarãpa oopata mãgá akꞌɨi, ichia kꞌachia ookꞌaa pada perã na eujãde nipakꞌãri. Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨda aji, Akꞌõrepa iru jɨrɨtꞌeraji, iru piupꞌeda, chokꞌai pꞌirabaipida perã.
Soldaorãpa poro jɨ̃ra pakꞌuru jua ne–ɨɨrɨ–idaa bɨdee oodapꞌeda, Jesús porode jɨ̃ bɨjida mãikꞌaapa pꞌaru pꞌoree teesoo, kꞌĩra pꞌãimapꞌãimaa bɨ, jɨ̃ bɨjida.

Maperã mɨa kꞌinia bɨ mãgee pꞌẽtrãarã makꞌɨara chõtrãa–ee pꞌanɨɨrã, waya miakꞌãidamerã mãikꞌaapa warra tꞌodamerã. Mãgá mimiadaitꞌee ãchi temãi, ãchideerã akꞌɨmaa pꞌanɨ misa. Mãga oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã, tachi ijãapataarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa pꞌoyaa kꞌachia pedeeda–e pai tachi ãpɨte ma pꞌẽtrãarã kꞌaurepa.
Ijã́atɨ mɨa jarakꞌãri mɨ, Akꞌõre Waibɨa ome araa bapari. Maa–e pɨrã ijã́atɨ mɨa ne–inaa ooda kꞌaurepapai, oopari perã ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.

Mãpai angeleerãpa kꞌachia beerã jõmaweda mãikꞌaapa piudapꞌedaarã pꞌanapatamãi batꞌatꞌaajida ma lagokꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau jẽrajẽraa jira bɨdee. Maadamãiipa apida piuda–e paji. Mãgɨ́ lagokꞌa eperãarã piuda tꞌẽepema apata.

Mãga–e pada paara, Cristo piuda chokꞌara piukꞌaji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujã ooru weda. Mamĩda Cristo cheda aba cheji mãikꞌaapa kurusode piuda aba piuji na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõrumaa, tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiitꞌee.
Ma awara ãchi akꞌɨpachi cuarenta años eujã pania wẽe bɨde wãyaadakꞌãri.
Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, cheepurudakꞌãri pan kꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa vino todaitꞌee Cristo piuda kꞌirãpadaitꞌee, nɨpatáatɨ jõmaweda cherutamaa, chikꞌinia ne–inaa jedekꞌodaitꞌee.

Mãpai ma Oveja Chakꞌepa joisomaa eerepema tauchaada ogatꞌaakꞌãri, unuji na pꞌekꞌau eujã golpe wëre nɨ̃bɨ awẽrachaipa. Akꞌõrejĩru kꞌĩi pɨkꞌadachi. Pꞌãi–maa baji pꞌaru cabra kꞌaradee oodakꞌa; mãgee pꞌaru jɨ̃pata chi–ɨadakꞌãri. Ma awara atane pꞌoreedachi tachi waakꞌa.

Ichiaba wẽraarã ũkꞌuruurãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, unujida ãchia kꞌinia iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa piudapꞌedaarã chokꞌai pꞌirabairuta. Jõdee, ijãa pꞌanajida mĩda, ũkꞌuru piu kꞌachia piujida. Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa mãgɨɨrã jita atadakꞌãri, mãgapachida: “Pëida–eda apachida, Cristode ijãa amaarutamaa”. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e paji. Maperã piujida. Ãchia kꞌawajida piudapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi waya chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee iru ome pꞌanapataadamerã, waa piuda–ee.

Mamĩda Pablopa mãgaji Romadepema poroorãpa pëidapꞌedaarãmaa: —Tai aukꞌa Romadepemaarã pꞌanɨta, wɨjidada aji, jõmaarã kꞌĩrapite, charramaa ateeda–ee. Maapꞌeda carcelde tꞌɨpijida. Ɨ̃rá jõdee, ¿merã uchiapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã? ¡Mãga–epɨ! Namãikꞌaapa wãda–eda aji, ãchia uchia pëi cheda–emãi ãchi kꞌĩradoopa.

‘Miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌãináatɨ awaraarã ome; eperã peenáatɨ; chĩara netꞌaa chɨanáatɨ; chĩara te, wẽra, mimiapataarã, ne–animal wa netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃anáatɨ.’ (Éxodo 20.13-17) Ũraa awaraa ichiaba paraa akꞌɨpiitꞌee sãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ chĩara ome. Mamĩda ma jõmaweda uchiapata ũraa abaade: ‘Awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatáatɨ, pãchi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatakꞌa.’ (Levítico 19.18) Mãga ooruta pɨrã, oodaitꞌee jõma Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Tachi jõmaweda mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨɨrã nɨmaa pꞌanɨ iru cherumaa. Mapa mãgá nɨ pꞌanɨ misa, ne–inaa kꞌachia jõmaweda oo amaadaipia bɨ, irukꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã iru pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bapari.
Mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawa bairã. Tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia bapari made jara bɨkꞌa.
O–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ parã Tachi Waibɨadeerã perã. Waya aukꞌa jaraitꞌee; o–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ.
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, pꞌɨrrabaiji akꞌɨitꞌee kꞌaipata mɨmaa mãga jara bɨ. Unuji lámpara bɨpata siete, awara–awaraa bainɨ̃ bɨ. Mãgɨ́ chaachaa nẽedee ooda paji.
Mapa irua nãga jaraji: ‘Ɨ̃rá parã wãda–eda aji, mɨa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌeeda ada eujãdee.’ (Números 14.22, 30, 35)
Jõmaarãpa mɨ naa jara chedapꞌedaa ãchita Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida, nechɨayaa beerãkꞌa pꞌanajidada aji. Mapa mɨchi ovejaarã, pia jaraitꞌeera, mɨchideerãpa mãɨrã pedee ijãada–e paji.
Teeda mimiapataarã, pãchi poro waibɨarã waaweepatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa oopatáatɨ ãrapa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ ãra tꞌãri pia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, maa–e pɨrã tꞌãri kꞌachia pꞌanɨ pɨjida.
Mãpai ma pꞌaadapꞌedaarã aneejida seewa jaradamerã. Mãɨrãpa mãgajida: —Nãgɨ́ eperãpa ikꞌachia pedeeparida ajida, Tachi Akꞌõre te ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa Moisepa pꞌãda ãpɨte.

Mãgá nipai Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopipari perã. Tachi aukꞌa pꞌanapachida ma eperãkꞌa. Cristode ijãadai naaweda, taipa Tachi Akꞌõre pia kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanapachida. Ichiaba maapai Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pia–ee akꞌɨpachi. Mamĩda ijãadakꞌãri, Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨji tachi tꞌãri ome. Maperãpɨ tai jɨrɨtꞌeraji jõmaarãmaa jarateenadamerã. Mãgá taipa jarateepata ũrirutaarãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨpari ãchi tꞌãri ome ichiaba.

Piara kꞌawaadamerã sãga choodaipia bɨ nepɨrade jõnɨde, mɨa kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã chonaarãweda pꞌanapatapꞌedaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra pëiji jarade irua oopi kꞌinia bada eperãarãmaa. Mamĩda ma eperãarãpa ãra miapijida, ãrapa jaradapꞌedaa ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mãgá iru pꞌanajida mĩda, choopachida.
Mamĩda aɨ naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichimaa chupɨria iidirutaarã kꞌaripa ataitꞌeeda aji, atuanaadamerã.’ (Joel 2.28-32)

Mãgapachida: —¡Amén! apachida. Jõmaarãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa mãikꞌaapa jaradaipia bɨ: “Pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bapari; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapari; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara tꞌãri piara; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara juataura; jõmaweda pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Mãga ichita jaradaitꞌee, jõ–ee. ¡Amén!”
Parã wẽraarã Cristode ijãapataarãpa jɨrɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ kꞌĩra wãree pꞌanadaitꞌee ɨ̃rɨpai, pãchi poro pi–ia bida pꞌanɨpa maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa nẽedee ooda jɨ̃ pꞌanɨpa maa–e pɨrã pꞌaru pi–ia jɨ̃ pꞌanɨpa.

Maperã kꞌĩra nejasianáaji jarateeitꞌee Tachi Waibɨapa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ichiaba kꞌĩra nejasianáaji mɨ pɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo perã, mɨ carcelde nɨ̃bɨ mĩda Cristo kꞌaurepa. Ma kꞌãyaara, chóoji Cristode ijãa bɨde, awaraarãpa pɨ ichiaba miapiruta pɨjida ma ijãa bɨ kꞌaurepa. ¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ kꞌaripaitꞌeepɨ!
Ãra kꞌaurepa mɨa ne–inaa jõma oopari pɨa oopi bɨkꞌa, mɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa piuru pɨjida mãga oo kꞌiniapa. Mɨa mãga oopari ãrapa pida aukꞌa wãara ne–inaa jõma pɨa oopi bɨkꞌa oopataadamerã.
¡Mapa ũrítɨ! Parãpa mɨde ijãapata jõi naaweda, jɨrɨpatáatɨ oodaitꞌee mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mɨa unu bɨ parãpa ne–inaa oopata pia–e bɨ Mɨchi Waibɨa kꞌĩrapite.
Mãpai ma omé eerepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji to bee ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa pania poatrɨ uchiapata ɨ̃rɨ. Ma pania jõmaweda tachi waa padachi.
Irude ijãapata kꞌaurepata Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripapari. Maperã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua ichi kꞌĩra wãree unupiitꞌee tachimaa.

Parãpa kꞌawaadaipia bɨ chi nãgee kꞌachia oopataarã Cristodeerã–e: pariatua pꞌekꞌau oo wãpata awaraarã ome; kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe awaraarã jɨrɨpata kꞌachia oodaitꞌee ãchi ome; awaraarã wẽra wa netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃apata. Mãgeerã ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Ne–inaa awaraa kꞌiniara iru pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌãyaara. Mapa wãda–e paitꞌee iru truadee.
Abrahampa ijãa bada perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarakꞌãri wãmerã ichia teeitꞌee pada eujãdee, Abraham uchiaji ichi eujãdeepa. Mamĩda kꞌawa–e paji sãmaa wãru.
Itꞌuapa piu nipanáatɨ, jãgɨpa eperãarã kꞌachiade baaipipari perã. Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ome o–ĩa nipapatáatɨ oodaitꞌee irua parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Chokꞌaraarãpa ma seewa ijãadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pariatua pꞌekꞌau oo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee mãɨrã jĩakꞌa. Ma kꞌaurepa jõmaarãpa pedee kꞌachia jaradaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre o wãara bɨde.
Ɨ̃rá irude ijãapata perã, tachi jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌaitꞌa pꞌanapataadai iru Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa pari.

Jõdee mãga oopi kꞌiniada–e judio–eerãmaa, ichiaba Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Jĩpꞌa taipa ãramaa pꞌã pëi pꞌanɨ: kꞌonaadamerã nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa eperãpa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata; kꞌonaadamerã ne–inaa waa maa–e pɨrã ne–animal ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃a piuda chiara mãikꞌaapa pariatua pꞌekꞌau oonaadamerã.
Pedropa mãgaji: —Ananías, ¿pɨ seewa cherukꞌã aji, Akꞌõre Jauremaa, pꞌaratꞌa jõma tee che–ee? ¿Sãapꞌeda oojima Satanapa oopi bɨkꞌa?

Mãgá pꞌanapataadakꞌãri, waa pꞌanada–e paitꞌee warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara ikꞌawaa beerãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa awara jaratee chedakꞌãri, tachia ijãadakꞌaa paitꞌee ãchia jaratee pꞌanɨ. Pia kꞌawaa pꞌanadaitꞌee ãchia jaratee nipapata wãara–e. Mapa kꞌũrapida–e paitꞌee ma kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru beerãmaa.

¿Parãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã kꞌachia oopataarã wãda–e paitꞌee Akꞌõre eujãdee ichideerã ome? Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa pꞌanadai, nãgeerã wãdakꞌaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre eujãdee: prostitutaarã; ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apatamaa; miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarã ome kꞌãipataarã; ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã ome kꞌãipataarã, ɨmɨkꞌĩra wẽra ome kꞌãi bɨkꞌa;

Pꞌananaadáma awaraarãkꞌa, chi cheda–e pꞌanɨɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũride. Ma kꞌãyaara chipꞌedaidapꞌeda, chikꞌaripa pꞌanadáma pipɨara ijãadaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate paru misa. Ma ewate Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨitꞌee eperãarãpa pia mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa.

Parã mãgá ichita chokꞌai pꞌanadairã Cristo chokꞌai bɨkꞌa, oo amáatɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo parãpa oopatapꞌedaa irude ijãadai naaweda. Pꞌekꞌau oonáatɨ awaraarã ome. Awaraarã jɨrɨnáatɨ ãra ome kꞌachia oodaitꞌee. Kꞌĩsianáatɨ ne–inaa pãchia kꞌachia oo kꞌiniata oodaitꞌee. Pãchia netꞌaa iru pꞌanɨ omepai kꞌãiwee pꞌanapatáatɨ, waapɨara ata kꞌinia pꞌanada–ee. Chi netꞌaa kꞌiniayaa bɨpa netꞌaa kꞌiniara iru bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bai kꞌãyaara.

Mamĩda tachi ijãapataarã mãgá pariatua pꞌanadakꞌaa, Akꞌõre ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanadairã. Mapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ. Waapɨara Tachi Waibɨade ijãadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa audupɨara chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Cristopa tachi ata chekꞌãri, ichi ome pꞌananadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre truade.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ba chepi–e paji tachi ijãapataarãmaa waawee–idaa pꞌanadamerã. Ma kꞌãyaara ichi Jaure pëiji mãgɨ́ juapa tachia choodamerã irude ijãa pꞌanɨde; awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaadamerã ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo amaadaitꞌee.
Awaraa eperãpa jarai ichia Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌawa bɨ. Mamĩda mãgɨpa oo–e bɨ pɨrã Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, seewamaa bɨ. Kꞌawa–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida.

mãgara mɨ audupɨara o–ĩapítɨ nãga oo pꞌanɨpa. Tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ oodaitꞌee Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mãgá pꞌanadai Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã kꞌaripapari perã.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, Jesús jita atadaitꞌee paji. Mamĩda pꞌoyaada–e paji, atꞌãri iru ewarimaa pa–e bada perã.
Maperã jaráji ãramaa tꞌãri pia teedamerã awaraarãmaa mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa ne–inaa pia oodamerã awaraarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Pꞌanaujida: —Na eperã tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa–e bada paara, pɨmaa aneeda–e pakꞌajida ajida.

Ma ewari aba ɨaparipa apema kꞌãyaara, mãga oopari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Ichiaba ma chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoparipa mãga oopari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, gracias jarapari perã Akꞌõremaa ma chikꞌo kꞌokꞌãri. Jõdee ma nechiara kꞌokꞌaa bɨpa aukꞌa mãga oopari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, ichiaba gracias jarapari perã Akꞌõremaa nekꞌokꞌãri.
O–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ nɨ pꞌanɨ misa Tachi Akꞌõre eujãdee wãdaitꞌee. Choodaipia bɨ nepɨrade baaidakꞌãri. Ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa.
Mãpai Felixpa soldaorã poromaa jaraji Pablo jɨ̃a paraa bɨdamerã, mamĩda ichiakꞌau akꞌɨ chepipataadamerã chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorãmaa.
Ma awara chĩarapa tachi miapidakꞌãri, choopata ijãapata perã Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ijãapata kꞌachia pꞌoyaadai. Tꞌãride ichita choopata awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadairã.

Taipa aukꞌa jaradai Tachi Akꞌõre chonaarãwedapema ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa: ‘Ijãaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripai. Maperã irumaa jaraji mɨchi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia bada.’ (Salmos 116.10) Taipa ichiaba mãga ijãapata. Maperãpɨ jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa.

Ichiaba ɨ̃pemaarã, taipa parã ũraadaitꞌee jaradamerã chi mimia kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanɨɨrãmaa mimiadamerã. Kꞌaripátɨ chi pia chooda–ee pꞌanɨɨrã nepɨra kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba kꞌaripátɨ chi Cristode ijãadai naaweda ne–inaa kꞌachia oodapꞌedaarã, mãɨrãpa ɨ̃rá oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãɨmisa tꞌãri pia pꞌanapatáatɨ jõmaarã ome.

Mãpai ma kꞌĩmari eerepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji mãgɨ́ nemĩsia su–akꞌɨ beepari ɨ̃rɨ. Mãpai ma nemĩsia trua, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõmaweda pꞌãriude beeji. Eperãarã aɨde pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ãchi kꞌĩrame kꞌaakꞌoopachida, pꞌua chooda–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.

Mapa mɨa parãmaa ũraapari ijãapataadamerã Cristodepai. Mɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari Tachi Akꞌõremaa irua parã chupɨria kꞌawaamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapimerã jõmaweda nãgɨ́ ũraa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã, wãara ichideerã perã.

Mãgɨpa o–ĩ–ĩa jarateepachi Juan Bautistapa jarateedakꞌa, eperãarãpa ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa poro choopidamerã akꞌɨpidaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanɨ. Ichiaba jarateepachi Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida.
Tachia ne–inaa kꞌodakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã todakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa awaraa oodakꞌãri, jõmaweda oodaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, jõmaarãpa iru waaweedamerã.

Mamĩda parãpa ũrida–e paitꞌee mãgeerãpa jarateepata, Cristopa ichi Jaure pëida perã parã ome bapariimerã. Ma Jaurepa parãmaa ne–inaa wãara jõmaweda jarateepari. Seewa jarateekꞌaa. Mapa irua jaratee bɨkꞌa oo wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ. Mãgá wãara tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Cristo ome.
Mãpai ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, parãpa kꞌawaadai Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨda aparipa ookꞌaa pɨrã irua jara bɨkꞌa ichi ũraade, wãara ijãa–e bɨ. Iru tachi piuda kꞌapꞌɨ́akꞌata bɨ.
Mãga jarapꞌeda, Pablopa pan ichi juade atapꞌeda, jõmaarã taide Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji mãikꞌaapa ma pan tꞌookꞌoopꞌeda, kꞌoji.

Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëidáma jaradaitꞌee kꞌonaadamerã nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata; wẽra apai ome pꞌanadamerã; ne–animal ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃a piuda chiara kꞌonaadamerã, aɨde waa paraa perã mãikꞌaapa ne–animal waa kꞌonaadamerã.

Mamĩda Pablopa mãgaji: —¡Tachi Akꞌõrépata pɨ kꞌachia ooyada aji, tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa bairã! Pɨ jãma su–akꞌɨ bɨ mɨa ooda akꞌɨitꞌee Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda irua pꞌãdakꞌa oo–e bɨ. Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ chupɨria kꞌawaamerã. Mamĩda pɨa mɨ chupɨria kꞌawa–e bɨ. ¡Ma kꞌãyaara mɨ itꞌai wɨpiru!
Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo ome araa pꞌanɨɨrã atuapi–e paitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi jɨrɨtꞌera–e paji tachi kꞌachia ooitꞌee ma ewate. Jĩpꞌa jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichi truade ichita pꞌananadamerã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo kꞌaurepa.

Mãpai ichi uchiaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõmaade, jõmaarã eujãdepemaarã kꞌũrade. Kꞌũraitꞌee Gog mãikꞌaapa Magog, ãchi soldaorã chipꞌedaidamerã jura chõodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõredeerã ome. Ãchi soldaorã audú chokꞌara pꞌanadaitꞌee, ipu tau nãusaa audú chokꞌara paraaparikꞌa pꞌusa ide.

Ijãadai naaweda, parã ũkꞌuru mãgá pꞌanapachida. Mamĩda Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri, iru piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapiji parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa. Ichiaba parã awara bɨji ichi–itꞌee, ichi Jaure pëikꞌãri parã ome bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa oopimerã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooji parã ichi kꞌĩrapite pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã.

Ma kꞌaurepata mɨ mia nɨ̃bɨ nama carcelde. Mamĩda mɨ kꞌĩra nejasia–e, kꞌawa bairã kꞌaideta ijãa bɨ. Mãgɨ́ Jesucristo. Irua ne–inaa jõmaweda oopari. Mapa mɨa kꞌawa bɨ irua jarateepida mɨmaa jɨ̃aitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate paru misa.

Oodaitꞌee ma jõma etꞌewa jarada, ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ɨtꞌaa iidipatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌaripamerã ne–inaa jõmaade. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃da–ee pꞌanapataadai. Ma kꞌãyaara jõmaarã ijãapataarã pari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ.

Mɨ, Pablo Silvano ome mãikꞌaapa Timoteopa paara na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiruta parã Cristode ijãapataarãmaa, Tesalónica pꞌuurude pꞌanɨ. Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ parã Tachi Akꞌõredeerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristodeerã, wãara ijãapata perã. Mapa ɨtꞌaa iidi pꞌanɨ ãrapa parã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tꞌãri pia pꞌanapatáatɨ jõmaarã ome. Mãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ, iru taarã–e perã cheitꞌee.
Mãga jarada perã Jesucristopa, tachia ma pan kꞌodakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ma vino todakꞌãri, kꞌirãpapata Cristo piuda tachi pari. Mãgá oo pꞌanadaitꞌee, iru waya cheru misa.

Mamĩda ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri, wãara ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨpai. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee ãrapa iidi pꞌanɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌayaa wẽpaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌayaa baji pɨrã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpaitꞌee.

Mɨchi chonaarã judiorãpa oopatapꞌedaakꞌa, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa mɨa oo bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa ichita pɨ kꞌirãpapari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃kꞌãri; ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida mãikꞌaapa ichita gracias jarapari Tachi Akꞌõremaa pɨ pari.
Mama pꞌanɨde biajida eemaa mãikꞌaapa mãu–idaa bɨmaa: —¡Tai ɨ̃rɨ baai chétɨ, rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨpa mãikꞌaapa Oveja Chakꞌepa tai ununaadamerã, tai jɨrɨpata perã miapidaitꞌee!

Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi chipꞌepata chaa. Kꞌachia pꞌoyaapataarãmaa mɨa kꞌopiitꞌee ɨtꞌaripema chikꞌo mera iru bɨ maná apata. Ma awara parã chaachaa mɨa teeitꞌee mãu tꞌorroo; tꞌɨ̃ chiwidi aɨde pꞌãda ome. Ma mãu jitarupapai parãpa kꞌawaaitꞌee ichi tꞌɨ̃ aɨde pꞌã bɨ.

Ma awara mãɨrãpa pꞌaratꞌa audú ata kꞌinia pꞌanadairã, parã kꞌũradaitꞌee seewa jaratee pꞌanɨpa. Taarã weda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ mãgeerã atuapiitꞌee. Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru sẽkꞌaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌãikꞌaa. Irua wãara ãchi jõpiitꞌee.
Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ eperã chepiitꞌee ãchi kꞌũramerã ne–inaa oo bɨpa Satanás kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida ijãadai kꞌãyaara, seewa ijãa pꞌaneedaitꞌee.
Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade nãga jara bɨkꞌa: ‘Parã kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa kꞌachia pedeepata iru ãpɨte.’ (Isaías 52.5)

Mãgee jarateepataarãpa kꞌĩsiapata chonaarãwedapema petau tau kꞌawaa beerã, Janes, Jambrés ome kꞌĩsiadapꞌedaakꞌa. Moisepa oo bakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa Egiptode, mãɨrãpa irua jarada ũridaamaa pꞌanajida. Mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ mãgee ɨ̃rapema jarateepataarã. Ãchia ũridaamaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida jarateepataarã pedee. Jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee pꞌanɨ, wãara kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida, mãga jaratee pꞌanɨda a pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Mɨa ɨtrɨapari mãikꞌaapa miapipari mɨa kꞌinia iru bɨɨrã jõmaweda. Maperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ijãapatáatɨ. Pãchi audua pedee pedee amáatɨ mãikꞌaapa óotɨ mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Tachi Cristode ijãapataarã mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapata perã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata, kꞌawaa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi atuapi–e paitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara tachi pia akꞌɨpari Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo kꞌaurepa.

Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa óoji Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa jaratéeji irua jarapi bɨkꞌa. Chóoji mãga oo bɨde kꞌawa bairã mãga oo bɨpa, pɨ Akꞌõre truadee wãitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨa jaratee bɨ ũrirutaarã aukꞌa wãdaitꞌee, pɨ kꞌaurepa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri.

Ichiaba atꞌapai mɨa ijãapataarã miapipachi Cristode ijãa amaadamerã. Mãga oopachi Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata te chaa, ãra unuamaa pꞌe iru bada perã. Pꞌuuru tꞌɨmɨ́ beemaa, judio–eerã tꞌãide paara, ãra jɨrɨ nipapachi.

Jõmaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarãpa oodakꞌãri ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa, nãga pꞌanapata: miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarã ome kꞌãipata; kꞌĩsiapata chĩara ome kꞌachia oodaitꞌee; awaraarã jɨrɨpata ãchi ome kꞌachia oodaitꞌee;

Ne–uuparipa mãikꞌaapa ne–uu akꞌɨparipa ma ne–uuda pꞌoyaa waripidakꞌaa. Maperã ma ne–uuda waripipari ãra kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre waibɨara bɨ tai jarateepataarã kꞌãyaara, irua aupaita eperãarãmaa ijãapipari perã.
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma jõma ooda perã parã–itꞌee, parãpa oodai ne–inaa jõmaweda iru Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa ichideerãmaa, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo cheitꞌee ewari nɨ pꞌanɨ misa.
Mãpai ɨtꞌariipa ũriji ne–inaa to kꞌida chaaree jĩwaaparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã pa golpe jĩwaaparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã arpa chaapataarã chokꞌaraarãpa ãchi arpa chaa pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Jõmaweda Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa irua ooitꞌee bada kꞌawa pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌaurepa wẽpapipariitꞌee irude ijãarutaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata.
Ichi truadee wãpiitꞌee nãgee eperãarã: ne–inaa pia oopataarã, kꞌinia pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨmerã, mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanapataarã iru ome iru trua kꞌĩra wãreede.

Mɨ, Juanpa nãga pꞌã pëiru parã Ásia eujãdepema ijãapataarãmaa, siete chipꞌepataarã chaachaa. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre ichita bapari; ichita bapachi mãikꞌaapa ichita cheitꞌee. Mɨa ichiaba iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã kꞌaripamerã. Iru jaure siete pɨkꞌa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite.
Mãpai Pablopa mãgaji: —Juanpa wãara poro choojida aji, waa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarã. Mamĩda Juanpa ichiaba jarapachi ijãadamerã ichi tꞌẽe cheru eperãde. Mãgɨ́ eperã Jesucristo.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa Lot uchiapiji ma kꞌachia beerã tꞌãideepa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ sãga kꞌaripaitꞌee ichide ijãapataarã, ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã mãikꞌaapa irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oodamerã. Jõdee ichia kꞌawa bɨ sãga jɨ̃a pɨkꞌa bɨitꞌee kꞌachia oopataarã ãchi miapirumaa mãikꞌaapa atuapirumaa ichi ewari waibɨa ewate.

Mamĩda wã kꞌinia pꞌanajida pꞌanapataade ɨtꞌaripema eujãde, mãgɨ́ na pꞌekꞌau eujã kꞌãyaara pipɨara bairã. Mãga kꞌĩsia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra nejasia–e ãchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa paitꞌee. Irua ãra–itꞌee pꞌuuru oo iru bɨ ichi truade.

Mamĩda tꞌĩunáaji ma chonaarãweda nepɨrɨdapꞌedaa jarateepataarã ome. Jãgɨɨrãpa jarateeda–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa. Jarateepata chõtrãarãpa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata cuentokꞌa. Ãchi ome aupedeei kꞌãyaara, jɨrɨ́ji pipɨara kꞌawaaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida mãikꞌaapa óoji irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mãgɨɨrã jĩchoojida na eujãde mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõredeerã wapꞌɨrajida; ichia pꞌuuru kꞌinia iru bɨ tꞌɨakꞌauda edajãde pꞌanadapꞌedaarã mãikꞌaapa taawa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã paara. Mamĩda mãga bɨ misa, ɨtꞌariipa tꞌɨpɨtau baai cheji ãchi ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌiniidachida.
Mãpai Pedropa jaraji Jesucristo tꞌɨ̃de poro choopidamerã. Maapꞌeda Corneliopa chupɨria iidiji Pedromaa ãchi ome taarã beemerã.
Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ parã́pata Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa jarateedai Moisepa pꞌãda kꞌawa–ee beerãmaa, ãchia Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã.
Cristopa mãga jara baji, jarakꞌãri ichita pꞌanapataadai Tachi Akꞌõre ome.

Mamĩda chi wãara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãgá nipakꞌaapɨ. Ne–inaa awaraa kꞌãyaara jõma oopari oo kꞌinia bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Nepɨra jɨrɨkꞌaa chĩara ome; jĩpꞌa kꞌãiwee bapari. Chĩara kꞌĩrau chokꞌakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa pia ũripari ne–inaa iidide chedakꞌãri. Kꞌĩrau–ee oopari ichi poropa oopi bɨkꞌa. Awaraarã chupɨria kꞌawaapari mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripapari. Eperã aba pipɨara akꞌɨkꞌaa apemaarã kꞌãyaara. Oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa; seewata ne–inaa ookꞌaa. Mãgeepa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopari chĩara kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Warra kꞌinia iru bapari. Ne–inaa jõmaweda iru jua ekꞌari bɨji irua akꞌɨmerã.

Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ Cristo waide che–e bairã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa oo–e paitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa. Mamĩda mãga–e. Iru choo nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa parã chupɨria kꞌawaa nɨ̃bɨ, kꞌinia–e bairã apida atuadamerã. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌinia bɨ jõmaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa, iru ewari waibɨa ewate pai naaweda.
Mɨ–itꞌee pipɨara bakꞌaji jõmaweda mɨkꞌa pꞌanadamerã. Mamĩda kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripai ijãapari chaa kꞌawaamerã miakꞌãipia bɨ wa mãga–e.
Mãga pipɨara bairã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, parãpa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Mãga oo pꞌanɨ misa, iididaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parãmaa jarapimerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa.

Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesucristo tachi jõmaarã waibɨa nãga perã. Ewaa weda jõma pꞌãriu nɨ̃bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji ɨ̃daamerã. Mãpai ɨ̃daa beeji. Mãga pɨkꞌa ijãadai naaweda, tai pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanapachida, kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa mãga kꞌawapikꞌãri, tai tꞌãride ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌapiji. Mapa Cristode ijãa pꞌaneejida mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaa pꞌaneejida Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree.
Maapai judío tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Apolo pacheji. Mãgɨ́ Alejandría pꞌuurudepema paji. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Egipto eujãde bɨ. Mãgɨ́ judiopa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda pia kꞌawa baji. Ma awara pia jarateepachi.

Jõdee Jesús pꞌuurudeepa taawaa ateejida mãikꞌaapa mama miapijida piurumaa. Mãgá piuda perã eperãarã pari, ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa wẽpapiji ichi waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa. Mãga ooji ãchi pꞌekꞌau wẽe pꞌaneedamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Mãpai Tito, mãgee ũraa mɨa jarada pia jaratéeji Creta isladepema ijãapataarãmaa. Tꞌãri pia ũráaji, jõmaweda pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oodamerã. Ũri kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanɨ pɨrã, kꞌawapíji ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji ãra akꞌɨpariimerã. Maperã mãgá pedeeipia bɨ. Pɨ yiaraa iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Nãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa unupiji tachi audú kꞌinia iru bapari. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee pëiji ichi Warra apai iru bada, mãgɨ́ kꞌaurepa tachi ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome.

ʼAkꞌõre, pɨa ãra jɨrɨtꞌeraji mɨde ijãapataadamerã. Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ ãra pꞌananadamerã mɨ ome, mɨ wãrumaa. Mãgá jõma mɨ kꞌĩra wãree unudaitꞌee, pɨa mɨmaa teeda mɨ kꞌinia iru bapachi perã na pꞌekꞌau eujã bai naaweda.
Mãɨrã wãrutamaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo wãpata awaraarãmaa mãikꞌaapa awaraarã tꞌãri pꞌuapipata.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa waya kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa: Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús awara bɨji waibɨa pamerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pariimerã tachi pari. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõre Warra Jesús tachi ijãapataarã Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa. Ɨtꞌari bapari ichi Akꞌõre ome. Mama ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bairã tachi pari, tꞌãripa irude ijãadáma.

Mãga unujida Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa akꞌɨpikꞌãri irua Cristo pia akꞌɨpari. Mãga ooji iru kꞌĩra wãree eujãdeepa pedeekꞌãri: ‘Nãgɨta mɨ Warra kꞌinia, mɨa jɨrɨtꞌerada. Irua mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapipari.’ (Mateo 17.5; Marcos 9.7; Lucas 9.35)
Mãgá oopari Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa. Irua aupaita kꞌawapipari Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ ichide ijãapataarãmaa.

Ma õpee eerepema angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, akꞌõrejĩru, atane, lucero ãridachida. Perá akꞌõrejĩru kꞌĩra esajĩakꞌa kꞌĩidachi. Perá atane kꞌĩra esajĩakꞌa aukꞌa kꞌĩidachi. Ichiaba perá lucero esa–aukꞌa kꞌĩidachida. Mapa ãstaawa hora õpeedepema chaa aba akꞌõrejĩru jẽra–e paji. Ichiaba pꞌãrikꞌua hora õpeedepema chaa aba atane lucero ome ɨ̃daada–e paji.
Mãpai arii akꞌɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tedepema poro Sóstenes jita atadapꞌeda, wɨjida Galión kꞌĩrapite. Mamĩda iru–itꞌee maarepida pꞌua–e paji.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, waya iru jita atadaitꞌee paji. Mamĩda Jesús mirudachi.
Maperãpɨ tai chupɨria jõneedakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia pꞌua jõnadakꞌaa. Tai kꞌapꞌɨa jõdaruta pɨjida, ewari chaa tꞌãride audupɨara Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapata.
Mãɨmisa Mariapa aneeji kꞌera ɨ̃pɨa nardodee ooda. Litro kꞌaudaa baji. Ma kꞌera Jesús bɨɨrɨ ɨ̃rɨ weetꞌaaji mãikꞌaapa ichi pudapa pꞌootꞌaaji. Te jã tꞌũa jo nɨ̃beeji kꞌerapa.

Abrahampa ijãa bada perã, banaji ma eujã jaradade. Bapachi te ne–edee oodade awaraa eujãdepemaarãpa oopatapꞌedaakꞌa. Ichiaba mãgá pꞌanapachida Isaac mãikꞌaapa Jacob, ijãadapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada; ma eujã teeitꞌee ãchi ëreerãmaa.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, ne–inaa jõma oopatáatɨ mɨa ooparikꞌa. Pia akꞌɨ́tɨ ijãapataarã tai jĩakꞌa pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa aukꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ.
Chikꞌaripa pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mãgá jõmaweda choodaitꞌee nepɨrade baaidakꞌãri. Mãgá chikꞌaripa pꞌanadakꞌãri, oopata Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã Abraham ome, parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari eperã irude wãara ijãa bɨ mãikꞌaapa irua jara bɨkꞌa oo bɨ. Mamĩda mãgá akꞌɨ–epɨ eperã irude ijãa bɨda apari, mãgɨpa oo–e bɨ pɨrã irua jara bɨkꞌa.
Mãgara ¿kꞌãata jaradaima? ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia oo–e bɨkꞌã, aba pipɨara akꞌɨpari perã chi apema kꞌãyaara? ¡Mãga–e!
Cristode ijãapari aukꞌa parãkꞌa ijãa–e bɨ pɨrã, pia akꞌɨ́tɨ, awaraa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpatakꞌa. ¿Irua mãgá ijãa–e bɨpaa atꞌãri Akꞌõre Ũraa pia kꞌawa–e bairã? Mapa iru ome aupedeedaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Mãpai ɨtꞌari jura paraaji. Angeleerã poro waibɨa Miguel awaraa angeleerã ome chõo jɨrɨjida mãgɨ́ je choma bɨ ome. Mãpai jepa ichideerã pꞌe atapꞌeda, chõojida.
‘Kꞌĩraudaruta pɨrã, ne–inaa kꞌachia oonáatɨ.’ (Salmos 4.4) Kꞌĩrau pꞌananáatɨ akꞌõrejĩru baairumaa,

Awaraarãpa parãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, aukꞌa oonáatɨ. Parãmaa ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, aukꞌa jaranáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ãchimaa pia pedéetɨ mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa iidítɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌaripamerã. Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨji, parã jida kꞌaripa kꞌinia bada perã.
Mɨ pëida na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee mɨ ome baparida aji. Mɨ ituaba atabëi–epɨ, irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oopari perã.

Mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee nãga oopatáatɨ: soldaorãpa ne–inaa kꞌɨrrɨde jɨ̃patakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida kꞌawáatɨ mãikꞌaapa ichita wãarata jarapatáatɨ. Soldaorãpa camisa hierrodee ooda jɨ̃patakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ichita oopatáatɨ, netuara eere pꞌanɨɨrãpa maarepida parãmaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã.

Pɨa unu bɨ ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa waide unupi–e pada apidaamaa: na lucero siete mɨ jua juaraare mãikꞌaapa jã lámpara bɨpata siete nẽedee ooda. Na lucero siete jara kꞌinia bɨ angeleerã siete bɨda ijãapataarã chipꞌepata siete aba–abaa akꞌɨdamerã. Jõdee jã lámpara bɨpata siete jara kꞌinia bɨ ma ijãapataarã chipꞌepatamãi siete.

Mamĩda Jesús jua ekꞌari bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús ekꞌariara bɨji ichi angeleerã kꞌãyaara, taarã–e nɨde eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa bapariimerã. Eperãarã kꞌinia iru bairã, Jesús piupiji jõmaarã pari. Mãgá chupɨria piuda perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru tachi rey waibɨa papiji mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra wãree papiji.

Mãga oodai, Tachi Akꞌõre parã ome bapari perã. Iruata parã kꞌaripaitꞌee oo kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá kꞌaripaitꞌee, tꞌãripa tachi ijãapataarã kꞌaripa kꞌinia bapari perã.
ʼMɨa mãga jaraji mɨkꞌa parã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã. Kꞌinia bɨ parã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã.

Mɨ, Pablopa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiru Timoteomaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bada perã, mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Jesucristopa pëimerã ichi ũraa jarateede. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarãpa Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Mapa tachia ijãapata mãikꞌaapa nɨpata irua jaradakꞌa oomerã.

Ichiaba kꞌinia bɨ ijãapataarã wẽraarãpa pꞌaru jɨ̃damerã wẽra pꞌaru jĩpꞌa jɨ̃pataarãpa jɨ̃patakꞌa. Kꞌĩra wãree pꞌanadaitꞌee makꞌɨara chi–oodaikꞌaraa bɨ jɨ̃daitꞌee netꞌaa nẽedee ooda, perladee ooda, pꞌaru ɨ̃pɨadee ooda maa–e pɨrã puda pi–ia bida pꞌanɨpa.
Mãga unukꞌãri, Jesupa soo oo ataji mãikꞌaapa ma jõmaweda taawaa jërekꞌooji ãchi pꞌakꞌa, oveja ome. Ma pꞌaratꞌa tau tꞌerabaipataarã mesa eujãde sĩa batꞌakꞌoopꞌeda, ãchi pꞌaratꞌa eujãde pꞌokꞌooji
Iruata tachi ooji Cristode ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa iruata tachi araa pꞌanapiji Cristo ome. Mãga ooji Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari ne–inaa pia oodamerã, irua naaweda kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, pꞌeranáatɨ awaraarãpa parã jɨrɨdakꞌãri miapidaitꞌee. Mãgá chupɨria pꞌanadakꞌãri, parãpa kꞌawaa atadai wãara Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ wa makꞌɨara ijãada–e pꞌanɨ. Kꞌĩsianáatɨ parã miadaikꞌaraa bɨ ichideerã perã.

O–ĩa pꞌanadáma mãikꞌaapa iru waaweedáma, Oveja Chakꞌe miakꞌãiitꞌee fiesta paru perã. Wẽra ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome miakꞌãiparikꞌa bapariitꞌee chi kꞌima ome, mãga pɨkꞌa Cristode ijãapataarã ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome. Ãchia miakꞌãipata pꞌaru jɨ̃ pꞌanɨ.

Soldaorãpa casco jɨ̃patakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa wãara ijãapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji. Ma awara soldaorãpa espada ateepatakꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jara pëida ichi Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa pari tꞌãride atéetɨ.
Mamĩda unukꞌãri Egiptodepemapa ichi aukꞌaa sĩmaa bɨ, Moisepa kꞌaripanaji mãikꞌaapa ma Egipto pida pee atapëiji.’ (Éxodo 2.11-12)
Ichiaba apemaarã ɨ̃pemaarãmaa ũraa pꞌanɨ ichita ne–inaa pia oopataadamerã, sẽda–ee.
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai apidaapa parã kꞌachiade baaipidai. Cristode ijãapatáatɨ mɨa jarateedakꞌa mãikꞌaapa oopatáatɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Pia choopatáatɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde.

Ma kꞌãyaara parãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida Canaandepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨa Molocmaa mãikꞌaapa Egiptodepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨa Refanmaa. Mɨa mãga kꞌawa bɨ ne–inaa pãchi juapa oodapꞌedaa atee pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã pãchi wãrutamaa. Mapa mɨa parã ãyaa jërekꞌooitꞌeeda aji, Babilónia pꞌuuru kꞌãyaara tꞌɨmɨara.’ (Amós 5.25-27)
Ɨ̃pemaarã, maperã chóotɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra atuanáatɨ taipa parãmaa jarateepatapꞌedaa, pedee jaradapa wa kꞌartꞌade pꞌãdapa.

Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨa ooitꞌee ichideerã–itꞌee, aɨde pꞌanapataadamerã iru truade. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua ichi Jaure pëida perã tachi chaachaa bapariimerã. Ichi Jaurepata kꞌawapipari ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.
Ijãapataarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũridaitꞌee, wẽraarãpa kꞌĩupꞌee ũridaipia bɨ, ãchi kꞌĩsia jarada–ee. Ãchi jarateepataarã ichita waawee pꞌanadaipia bɨ.
Eperãpa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari ɨmɨateeru pɨrã, ijãanáatɨ mãgɨpa jara bɨ. Jĩpꞌa ma pedee akꞌɨdaipia bɨ eperãarã omé wa õpee aukꞌa jararuta pɨrã.
Salude tee para bátɨ pãchi pitapai akꞌɨpidaitꞌee chikꞌinia pꞌanapata Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Nãpema ijãapataarãpa parãmaa aukꞌa salude pëiruta.

Jarajẽe bɨ misa, yooro pꞌora ɨtꞌaa batꞌadaitꞌee baaimerã ãchi poro ɨ̃rɨ. Mãgá akꞌɨpipata ãchi tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanɨ. Mãpai golpe pedeedaitꞌee: “¡Aai, pꞌuuru waibɨa! Pɨchia netꞌaa pꞌe wãda kꞌaurepa pꞌusade nidá barco chipariirã jõmaweda pꞌaratꞌara padachida. Ɨ̃rá, taarã–e weda, pɨchia iru bada jõmaweda jõdachida adaitꞌee.

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ! Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi audú kꞌinia iru bapari perã, jarapari tachi ichi warrarã. ¡Wãarapɨ! Mamĩda na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa mãga pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e, wãara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawadakꞌaa perã.

Chonaarãmaa ũraadakꞌa ichiaba parã tꞌãidepema kꞌũtrãarãmaa ũraaitꞌee. Oopatáatɨ chonaarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Parã ijãapataarã tꞌãidepema apida audua baikꞌaraa bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã: ‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripa–e audua pꞌanapataarã, mamĩda tꞌãri pia kꞌaripapari audua–ee beerã.’ (Proverbios 3.34)

¡Mãga–e! Akꞌõrepa seewa jarakꞌaa eperãarãkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Ichi ũraa pꞌãdade chonaarãwedapema Rey David itꞌaideepa jaraji: ‘Akꞌõre, mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata akꞌɨpꞌeda, pɨa wãarata jarapari “kꞌachia bɨda” akꞌãri. Pɨ ɨmɨateepataarã ichita pꞌoyaapariitꞌee, pɨa aupaita akꞌɨitꞌee perã eperãarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.’ (Salmos 51.4)
Ɨ̃rá nama che bɨ pꞌaareerã poroorãpa kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Maperã pëijidada aji, pɨde ijãapataarã jita pꞌe atade.

Mamĩda maapai Israel pidaarã, tachi chonaarã tꞌãide ichiaba seewa jarateepataarã paraaji. “Tai ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãda” apachida mĩda, mãga–e paji. Mãɨrã jĩakꞌa parã tꞌãide ichiaba seewa jarateepataarã paraaitꞌee. Mãɨrãpa ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa ijãapataarãmaa seewa imeraa jarateedaitꞌee. Meradaitꞌee Jesucristo tachi chipari, irua ãchi neto pɨkꞌa ataji mĩda ãchi pari piukꞌãri, atuanaadamerã. Ma meraruta kꞌaurepata, atu pꞌanɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi jõpiitꞌee.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ma judiorãpa audupɨara peetꞌaa kꞌinia pꞌanapachida, ɨ̃ipata ewate mimiapachi perã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre ome aukꞌa bɨda ada perã. Mãga jaraji Tachi Akꞌõre ichi Akꞌõreda akꞌãri.
Ɨ̃rá mɨa jara kꞌinia bɨ parãpa pia oo pꞌanɨ, kꞌirãpa pꞌanadairã mɨ sãga bapari parã ome bakꞌãri. Mɨ o–ĩa bɨ parã ome, atꞌãri oopata perã mɨa jarateedakꞌa.
Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús ome ooitꞌee bada jaraji Rey David itꞌaideepa: ‘Ichita mɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨa unupachida aji, mɨ kꞌĩrapite. Ichi mɨ ome bairã, maarepida mɨ waawee–e.

Mãga pꞌanadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã waya tꞌo pɨkꞌapida perã ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã. Mãga padaida–e paji pãchi akꞌõreerã kꞌaurepa, ewaa tꞌodakꞌa. Mãgee akꞌõreerã piupata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre ichita chokꞌai bapari. Iruata parã ichideerã papiji ichi pedee kꞌaurepa. Mãgɨ́ pedee jõkꞌaa. Ichita bapari Tachi Akꞌõrekꞌa. Mapa parã jida ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopari perã, kꞌayaa beerãpa jaradaipia bɨ ãchia kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa awaraa ijãapataarãmaa, mãɨrãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃damerã ãchi pari. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra jɨpaipɨ. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ irua oopari perã ichi kꞌĩrapite pia nipapataarãpa iidi pꞌanɨkꞌa, wãara ijãadakꞌãri. Mãga oopari ãrapa ne–inaa chaaree iidi pꞌanɨ pɨjida.
Mɨa wãarata jararu. Eperãpa mɨde ijãa bɨ ɨtꞌaa wãitꞌee.
ʼMɨa parã chupɨria atabëi–eda aji. Waya cheitꞌee.
¡Mãga–epɨ! Tachi Akꞌõrepa judiorãta naapɨara jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichia jarada jɨ̃adamerã mãikꞌaapa awaraarãmaa jarateedamerã.
Esclavoorã, oopatáatɨ parã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema chipariirãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Ãra waaweepatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa mimiapatáatɨ, Cristo–itꞌee mimiakꞌajidakꞌa.

Maa–e pɨrã ¿nãga kꞌĩsia bɨkꞌã? “Tachi Akꞌõre audú tꞌãri pia bairã, chooitꞌee mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri.” ¿Kꞌawa–e bɨkꞌã Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari pɨ ome, kꞌinia bairã pɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaamerã?

Maperã tachi inejasia–ee ɨtꞌaa iidipata Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Tꞌãride kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachia iidiruta pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa oomerã ichia oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, tachia iidiruta irua ũriitꞌee.

Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ parã pari aukꞌa ijãadamerã. Mãgá ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã o–ĩa pꞌanapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee. Iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parãmaa kꞌawaapimerã Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ Cristodeerã–itꞌee, tꞌãri o–ĩa nɨ pꞌanadamerã irumaa wãrutamaa.
Jesús peedapꞌedaamãi ne–uu eujã kꞌaitꞌa baji. Mama baji mãu te uria ewaa kꞌorodapꞌedaa piuda ɨadaitꞌee. Mamĩda waide apida ɨada–e pꞌanajida.

Mamĩda ichia ma nemĩsia jita ataji ma ne–animal kꞌachia ome; chi mãgɨ́ nemĩsia kꞌĩrapite oodapa ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Mãga oo bɨpa ma ne–animal kꞌachia, chi seewa jaraparipa eperãarã kꞌũraji ma nemĩsia tauchaa bɨpidamerã ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade mãikꞌaapa ma nemĩsia kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã. Ma caballo tꞌorroo ɨ̃rɨ wã nipadapa ma nemĩsia ma seewa jarapari ome chokꞌai bɨta batꞌakꞌooji lagokꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau azufre ome jẽrajẽraa jira bɨdee.

Awara ãi ichiaba jara bɨ: ‘Eperãpa pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, nãgá ooipia bɨ. Mãgɨ́ jarrapisia bakꞌãri, nekꞌopíji mãikꞌaapa opisia bakꞌãri, ne–inaa topíji. Mãgá ooru pɨrã, iru kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa irua pɨmaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia bɨ oo–e pai.’ (Proverbios 25.21-22)

Tꞌãripa jɨrɨpatáatɨ Cristopa jarateeda waapɨara kꞌawaadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pꞌanapatáatɨ ma jarateedade jara bɨkꞌa. Iidítɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapimerã mãikꞌaapa jaratéetɨ ma jarateeda awaraarã pãchi tꞌãidepemaarãmaa. Ichiaba ũráatɨ oodamerã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ma jõma oodai cheepurudakꞌãri kꞌaride salmos Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdadepema, Akꞌõre kꞌari mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa kꞌaripiru. Mãgɨ́ kꞌaridakꞌãri, tꞌãripa kꞌaridaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa, iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara tꞌãri piara bapari perã.
Jõdee ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã wẽra paraa beerã, pãchi wẽra kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatáatɨ. Kꞌĩrau pꞌananáatɨ ãra ome. Ma kꞌãyaara tꞌãri pia pꞌanapatáatɨ.

Waya mɨa jara bɨ: Cristode ijãapari ëreerãdepema pꞌẽtrãa paraa pɨrã, ma ijãaparipa chi pꞌẽtrãa kꞌaripaipia bɨ. Pëikꞌaraa bɨ ijãapataarãmaa kꞌaripa iidide, ãrapa ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ araa–e pai perã audú chokꞌaraarã–itꞌee. Ijãapataarãpa akꞌɨdaipia bɨ pꞌẽtrãarã ëreerã wẽe chitoonɨ aupai.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ tachia iru Warrade wãara ijãadakꞌãri, ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome.
Mapa jaradai: “Chi Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade wãara ijãapari ɨtꞌaa wãitꞌee. Mamĩda chi Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade ijãa–e bɨ ɨtꞌaa wã–e paitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ atuaitꞌee.”
Mapa Tachi Akꞌõre Warrapa parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa uchia ataru pɨrã, wãara uchiadaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma jõma jara aupada ooda perã tachi ijãapataarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, o–ĩa para bátɨ. Mɨ nama carcelde chupɨria nɨ̃bɨ mĩda parã judio–eerãmaa jaratee kꞌiniapa, parã pia–ee, kꞌĩsia paraa pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara o–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã judio–eerã ichiaba pia oo kꞌinia bairã Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Mãgeerãpa oodakꞌaa Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa ãchi–itꞌee aupai mimiapata. Pedee sia, iwarraa pedee jaratee pꞌanɨpa kꞌũrapata ijãapataarã, chi pia kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨɨrã.

Mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo pꞌaneepachida. Mãgee eperãarã nãgá pꞌanapata: pariatua awaraarã jɨrɨpata aɨ ome kꞌãidaitꞌee; ikꞌawaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee; chĩara netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃ayaa; chĩara kꞌachia ooyaa; chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bee ne–inaa kꞌaurepa; chĩara jɨrɨyaa peedaitꞌee; chõo jɨrɨyaa; chĩara kꞌũrayaa; tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa; chĩara ãpɨte kꞌachia pedeeyaa;
Jɨ̃́aji Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata pɨmaa jara pëida. Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure, tachi ome baparipa pɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Mãga pɨkꞌa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ooparipa ichia kꞌiniata oopꞌeda, ma kꞌachia jĩakꞌa ataitꞌee, atuaitꞌee perã. Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa ooparipa ne–inaa pia oopꞌeda, ma jĩakꞌa ataitꞌee, ɨtꞌaa wãitꞌee perã.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupináatɨ ãradepemaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa, jaradakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra pꞌoyaa pia akꞌɨ–e paji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa taamaarã pëiji kꞌaakꞌoodamerã. Mapa chokꞌara piujida.
Chĩara kꞌĩraupidakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasiapidakꞌaa. Tachi–itꞌee ne–inaa pipɨara jɨrɨdakꞌaa. Isapai kꞌĩraudakꞌaa. Kꞌĩra pꞌu–ua pꞌanadakꞌaa tachimaa chĩarapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri.
Ãchi tꞌũade ne–inaa jɨ̃ pꞌanajida armadura hierrodee oodakꞌa. Wãaichookꞌoodaidakꞌãri, ãchi isia jĩwaapachida carro caballopa jidiupata jĩwaapatakꞌa, chokꞌara uchiadakꞌãri jura chõode.
ʼMɨa Akꞌõre netꞌaa jara che–e pada paara, ãrapa kꞌĩsiada–e pꞌanakꞌajida ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata. Mamĩda mɨ Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jara cheji. Mapa ɨ̃rá “taipa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨda” adaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapatáatɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome. Unuruta chaa ne–inaa jõma óotɨ ãchimaa Cristode ijãapidaitꞌee.

Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãadai naaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa pꞌanapachida. Mamĩda ijãadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa araa pꞌaneedakꞌãri iru ome, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa kurusode piu pɨkꞌaji iru kꞌapꞌɨa ome. Mãgá uchiajida ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌariipa, waa tachimaa kꞌachia oopinaamerã.

Nãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chisãgɨ́ Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ Netuara Poro Waibɨa warrarã. Chi oo–e bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre warra–e. Ma awara chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre warra–e.

Mãgee oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataarãpa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Mapa oo kꞌiniadakꞌaa iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Wãara mãgá pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa, Akꞌõre Jaure wẽe pꞌanadairã.
Mapa mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa nɨ̃bɨ, mãikꞌaapa kꞌari kꞌinia bɨ, kꞌawa bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripapari.

Ma kꞌãyaara jara kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa nechiara kꞌodai naaweda, bɨruta pɨrã ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, akꞌɨpipata mãgɨde ijãa pꞌanɨ, tachia Cristode ijãapatakꞌa. Mamĩda mãga oodakꞌãri, wãara ooda–e ãchi akꞌõre waibɨa apata–itꞌee. Jĩpꞌa oopata netuaraarã–itꞌee, mãgee ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata netuarade perã. Maperã parã wãnáatɨ mãgɨ́ ne–inaa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patamaa kꞌodaitꞌee nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ma ne–inaa kꞌĩrapite. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, akꞌɨpi pꞌanɨ araa pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨ netuaraarã ome. ¡Mɨa mãga kꞌinia–e bɨ!

Antioquiadepema Cristode ijãapataarã tꞌãide paraaji Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã mãikꞌaapa jarateepataarã. Mãgɨɨrã paji Bernabé, Simón (ichiaba tꞌɨ̃jarapata Nerro), Lucio Cirene pꞌuurudepema, Menahem (aukꞌa warida Galilea pidaarã poro Herodes ome) mãikꞌaapa Saulo.

Mãgee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã atuadaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupipata perã ãchia kꞌachia oo jõnɨpa mãikꞌaapa oodaamaa pꞌanapata perã irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Kꞌũrapináatɨ mãgee pariatua pedeepataarã apidaamaa, seewa jarateepata perã.

Tito, mãɨrãmaa jarateepináaji. Ãchia jarateedaikꞌaraa bɨ, ma kꞌaurepa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã, wẽraarã, ãchi warrarã paara kꞌũrapata perã. Mãgeerãpa kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe seewa jarateepata pꞌaratꞌa atadaitꞌee ãchi–itꞌee.
Jesupa mãga jaraji kꞌawa bada perã kꞌaipa ichi traicionaaitꞌee bɨ.
Mãpai Jesupa mãgaji: —Mɨa wãarata jararu. Eperãarã oveja kꞌãipatamãi tꞌĩudakꞌãri, puerta eere tꞌĩupata. Maperã eperã ma puerta eere tꞌĩu–e pɨrã, mãgɨ́ nechɨayaa bɨ.

Mãgá pꞌana kꞌiniapa ãchia Tachi Akꞌõre o atuajida. Oodai kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, oopata chonaarãwedapema Bosor warra Balaampa oodakꞌa. Mãgɨpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee paji, pꞌaratꞌa audú ata kꞌinia bada perã mãga oorumaa.
Maapai ũkꞌuru judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã pedeeteejida ãchi poroorã ome miapidaitꞌee; mãupa batꞌa peedaitꞌee.

Waya iidida õpee iidiji: —Simón, Juan warra, ¿pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌã? aji. Pedro kꞌĩra pia–ee baji Jesupa iidida õpee mãgá iidida perã. Pꞌanauji: —Tachi Waibɨa, pɨa jõma kꞌawa bɨ. Kꞌawa bɨda aji, mɨa pɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ. Jesupa mãgaji: —Mɨde ijãapataarã akꞌɨpariipáde aji, oveja akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã akꞌɨparikꞌa.

Mamĩda ma pꞌuurude ne–inaa kꞌachia apida unuda–e paitꞌee. Kꞌachia oopataarã apida mãikꞌaapa seewa jarapataarã apida mama unuda–e paitꞌee. Aba unudaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌãpidaarã Oveja Chakꞌe librode.

Mãgɨ́ wẽrapa pꞌaru pꞌupꞌuchia pꞌoree ome jɨ̃ baji. Ichiaba nẽe, mãu pi–ia mãikꞌaapa perla jɨ̃ baji. Ichi juade iru baji copa nẽedee ooda. Mãgɨ́ ipuru baji ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoopa; ne–inaa jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bɨ.
Ma awara chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mãga pꞌanapataadakꞌãri, wãara oodai ma jõma etꞌewa jarada Tachi Akꞌõredeerãpa oopataadamerã.
Ũrikꞌãri judio–eerãpa iru jɨrɨmaa pꞌanɨ, Jesupa mãgaji: —Ewari paruda aji, Eperã Akꞌõre Truadepema ɨtꞌaa wãitꞌee.

Jarapata tachi wẽra omepai kꞌãipia bɨ. Mamĩda parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa chĩara wẽra jɨrɨpata, aɨ ome kꞌãidaitꞌee. Kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatada apata ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo juapa ooda, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Mamĩda parãdepemaarã ũkꞌuru tꞌĩupata mãgee ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ tede nechɨadaitꞌee.

Mamĩda tachia Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda iru pꞌanɨ. Maperã mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa waapɨara mɨmaa chĩara netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃apipari, mãgɨpa oopi kꞌinia bairã ma ũraade jara bɨ eperãarãpa oonaadamerã. Ma ũraa wẽ–e pada paara, ¿sãga oopikꞌajima ma ũraade jara bɨ oonaadamerã? ¡Maarepida oopi–e pakꞌaji!
Ma–itꞌee pɨ pëiitꞌeeda aji, judiorãmaa mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãmaa. Mamĩda pɨ kꞌaripa ataitꞌee ãchi juadeepa.

Naaweda tachia Cristo kꞌawada–e pꞌanadakꞌãri, kꞌachia pꞌanapachida. Oodaamaa pꞌanapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëidakꞌa. Atua pꞌanajida, seewa jara pꞌanɨpa tachi itu kꞌũra pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanapachida, tachia oo kꞌiniata ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo nipapatapꞌedaa perã. Tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanapachida. Awaraarã unuamaa iru pꞌanapachida, ne–inaa iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Chikꞌĩra unuamaa pꞌanapachida.
Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa Jesucristo kꞌĩrapite, angeleerã jɨrɨtꞌerada kꞌĩrapite paara, mɨa jara bɨ: óoji mɨa etꞌewa jaradakꞌa. Mamĩda pɨchi kꞌinia aba pipɨara akꞌɨnáaji awaraa kꞌãyaara.
Jõma ma etꞌewa jarada wãara perã, waaweenáatɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ parãmaa ne–inaa pi–ia teeitꞌee.
Irua tai mãgá pëida perã, chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadaipia bɨ.
Maperã Pedro kꞌãima chokꞌara beeji ma pꞌuurude, ne–e pꞌoopari tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Simón tede.
Tachi Akꞌõre ichi te waibɨade baparikꞌa, ichi Jaure bapari parã ome. Maperã parã iru tékꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, Jesucristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa nãgaweda tachi panadai Tachi Akꞌõre bɨmaa.
Mãpai waya Jesupa mãgaji: —Mɨ ãyaa wãitꞌeeda aji. Parãpa mɨ jɨrɨdaitꞌee. Mamĩda mɨ unuda–e paitꞌee. Atuadaitꞌee pãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mapa mɨ wãitꞌee bɨmaa parã pꞌoyaa wãda–eda aji.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã mãgá jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichideerã papiitꞌee. Parã kꞌinia iru bapari perã, parã awara bɨji nãga pꞌanapataadamerã awaraarã ome: chupɨria kꞌawaa; tꞌãri pia; audua–ee; kꞌĩrau–ee; tꞌãripa choo, nepɨrade baairuta pɨjida.
Apidaapa oo kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa, mãgɨ́ nipaipia bɨ mɨ ome mɨ wãrumaa. Mãga ooru pɨrã, mɨ Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨitꞌee.
Ichi te pidaarã pia akꞌɨ baipia bɨ, chi warrarãpa ichi waaweedamerã mãikꞌaapa chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadamerã.
Maperã o–ĩa para bátɨ mãikꞌaapa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapatáatɨ oodaitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa, parãpa nãga weda oomaa pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa parãpa nãga ũridooda: chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.
Ɨ̃rapema ijãapataarã miapi iru pꞌanadairã, mɨ–itꞌee pipɨara bɨ tuu baitꞌee.
Bapachi fariseo tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Nicodemo. Judiorã poro waibɨarãdepema paji.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abraham ome oodakꞌa ichiaba ooji Rahab ome. Mãgɨ́ prostituta baji. Mamĩda Israel pidaarã chedakꞌãri iru baparimãi ma pꞌuuru akꞌɨde, irua ma Israel pidaarã kꞌaripaji ichi aukꞌaarãpa jita atanaadamerã. Mãga ooji Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bada perã. Mãgá ooda perã mãikꞌaapa wãara ijãada perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ wẽra pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨji.

Ma kꞌaurepa eperãarã jõmaweda o kꞌachiade pꞌaneejida. Mamĩda wẽraarã paara ma o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadai Cristode ijãaruta pɨrã mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ooruta pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa; ãchideerã pia akꞌɨpataadamerã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadamerã.

Tai Israel pidaarãpa ijãa pꞌanɨda aji, chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai chonaarã jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichi–itꞌee. Ãchi ĩwapiji Egiptode, atꞌãri awaraa eujãdepemaarãkꞌa pꞌanajida mĩda. Ichi juapa ãchi mamãikꞌaapa uchiapiji, ichi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi tꞌãride iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌawa bada perã, akꞌɨpiji ichia ãchi jida kꞌinia iru bɨ, tachi kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌa. Mãga akꞌɨpiji ãchimaa pëikꞌãri ichi Jaure, tachimaa pëidakꞌa.
Iruata jaraji: ‘Miakꞌãi bɨ awaraarã ome kꞌãináaji.’ Ichiaba jaraji: ‘Eperã peenáaji.’ (Éxodo 20.13-14) Mapa awaraa jɨrɨ–e pɨjida, eperã peeru pɨrã, ichita oo–e bɨ jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa.
Mɨa ãchi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atapari atuanaadamerã; jĩpꞌa ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Apidaapa ãchi pꞌoyaa jãri atada–e pai mɨ juadeepa.

Parãpa ma seewa jarateepataarãpa jara pꞌanɨ ũrida–e pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa isapai pꞌoyaai Satanás, chi ãchimaa mãga oopi bɨ. Mãgá parã kꞌãiwee pꞌanadai, kꞌĩsia awara–awaraa pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesupa made parã kꞌaripamerã.
Mãgeerã chipꞌedaipata Cristode ijãapataarã ome ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de. Mamĩda seewata mãga oo pꞌanɨ, oo kꞌiniadakꞌaa perã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. ¡Ãyaa béeji mãgeerã ikꞌaawaapa!
Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ tachi Cristode ijãapataarã. Tachi jõma araa pꞌanɨ iru ome. Mapa aukꞌa araa pꞌanɨ apemaarã ijãapataarã ome kꞌapꞌɨa apai bɨkꞌa.

Mɨa etꞌewa pꞌãda wãarapɨ. Maperã mãgɨ́ ũraa ipꞌii jarateeipia bɨ ijãapataarãmaa, mãga ũridakꞌãri, ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo pꞌanadamerã. Mãga oodakꞌãri, eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌaripadaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Ma awara mãga ookꞌãri, wãara uchiaji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa: ‘Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãaji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpachi.’ (Génesis 15.6) Abrahampa ichia wãara ijãada mãgá akꞌɨpida perã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌõpꞌãyoda apachida.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ netꞌaa jõma Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo jua ekꞌari nɨ̃bɨ. Iruata Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree iru bɨ. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨta mãikꞌaapa irude ijãa pꞌanɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda parãpa aba kꞌiniara iru pꞌanapatama apemaarã kꞌãyaara? Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopikꞌaa.

‘Nãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Ara piuda kꞌapꞌɨa pia ɨada–e pakꞌãri, mikꞌia uchiaparikꞌa ma ɨadapꞌedaamãiipa, mãga pɨkꞌa pedee kꞌachia uchiapari ãchi itꞌaideepa, tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanapata perã. Ãchi itꞌaideepa seewa aupai uchiapari.’ (Salmos 5.9) ‘Ara taamapa neera mera iru baparikꞌa chi kꞌidade eperã kꞌaaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa ãchi imeraa pedeepa eperãarã kꞌũrapata ne–inaa kꞌachia oopidaitꞌee.’ (Salmos 140.3)

Cristopa tachi ijãapataarã, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa apai pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨɨrã, mãgá kꞌinia iru bapari perã, ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãpa ãchi wẽraarã ichiaba kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ ãchi kꞌapꞌɨakꞌa. Ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi wẽra wãara kꞌinia iru bakꞌãri, pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa akꞌɨ baparikꞌa.

Tachia ¿kꞌãata kꞌawaadaima kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri Akꞌõrepa mãga oodade Israel pidaarã ome? Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ judio–eerãpa Tachi Akꞌõre jɨrɨda–e pꞌanajida. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, Cristode ijãapata perã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata kꞌawapida Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari tꞌãripa ijãadaipia bɨ, kꞌĩsia pꞌua–ee.

Chipari ichiaba Cristode ijãa bɨ pɨrã, ma esclavopa kꞌĩsiaikꞌaraa bɨ oo–e paitꞌee jõma chiparipa oopi bɨkꞌa, ichi ɨ̃pema perã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Ma kꞌãyaara audupɨara tꞌãripa ooipia bɨ chiparipa oopi bɨkꞌa iru kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨpiitꞌee iru kꞌinia iru bɨ Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ma jõma jara aupada jãpema ijãapataarãmaa jaratéeji mãikꞌaapa ũráaji mãga oodamerã.

Made Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa jaraji judiorãmaa. Mamĩda ãchidepema ũkꞌuruurãpa ma ũraa ijãada–e pꞌanapachida. Maperã ooda–e paji irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ãrapa mãgá ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, ¿Akꞌõrepa oo amaa beejikꞌã ichia jaradakꞌa ma ũraa pꞌãdade?
Ma kꞌãyaara soldaopa Jesús orrode miasupa sutꞌaaji. Aramata uchiaji waa pania ome.
Mɨa nãga jara bɨ: Chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ, mɨa parã kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa.

Ne–inaa kꞌachia oopináatɨ pãchi juamaa, bɨɨrɨmaa, itꞌaimaa, taumaa. Jĩpꞌa pãchi kꞌapꞌɨa bɨ́tɨ Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari, irua ne–inaa pia oopimerã ma kꞌapꞌɨamaa. Pꞌanapatáatɨ kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi iru pꞌanɨkꞌa, parã aukꞌa pꞌirabai pɨkꞌadapꞌedaa perã Cristo ome, iru kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi pꞌirabaikꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jaraji mĩda, tachita atuada–e paitꞌee ma ijãada–eerãkꞌa, Cristode wãara ijãapata perã. Maperãpɨ irua tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee irumaa parutamaa.

Ma tꞌẽepai, Israel pidaarã chokꞌara aukꞌa Cristode ijãadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõrepa ãra o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee, iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa: ‘Tachi Kꞌaripapari uchiaitꞌee Israel pidaarã tꞌãideepa, Sión pꞌuurudeepa. Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee.

Mãgee judiorãpa Tachi Waibɨa Jesús peepijida, ãchi aukꞌaarãpa chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã peepidapꞌedaakꞌa. Jesús peepidapꞌeda, tꞌãri kꞌachiapa tai jida jɨrɨpachida miapidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ jërekꞌoodaitꞌee ãchi eujãdeepa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee eperãarã pia akꞌɨ–e. Mãgeerãpa eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ.

Ijãadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida Cristode, tachia oo kꞌiniata oo wãruta pɨrã, ijãa amaa kꞌiniapa, kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ awaraa ne–inaapa tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapii. Cristo awara ne–inaa wẽ–e tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi Jesucristo ome araa pꞌanapida perã, jaradai irua Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipikꞌãri, tachi aukꞌa mãgá chokꞌai pꞌirabai pɨkꞌapiji. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo su–akꞌɨ beepikꞌãri ichi juaraare ɨtꞌari, tachi aukꞌa mama su–akꞌɨ pꞌanee pɨkꞌapiji, Cristo ome araa pꞌanapata perã.
Mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee waa seewa jaranáatɨ. Ichita wãarata jarapatáatɨ awaraarãmaa, tachi jõmaweda kꞌapꞌɨa apai pɨkꞌa araa pꞌanadairã tachi poro Cristo jua ekꞌari.
Taipa maarepida kꞌĩsiada–e paji oodaitꞌee mãgeerãpa oopi kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, ma pedee wãara jɨ̃a kꞌinia pꞌanajida parã–itꞌee.
Mamĩda iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã Akꞌõrepa pedeepimerã kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede, mãgara ichiaba iididaipia bɨ kꞌawapimerã kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ mãgɨ́ pedee. Mãgá awaraarãmaa jarateedai.
Felipepa mãga oo bɨ misa, Saulopa Cristode ijãapataarã peekꞌooitꞌeeda apachi. Mapa wãji judiorã pꞌaareerã poro waibɨamaa
ʼƗ̃rá mɨ wãitꞌee pɨmaa. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨde mɨa nãgɨ́ pedee jara bɨ, ãrapa o–ĩa ũridamerã mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩadaidamerã, mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa bɨkꞌa.

Ma kꞌãyaara o–ĩa pꞌanátɨ parã miapidakꞌãri Cristo miapidapꞌedaakꞌa, ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. O–ĩa pꞌanadai mãgá miaruta misa na eujãde, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã na ewari wãara tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee Cristo chekꞌãri ichi kꞌĩra wãree unupide jõmaarãmaa.
Pi–ia akꞌɨji kꞌawaaitꞌee kꞌãata edajãde paraaji. Unuji ne–animalaarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, bɨɨrɨpa nĩuteepata, kꞌachia beepata, bipa nĩuteepata mãikꞌaapa wãabaipata.

Mamĩda ɨ̃rá mãga pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mapa nãgee jõmaweda oo amáatɨ. Kꞌĩrau mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri kꞌachia pꞌananáatɨ. Kꞌĩsianáatɨ chĩara kꞌachia oodaitꞌee. Pedee kꞌachia pedeenáatɨ awaraarã ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa ikꞌachia pedeenáatɨ.
Pablo pꞌasiade wãkꞌãri ma judío badamaa, kꞌawaa ataji ichi jĩakꞌa Aquilapa carpa oopari. Mapa Pablo ãra ome beeji ma mimia oomaa.
Oonáatɨ ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa parãmaa. Mãgɨ́ kꞌaurepa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopata. Mamĩda ma kꞌapꞌɨa jõitꞌeepɨ.
Maperãpɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa taimaa jarapiru: mãgee eperãarã kꞌãiwee mimiadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa chikꞌo atadaipia bɨ ãchi juadoopa.
ʼMãgɨ́ Jacob warrarã pada, tachi chonaarãpa, ãchi ɨ̃pema José kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapachida. Maperã netotꞌaajida esclavokꞌa Egiptodee wãyaa wãdapꞌedaarãmaa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre José ome baji.

Mama pꞌanɨde mãɨrãdepema aba tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Agabo, ijãapataarã kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ beepꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapiji jarra oodaitꞌee jõmaweda Roma jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã eujãde. Wãara, aɨ tꞌẽepai mãgɨpa jaradakꞌa pꞌasaji César Claudio Romadepema reyrã poro waibɨa bakꞌãri.
Mãga jarapꞌeda, Pablo bedabaidachi mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji Tachi Akꞌõremaa jõmaarã ome.
Ma etꞌewa jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesucristode ijãapataarãpa oo amaapata ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopata.
Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, parã nepɨrade pꞌanadakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã chupɨria jõnadakꞌãri, waapɨara Cristode o–ĩa ijãa pꞌanátɨ.
Tachidepemapa jarai ichi araa bapari Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Mamĩda ma eperãpa atꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ pɨrã, seewamaa bɨ. Ichia oo–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidakꞌa.
unuji pajã ewadaru. Madeepa ɨtꞌariipa che wãji lienzokꞌa bɨ. Ma kꞌɨ̃ chaa jɨ̃ beeji.
Nama eperãarã pꞌanɨ Partia, Media, Elam, Mesopotamia, Judea, Capadocia, Ponto mãikꞌaapa Ásia eujãdepemaarã.

Taipa mãga iidipata kꞌinia pꞌanadairã parã pꞌanapataadamerã Tachi Waibɨadeerãkꞌa, ne–inaa jõma oomaa pꞌanɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãga pꞌanadakꞌãri, ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara kꞌawaadaitꞌee.

Timoteo, pɨ mɨchi warrakꞌa bairã, mɨa na ũraa jararu. Kꞌirãpáji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapida pɨmaa ichi pedee jarapataarã itꞌaideepa. Ma jaradapꞌedaakꞌa ookꞌãri, kꞌĩsia pꞌua–ee chooitꞌee wãarata ijãa bɨde, soldaopa chooparikꞌa ãpɨtee wã–ee chõo jõnɨde.

Ma tꞌẽepai mɨa ũriji eperãarã chokꞌara ɨtꞌari golpe pedeemaa pꞌanɨkꞌa: —¡Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma Tachi Akꞌõremaa! ¡Iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ! Iruata tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji atuanaadamerã. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõre aupaita waaweedaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa iru jua ekꞌari aupaita pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.
Cristode ijãadai naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee parã piu pɨkꞌa pꞌanajida, irua oopi bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanapatapꞌedaa perã mãikꞌaapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapatapꞌedaa perã.

¿Parã araa pꞌanadaipia bɨkꞌã netuara ome? ¡Mãgá oodaikꞌaraa bɨ, Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa iru ome araa pꞌanapata perã! ¿Netuara eere pꞌanɨɨrã ome kꞌodaipia bɨkꞌã nechiara netuaramaa teeda? Mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ, Cristode ijãapataarã ome araa pꞌanapata perã iru piuda kꞌaurepa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã awara bɨda perã Cristokꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã, nãgee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia eperãarãpa oopata jida jaradaikꞌaraa bɨ: miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarã ome kꞌãipata; kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe awaraarã jɨrɨpata pꞌekꞌau oodaitꞌee ãchi ome; awaraarã wẽra wa netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃apata.

Cristo kꞌaurepa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadakꞌãri, ne–inaa jõmaweda pia bɨ tachi–itꞌee; chikꞌo kꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa itꞌabarreepema netꞌaa. Jõdee jãgee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa Cristo ũraade ijãadakꞌaa beerã–itꞌee, maarepida ne–inaa pia wẽ–e. Ãchi–itꞌee jõmaweda kꞌachia bɨ. Ãchi kꞌĩsia paara kꞌachia bɨ, Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa perã.

Mãga ũridakꞌãri, jõmaarãpa akꞌɨtrua para beepachi mãikꞌaapa mãgapachida: —¿Nãgɨ́ paji–ekꞌã ajida, Jerusalende jɨrɨ nipapata peeitꞌee jõmaweda Jesude ijãapataarã? ¿Ichiaba nama cheji–ekꞌã ajida, ijãapataarã jita pꞌe ateede pꞌaareerã poroorãmaa?

Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨapa oo bɨ ɨtꞌari pipɨara bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema pꞌaareerãpa oopata kꞌãyaara. Mãga bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa chiwidide jara bairã tachi pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee Cristo kꞌaurepa.
Mɨa nãga ijãapari. Mɨ bapari ooitꞌee Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda mɨa kꞌawa bɨ jai–idaakꞌãri pipɨara bapariitꞌee, ɨtꞌari Cristo ome ichita bapariitꞌee perã.
Mãgá ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã tꞌãri pia pꞌanapiji ichia kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa. Mɨa tꞌãride kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá oo wãkꞌãtɨ wãitꞌee, irukꞌa tꞌãri pia parutamaa Cristo waya chekꞌãri.

Ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Warra na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee cheji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawapiitꞌee tachimaa, mãgá kꞌawaadamerã kꞌaita wãara Tachi Akꞌõre. Tachi ijãapataarã chaa tꞌãri a–ba bapari ma wãara Akꞌõre ome, tꞌãri a–ba bapari perã iru Warra Jesucristo ome. Mãgɨta wãara Tachi Akꞌõre. Iru kꞌaurepata ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee.
Awaraarã nepɨra jɨrɨyaa pꞌanɨ mĩda, parã jõdee kꞌãiwee pꞌanapatáatɨ chĩara ome.

Mãgapai–epɨ. Ichita pꞌanadáma tachi pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa naa tꞌãripa ijãadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa teeitꞌee ne–inaa jõma ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee. ¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa!
ʼMɨ wãi naaweda, parã tꞌãri kꞌãiweepi kꞌinia bɨ. Tꞌãri kꞌãiwee pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mɨa arakꞌatɨapai kꞌãiwee pꞌanapi–e, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopatakꞌa. Mapa tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌananáatɨ mãikꞌaapa pꞌeranáatɨ.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá ne–inaa kꞌĩsia iru bapari perã ichideerã–itꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadai. Wãara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌanɨ misa, Tachi Waibɨa ikꞌaawaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ.
Eperãpa mɨ ũraa ũripꞌeda, made jara bɨkꞌa oo–e pɨrã, mɨa jara–e ma eperã atuaitꞌee. Mɨ che–e paji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã atuapiitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara mɨ cheji eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atade.

Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanadairã, oonaadáma Caínpa oodakꞌa. Ichia ooji Netuara Poro Waibɨapa oopidakꞌa. Chi ɨ̃pema kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapꞌeda, peetꞌaaji. ¿Sãapꞌeda mãga ooji? Ichi tꞌãri kꞌachia bapachi. Jõdee chi ɨ̃pema tꞌãri pia bapachi.
Ma awara ma wëre nɨ̃bɨde jõmaweda isla ee ome wẽpadachida.
Mãpai Abraham eperã piudakꞌa baji mĩda, warrarã chokꞌara irudeepa uchiajida, lucero pajãde nɨ̃bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa pꞌusa ide ipu tau nãusaa nɨ̃bɨkꞌa.
Maperã o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma Tachi Ɨtꞌaripema Reymaa. Iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Iru trua ichita bapari. Iru aupaita Tachi Akꞌõre. Ichita bapari. Eperãarãpa iru unudakꞌaa. ¡Amén!

Golpe pedeepachi: —Tachi Akꞌõre waawee pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa irumaa jarapatáatɨ iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Ewari paji irua akꞌɨmerã eperãarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ irumaa, iruata ooda perã pajã, na eujã pꞌusa ome mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda pania poatrɨ uchia bɨmãi.

Maapai ijãapataarã chokꞌarapɨara ĩwajida. Judiorã griego pedee pedeepataarãpa ɨmɨateejida judiorã hebreo pedee pedeepataarãmaa, ãchia griego pedee pedeepataarã pꞌẽtrãarã pia akꞌɨdakꞌaa pada perã ewari chaa ne–inaa jededakꞌãri kꞌaripadaitꞌee.

Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨji, Cristo jĩakꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã. Iru miaji parã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Kꞌinia bɨ parãpa awaraarã aukꞌa kꞌaripadamerã, miaruta pɨjida mãga oo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jaraparipa irude nãga jaraji:
Parã ome pꞌanadakꞌãri, na ũraa jarajida: “Nekꞌopidaikꞌaraa bɨda ajida, mimia kꞌinia–e bɨmaa.”

—Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã audú kꞌinia iru bada perã, ichi warra apai iru bada pëiji piumerã eperãarã pari. Eperãpa iru Warrade ijãa bɨ pɨrã, atua–e. Jai–idaakꞌãri, Akꞌõre eujãde banaitꞌee.
Mamĩda mãga oodakꞌãri, ma netuara eperã kꞌapꞌɨade merãtɨa badapa mãgaji: —Mɨa kꞌawa bɨda aji, Jesús. Ichiaba kꞌawa bɨ kꞌaita Pablo. Mamĩda parã ¿kꞌairã́ma? aji.

Mãpai unuji mãgɨ́ nemĩsia na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã ome mãikꞌaapa ãchi soldaorã ome. Mãgɨɨrã chipꞌe pꞌanajida jura chõonadaitꞌee ma caballo tꞌorroo ɨ̃rɨ wã nipada ome mãikꞌaapa iru eere pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ome.
Bataujida Adramitio pꞌuurudepema barcode, mãgɨ́ wãitꞌee pada perã Ásia eujãdee, pꞌusa ide pꞌuuru bee chaa. Tai ome ichiaba nipaji Aristarco, Tesalónica pꞌuurudepema. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Macedonia eujãde bɨ.

Kꞌirãpátɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripapatáatɨ carcelde pꞌanɨɨrã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Chupɨria kꞌawáatɨ parã jida mãga pꞌaneedai perã. Ichiaba ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa parã kꞌõpꞌãyoorã miapi pꞌanadakꞌãri Cristo kꞌaurepa, kꞌaripapatáatɨ, parã jida mãga pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.

Wãara jõmaweda parãpa oopata oodaipia bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesupa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba jõmaweda parãpa jarapata jaradaipia bɨ irua jarapi bɨkꞌa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari gracias jaradaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa.
Ijãapataarã jarateepari itꞌaideepa parãpa ũridakꞌãri Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, ma jarateepari pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia teedaipia bɨ irumaa, iru mimia pari.
Mamĩda na eujã maarepida waide tee–e paji irumaa; bɨɨrɨ aba tꞌɨaitꞌee pida. Jĩpꞌa jaraji teeitꞌee irudeepa uchiadaitꞌeerãmaa iru piuda tꞌẽepai, Abraham waide warra wẽe baji mĩda.
Mãgɨ́ reypa tachi chonaarã kꞌũraji waa ĩwanaadamerã. Ãchi chupɨria ooji. Jaraji ãchi warrarã ewaa tꞌo kꞌedeerã ita–aria piupidamerã.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, Pedro mɨ ome araa wãjida akꞌɨde.
Mapa mɨa jõma oopari kꞌĩsia pꞌua–ee baitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa eperãarã kꞌĩrapite.

Pꞌusa tꞌojara pakꞌãri, kꞌĩraudaipari mãikꞌaapa kꞌõpꞌepꞌee nejarra kꞌachia ome ipu ide atabëipari. Mãga pɨkꞌa mãgeerã. Golpe pedeepata eperãarã waibɨarãkꞌa. Mamĩda tachia unudai ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ãchia oopata. Lucero Akꞌõrepa bɨdamãiipa uchiadákꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ, awaraarãmaa Tachi Akꞌõre o atuapipata perã. Mapa irua ãchi atuapiitꞌee, ichita pꞌãriude jɨ̃a paraa pꞌanadamerã.
maa–e pɨrã awaraapa mɨmaa jarateeda. Jara–e paji eperãpa jara pëida. Jĩpꞌa jaraji Jesucristopa mɨmaa kꞌawapida.

Araa pꞌanadai naaweda Cristo ome, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopipachi tachimaa, oo kꞌinia bada perã Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ eperãarãpa oonaadamerã. Mãga oopida perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi atuapiitꞌee paji.

Ma–itꞌeepɨ ichia mɨ bɨji mãga jarateemerã. Mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Cristopa pëimerã ichi ũraa jarateede. Audú kꞌinia bɨ mɨa ma wãara pedee jarateenamerã judio–eerãmaa, ãchia ichiaba ijãadamerã. Wãara jara bɨ; seewa–e.

Chi ooparipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa tꞌãri a–ba bapari iru ome. Chikꞌinia pꞌanapata. Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa tachimaa mãga kꞌawapipari perã. Ma–itꞌee ichi Jaure pëiji tachi ome bapariimerã.
Apidaapa ne–inaa oodaikꞌaraa bɨ ichi–itꞌee aupai. Ichiaba ooipia bɨ awaraarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanadaipia bɨ awaraa ijãapataarã ome. Jĩpꞌa jɨrɨdaipia bɨ Akꞌõrepa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ parã awaraarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara pꞌanɨ. Aukꞌa kꞌõpꞌãyo meraadaipia bɨ chupɨria beerã ome mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌara beerã ome. Audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Mapa parãdepema apida nãgá baikꞌaraa bɨ: tꞌãri ãrii; kꞌĩrauyaa; tꞌãri kꞌachia; chõoyaa; ikꞌachia pedeeyaa maa–e pɨrã awaraarã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarayaa; awaraarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ na mimiade bɨji, parã Cristode ijãapataarã kꞌaripamerã. Mapa jarateepari jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida Cristode.
Ichi puda tꞌo–tꞌoo baji, oveja kꞌarakꞌa maa–e pɨrã nievekꞌa. Chi tau urua nɨ̃baji tꞌɨpɨtaukꞌa.

Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanadairã, choopata parã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee Cristode ijãadamerã. Mãgá chokꞌaraarãpa kꞌawaadaitꞌee Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa o kꞌachiadeepa uchiapi kꞌinia bɨ. Mãpai mãɨrãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, gracias jaradaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa mãikꞌaapa ãchi ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌanɨde akꞌɨpidaitꞌee wãara irude ijãapata.
Chi mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌo bɨpa, ichiaba mɨ waa to bɨpa mɨ ome araa bapariitꞌeeda aji.
Martapa mãgaji: —Ijãa bɨpɨ. Pɨta Mesías, chi na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee cheitꞌee bada eperãarã kꞌaripade. Pɨta Tachi Akꞌõre Warra.

Mamãikꞌaapa ãchia ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapachida Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa jarateepata mãikꞌaapa jedepachida ãchia ne–inaa iru bee. Ichiaba jõmaweda cheepurupachida ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jedekꞌodaitꞌee, mãgá kꞌirãpadaitꞌee Cristo piuda ãchi pari.

Ne–inaa pia aupai oo kꞌinia bapachi. Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooamaa bada perã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ. Maperã pɨ Akꞌõre, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji waibɨara pamerã pɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorã kꞌãyaara. Mãga ookꞌãri, pɨ o–ĩapiji.’ (Salmos 45.6-7)
Jaraji Juan ɨ̃pema, Santiago espadapa peetꞌaadamerã.
Mamĩda ãyaa béeji pariatua pedee wãpataarã ikꞌaawaapa. Ãchia Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jaradakꞌaa. Mãgá pariatua pedee pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa audupɨara kꞌachiade baairuta.
Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee eperãpa ichi ɨ̃pema kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, aukꞌa bɨ eperã chĩara peepari ome. Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chĩara peepataarã ɨtꞌaa wãdakꞌaa.

Nekꞌodapꞌedaa tꞌẽepai, Jesupa Simón Pedromaa iidiji: —Simón, Juan warra, ¿pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru baparikꞌã aji, apemaarãpa mɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata kꞌãyaara? Pedropa pꞌanauji: —Tachi Waibɨa, pɨata kꞌawa bɨ. Mɨa pɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ. Mãpai Jesupa mãgaji: —Ewaa ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã akꞌɨpariipáde aji, oveja akꞌɨparipa oveja chakꞌeerã akꞌɨparikꞌa.
Abaamaa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapipari jarateemerã ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ. Awaraarãmaa pipɨara kꞌawapipari Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida, mãga jarateemerã.
Aɨ tꞌẽepai wãdakꞌãri, Josepa ichi ɨ̃pemaarãmaa kꞌawaapiji. Madeepa Faraónpa José ëreerã kꞌawaji.
Iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ: ‘Eperã tꞌãri o–ĩa taarã ba kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde, awaraarã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jara amaaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa seewa amaaipia bɨ.
Maapai ijãapataarã jõmaweda aukꞌa kꞌĩsiapachida mãikꞌaapa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapachida. Apidaapa ãchi netꞌaa iru pꞌanɨ ãchi–itꞌee aupaida adakꞌaa paji. Jĩpꞌa jõmaarã–itꞌee paji.
Ma jarateeda kꞌawaapꞌeda, mɨa parãmaa jarateeji, jarateeda pipɨara bairã. Nãga bɨ: Cristo piuji tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pꞌuuru jõtꞌaaji, aɨde eperãarãpa peedapꞌedaa perã iru pedee jarapataarã, ichideerã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã.
Judio–eerãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, o–ĩa para beeji mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida pia bɨda apachida. Mãpai Cristode ijãajida chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadamerã.
Jesucristo, chi na pꞌãdade jara bɨ kꞌawapidapa mãgapari: —Taarã–e mɨ cheitꞌeeda apari. Mɨ, Juanpa jara bɨ: —¡Amén! ¡Chéji, Tachi Waibɨa Jesús!

Parãpa ma ũraa ijãajida mãikꞌaapa awaraa jarateeda chokꞌara ũrijida mɨchi itꞌaideepa. Mɨ parã tꞌãide nipai naaweda, awaraarãpa mɨ bapata parãmaa nepɨrɨpachida. Ma awara pãchi taupa unujida mɨa oopata jãma nipakꞌãri. Mapa oo wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ mɨa ooparikꞌa mãikꞌaapa pꞌanapatáatɨ mɨ baparikꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõre parã ome baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa parã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee.
Mamĩda kꞌĩrakꞌaupai mãgɨ́ ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanadai. Jĩpꞌa ũráatɨ pãchi ɨ̃pema ũraapatakꞌa, irua oomerã Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãadai seewa jarateepataarãpa jara pꞌanɨ. Ãchia jarateeda–e Cristopa ooda mãikꞌaapa jarada. Ma kꞌãyaara ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa seewa jarateepata, chonaarãweda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãda apatapꞌedaarãpa jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa. Mãɨrãpa jarateepachida eperãarã ne–inaa oo pꞌanɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawadai.
Jĩpꞌa jɨrɨ bɨ iru kꞌawaitꞌee irukꞌa parumaa, chokꞌai pꞌirabaidakꞌãri. Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨji, ɨtꞌaa wãmerã Jesucristo kꞌaurepa.

Ichi ita–aria peepiji tachi pari. Mãgá tachi kꞌaripa ataji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa. Mãgá piukꞌãri, tachia kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa jõmaweda wẽpapiji ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã. Maperã tꞌãripa ichi–itꞌee ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ.

ʼMɨa wãarata jararu. Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa mɨ pëiji. Mɨ pedee ũri bɨpa mãikꞌaapa irude ijãa bɨpa ɨtꞌaa wãitꞌeeda aji. Mãgɨ́ eperã atua–e paitꞌee. Irua ijãadakꞌãriipa ichita bapariitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome.
Ma ángel mɨmaa pedee badapa pakꞌuru nẽedee ooda juade atee wãji. Mãgɨpa ma pꞌuuru chaamaa beeji; chi muralla, chi tꞌĩupatamãi paara.

Mãɨrã atuadaitꞌee. Ãchi kꞌapꞌɨa ãchi akꞌõre waibɨakꞌa iru pꞌanɨ. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ oopata perã ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga oopata kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe. Jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsia pꞌanapata na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema netꞌaade.
Eperã ewaa Cristode ijãa bɨ pɨrã, ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari paikꞌaraa bɨ, auduadarii perã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa atuapii perã Netuara Poro Waibɨa atuapidakꞌa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mɨa tꞌãripa pꞌãitꞌee paji jaraitꞌee sãga Cristopa tachi ijãapataarã jõmaweda o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji atuanaadamerã. Mamĩda, ma kꞌãyaara, pꞌãru ũraaitꞌee parãpa ijãa amaadamerã awaraarãpa seewa jarateepata mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa ijãadamerã, tai naapema ijãapataarãpa naaweda jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa.
Kꞌĩrau pꞌanajida Pedropa mãikꞌaapa Juanpa jaratee pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã eperãarã piudapꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaidai, Jesús pꞌirabaidakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨɨrã miapiitꞌee ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa, audú ne–inaa kꞌachia chokꞌara oopatapꞌedaa perã.
Jesús waya cheji Caná pꞌuurudee, ichia pania vino papidamãi. Maapai Capernaum pꞌuurude bapachi rey mimiapataarã poro waibɨa. Mãgɨ́ warra kꞌayaa baji.
Kꞌoo–idaa pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Tꞌãripa oodaipia bɨ Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá oodaitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Parãpa Cristo waide unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ. Ma awara ɨ̃rá unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, irude ijãapata. Mapa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata. Pedee wẽ–e jaraitꞌee sãga parã audupai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ.
Nãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Irua ichi Jaure pëiji tachi ome bapariimerã.
Mama iru pꞌanajida vino achuchua chokꞌode. Aɨde esponjakꞌa pꞌẽesapꞌẽesaa bɨ topa atadapꞌeda, jõi bɨjida hisopo kꞌɨ̃de mãikꞌaapa itꞌaimãi tꞌɨ atajida.
Ma awara, iruata tachi uchiapiji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨdeepa mãikꞌaapa bɨji ɨtꞌaripema ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde, ichi Warra kꞌinia iru bɨ jua ekꞌari.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa enenee nɨ̃bɨ parã kꞌɨɨrɨchaa pꞌanadamerã, ũkꞌuru seewa jarateepata paraa perã. Mãɨrãpa awara jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa wãara jarateepataarãpa parãmaa jarateedapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã kꞌĩsia awara–awaraa papipata. Maperã Cristode ijãapataarã ũkꞌuru ijãa amaadaipata ãchi kꞌaurepa. Ãyaa pꞌanéetɨ mãɨrã ikꞌaawaapa.
Awaraamaa ijãapataarã kꞌaripapiru pɨrã, mãga ooipia bɨ. Awaraamaa jarateepiru pɨrã, ichiaba mãga ooipia bɨ.
ʼMaapai parãpa mɨmaa maarepida iidida–e paitꞌee. Mɨa wãarata jararu. Mɨ tꞌɨ̃de mɨ Akꞌõremaa ne–inaa iidiruta pɨrã, irua parãpa iidi pꞌanɨ teepariitꞌee, mɨchideerã perã.
Ma muralla basadepema mãu, mãu pi–ia ome pꞌoira baji; nãgee mãu pi–ia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, chi naapema basa mãu pi–ia jaspe ome; araarepema zafiro ome; omé eerepema ágata ome; õpee eerepema esmeralda ome;
Mãpai eperãpa kꞌawa bɨ pɨrã ne–inaa pia ooipia bɨ, mamĩda mãga oo–ee, kꞌachia oomaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Mãpai mɨa ũriji ma su–akꞌɨ beeparideepa pedeeru: —Parã jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa jarapatáatɨ iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Parã jõmaarãpa oopata irua oopi bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa iru waaweepata, ekꞌariara beerã, waibɨara beerãpa paara mãga jaradaipia bɨ.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌanɨ misa, chupɨria jõnapata mãikꞌaapa audú kꞌĩsia jõnapata, ma ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanadairã.

Ijãapari chaa kꞌĩsiaipia bɨ ichia ooparide. Pia oo bɨ pɨrã, tꞌãride o–ĩa baipia bɨ. Mamĩda awaraarãpa oopata akꞌɨikꞌaraa bɨ kꞌawaaitꞌee aukꞌa pia wa makꞌɨara pia–e bɨ ichia oo bɨ jĩakꞌa. Tachia oo pꞌanɨdepai kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ.

Ɨmɨkꞌĩra tuu bɨpa pedeeru pɨrã miakꞌãiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌapꞌɨapa choo–e bɨ pɨrã wẽra wẽe baitꞌee maa–e pɨrã ma wẽra pedeeteeda tꞌãri pꞌuapi kꞌinia–e bɨ pɨrã, miakꞌãipia bɨ. Mãga ooru pɨrã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo–e bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tedeepa parã jëretꞌaapataadaitꞌeeda aji. Ma awara parã peetꞌaadaitꞌeeda aji. Mãga oodakꞌãri, ãchia kꞌĩsiadaitꞌee mãgata pia oomaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee.

Mãpai mɨa ne–inaa awara waide unukꞌaa pada ɨtꞌari unuji. Pꞌera pɨkꞌa beeji mãga unukꞌãri. Unuji angeleerã siete. Ma chaachaa ne–inaa kꞌachia atee wãji pꞌasapiitꞌee eperãarãmaa. Mãgɨ́ ne–inaa kꞌachia siete aupadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrau bada na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã ome jõitꞌee.
Jesupa mãgaji: —Mɨa pedee kꞌachia jaraji pɨrã, jarapáde aji, kꞌãare pedeeta kꞌachia baji. Mamĩda mɨa jarada wãara pɨrã, ¿sãapꞌeda mɨ sĩjima? aji.

Ichiaba pɨmaa, mɨchi kꞌõpꞌãyo kꞌiniara, chupɨria iidi bɨ mãgɨ́ wẽraarã kꞌaripamerã. Pɨ mɨ ome aukꞌa wãara mimiapari Cristo–itꞌee. Mapa mɨa kꞌawa bɨ pɨa ãra kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mɨkꞌa ãchia jɨrɨjida jarateedaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Jesucristode. Ichiaba mãgá oojida Clemente mãikꞌaapa awaraa mimiapataarã Cristo–itꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨɨrã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã iru bɨ ɨtꞌari, Cristopa chokꞌai pꞌanapidaarã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra bɨ librode.

Pɨa pia ooji mãgá pania waa papikꞌãri, jãgɨ́ eperãarãpa pɨchideerã waa mãikꞌaapa pɨ pedee jarapataarã waa batꞌapidapꞌedaa perã, ãra pee atapëidakꞌãri. Maperãpɨ jãgɨɨrãmaa waa topimaa bɨ. Mãgɨ́ todaipia bɨ jãgeerãpa.
¡Mãga–e! Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa piu pɨkꞌaji. Mãga bɨta, ¿sãga waapɨara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oodaima?

Mãgɨ́ nemĩsia chokꞌai bada mamĩda ɨ̃rá wẽ–e ma reyrã siete tꞌẽe uchiaitꞌee, aɨ eerepemakꞌa. Mamĩda wãara mãgɨ́ ma sietedepema uchiada paitꞌee. Waya eperãarã iru bapariitꞌee ichi jua ekꞌari. Mãgɨta wãitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõtꞌaaitꞌeemaa.

Mamĩda mãga baji mĩda Agar warra ome, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ: ‘Ãyaa pëipáde aji, ma esclava ichi warra ome. Ma warrapa chi akꞌõrepa bëida ata–e paitꞌee chi wẽra warrapa ataparikꞌa.’ (Génesis 21.10)

Mamĩda eperãarã ũkꞌuru, audú pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniapa, kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–eedaipata mãikꞌaapa kꞌachiade baaipata. Maapꞌeda bigi pꞌoyaa lazodeepa uchia–e bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ãra ma kꞌachiadeepa pꞌoyaa uchiada–e pꞌaneepata. Mãgapɨ eperãarã atua wãpata.

Ma reyrã diez pɨa unuda mãgɨ́ nemĩsia ome, mãgɨ́ prostitutakꞌa bɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌaneedaitꞌee. Mapa ãchia jãri atadaitꞌee jõmaweda ma wẽrapa ne–inaa iru bɨ, ãkꞌadaa pɨkꞌa beemerã. Maapꞌeda iru paa jõdaitꞌee.
Mamĩda eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ ma eperã wãara irude ijãapari.

Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tai judiorã pipɨara pꞌanɨ–e judio–eerã kꞌãyaara, Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãda tai ome bëida perã. Etꞌewa mɨa akꞌɨpiji parãmaa tachi jõmaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata perã; judiorã, judio–eerã aukꞌa.
Mãpai oojida pꞌakꞌa chakꞌekꞌa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee. Ne–animalaarã peejida aɨ kꞌĩrapite paadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa fiesta oojida o–ĩapa, ma pꞌakꞌa chakꞌekꞌa ooda–itꞌee.

Mãgá eperãarã chokꞌara piujida mĩda ma kꞌachiapa, chi waide peeda–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amaa kꞌiniada–e paji. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji netuaraarãmaa. Ichiaba ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji ãchia ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite; ne–inaa nẽedee ooda, pꞌaratꞌadee ooda, broncedee ooda, mãudee ooda, pakꞌurudee ooda. Mãgɨ́ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ kꞌinia pꞌanapachida mãgee ne–inaa pꞌoyaa akꞌɨkꞌaa mĩda, pꞌoyaa ũrikꞌaa mĩda mãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaa tꞌɨakꞌaa mĩda.

Cristopa tachia oopata mãgá akꞌɨitꞌee perã, iru waawee pꞌanapata. Mapa taipa eperãarãmaa jarateepata Cristode ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa tai pꞌanapata kꞌawaadamerã. Taipa ne–inaa oodakꞌãri wa ne–inaa jaradakꞌãri, mãga oopata eperãarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ tai tꞌãride iru pꞌanɨ. Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa tai ichiaba mãgá kꞌawaadamerã.

Wãara Cristode ijãadai naaweda, tachi jõmaweda mãgee kꞌachia oopataarãkꞌa pꞌanapachida. Oopachida tachia oo kꞌiniata, tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopidakꞌa mãikꞌaapa tachia pariatua kꞌĩsiadapꞌedaakꞌa. Mãgá pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupi pꞌanapachida mãikꞌaapa atuadaitꞌee paji apemaarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã ome.
Mãgɨ́ pedee jõma jarapꞌeda, Pedropa ũraaji: —Pꞌananáatɨ Jesús peedapꞌedaarãkꞌa; jĩpꞌa ijã́atɨ mãikꞌaapa óotɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Parã pꞌanaruta pɨrã mãgɨ́ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa pꞌanapi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, atuadaitꞌee. Mamĩda mãgɨpa oopi bɨkꞌa oo amaaruta pɨrã mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre Jauremaa oopiruta pɨrã irua oopi bɨkꞌa, parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre truade pꞌananadaitꞌee.
