Kꞌirãpátɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade ichiaba jara bɨ: ‘Eperã Cristode ijãa bɨ kꞌĩra pia–ee ba–e paitꞌee Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.’ (Isaías 28.16)

Naapɨara mɨa jara kꞌinia bɨ Jesucristo kꞌaurepa mɨa gracias jarapari mɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨamaa parã jõmaarã pari. Mɨa mãgá gracias jarapari, ijãapataarã para bee chaa nepɨrɨpata perã parãpa wãara Jesucristode ijãa pꞌanɨ.
Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌinia iru bapari. Mapa ichia parã jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichideerã papiitꞌee.

Ma awara nãga óotɨ awaraa ne–inaa jõmaweda oodai naaweda. Tꞌãripa chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ, mãgá pꞌanadakꞌãri, maarepida kꞌirãpada–e paitꞌee perã awaraarãpa parãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata mãikꞌaapa jarapata.
Pedeeteedapꞌeda, tai pëijida Italiadee. Pablo awaraa presoorã ome bɨjida soldaorã poro juade, Julio apatapꞌedaa. Mãgɨ́ baji soldaorã batallonde tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Reyrã Poro Waibɨadeerã.

Kꞌarimaa pꞌanajida Tachi Akꞌõre mimiapari Moisepa kꞌaridakꞌa mãikꞌaapa Oveja Chakꞌedeerãpa kꞌaripatakꞌa: —Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara ne–inaa piara oopari. Pɨta jõmaarã eujãdepemaarã Rey. Pɨa ne–inaa jõma pia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa ichita wãarata jarapari.
Ma kꞌãyaara, ara warra ewaa tꞌoda juto kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, kꞌawaa kꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida. Mãgá oo wãdaitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa ɨtꞌaa wãrutamaa.

Mãpai mɨa ũriji ɨtꞌariipa nãga pedeeru: —Pꞌã́ji nãgɨ́ pedee: “Tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨadeerã, chi namãikꞌaapa waa piudaitꞌeerã kꞌachia beerã juapa.” Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãgaji: —Wãarapɨ. Mãɨrã piudakꞌãri, waa mimiada–e paitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌãiwee pꞌanadaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre o–ĩa baitꞌee ãra ome, ãrapa ne–inaa pia oopatapꞌedaa perã Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa ooparipa ooamaa bapari ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa kꞌachia oopata kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo. Ma awara kꞌaripapari akꞌõre wẽe beerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌẽtrãa beerã ãchi chupɨria jõnɨde.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ parãpa kꞌũrapinaadamerã apidaamaa, ne–inaa awara iwarraa jaratee pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Mãpai mɨa ũriji jõma ne–inaa chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã ɨtꞌaripema, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema, na pꞌekꞌau eujã ekꞌaripema mãikꞌaapa pꞌusadepema; ne–inaa jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda. Mãɨrãpa mãgajida: —Rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨmaa mãikꞌaapa Oveja Chakꞌemaa jõmaarãpa ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ichita jaradaipia bɨ parã jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ, ne–inaa jõmaweda parã jua ekꞌari bapari perã.
Araarepema angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, mãu choma tꞌɨpɨtau ome urua nɨ̃bɨ batꞌajida pꞌusa jãdee. Mãpai perá pꞌusa jã esajĩakꞌa waa padachi.

Jerusalén pꞌuurudeepa uchia atadapꞌeda, mãupa batꞌamaa pꞌaneejida iru peetꞌaadaitꞌee. Aukꞌa kꞌaripajida Esteban ɨmɨateedapꞌedaarãpa. Ãchi ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru jɨ̃patapꞌedaa ata bɨjida eperã Saulo apatapꞌedaa bɨɨrɨ ikꞌaawa irua akꞌɨmerã, ãchia mãu batꞌaruta misa.
Awara ãi ichiaba jara bɨ: ‘Parã jõmaarã eujãdepemaarã, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌarítɨ Tachi Waibɨamaa.’ (Salmos 117.1)

Eperãpa mãgá pꞌoyaa tee–e, Tachi Akꞌõre juadeepa ne–inaa jõmaweda uchiapari perã. Ichiata ne–inaa jõmaweda akꞌɨ bapari. Ne–inaa jõmaweda nɨ̃bɨ ichi–itꞌee. Mapa ichita jaradaipia bɨ: “Akꞌõre, ¡pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ! ¡Amén!”

Aɨ norema Juanpa unukꞌãri Jesús ichi kꞌaitꞌa cheru, mãgaji: —¡Akꞌɨ́tɨ! Nãgɨ́ eperã oveja chakꞌekꞌa bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida perã piumerã eperãarã pari. Nãgɨpa wẽpapiitꞌee eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata.

Prostituta Rahabpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bada perã, ichi temãi o–ĩa tꞌĩupiji Josuépa eperãarã omé pëida; ma pꞌuuru akꞌɨde chedapꞌedaarã. Maperã piu–e paji apemaarã ma pꞌuurude ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa, Israel pidaarãpa ma pꞌuuru jõtꞌaa chedakꞌãri.

ʼChi nechɨapari chepari nechɨaitꞌee aupai mãikꞌaapa peeitꞌee aupai; ichiaba ne–inaa jõma pꞌe atadariitꞌee aupai. Jõdee mɨ nama cheji eperãarã pia pꞌanapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌanapiitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome.
Jõdee tachi ɨtꞌaripema pꞌuuru pidaarã, ɨtꞌaripema netꞌaade kꞌĩsia pꞌanapata perã. Nɨmaa pꞌanɨ Tachi O Kꞌachiadeepa Kꞌaripa Atapari ɨtꞌariipa chemerã. Mãgɨ́ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo.

Maperã awaraa ijãapataarã pia akꞌɨ́tɨ, Cristopa parã pia akꞌɨparikꞌa. Cristopa mãga ooda perã na eujãde bɨ misa, awaraarãpa pia jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte. Aukꞌa pia jaradai iru ãpɨte, parãpa mãga oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã.

Pɨchi ome pꞌe ateepáde aji, mãikꞌaapa pꞌaapáde aji, ãchimaa pꞌaapipataarãpa iidi pꞌanɨ. Oodapáde aji, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa; puda tꞌɨɨpidamerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre tede tꞌĩu pia pꞌaneedamerã. Mãgá ooru pɨrã, jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadai pɨ ãpɨte seewa nepɨrɨ pꞌanɨ. Ma awara pɨa mãgá ãramaa akꞌɨpii Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa ichiaba oopari.

Jõdee tauchaa iru beerã ichiaba Abraham warrarã. Mãga pꞌanɨ–e tauchaa iru pꞌanadairã ãchi kꞌapꞌɨadepai. Jĩpꞌa mãga pꞌanɨ ijãapata perã tai judiorã chonaarãwedapema Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa, ichi waide tauchaa wẽe bɨde.
Mãga ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dapꞌeda, suerte jemenejida jɨrɨtꞌeradaitꞌee. Mãpai Matiata uchiaji. Ma ewate weda apemaarã once Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã ome mimiamaa beeji.
‘Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã o–ĩa pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ãyaa bɨkꞌãri mãikꞌaapa wẽpapikꞌãri.
Mãgɨɨrã omé olivo bɨɨrɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa lámpara bɨpatakꞌa pꞌanɨ; Tachi Waibɨa, chi na pꞌekꞌau eujã ooda kꞌĩrapite pꞌanɨ.

Parã wãara pia nipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, kꞌĩsíatɨ pãchia oopatapꞌedaade. Maapꞌeda kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanátɨ. Ëidai kꞌãyaara, tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanátɨ mãikꞌaapa jẽ́etɨ, pãchia kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa.

Gayo, mɨ ɨ̃pema kꞌinia, oonáaji ichia oo bɨkꞌa, ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bairã. Ma kꞌãyaara pia óoji. Nãgɨ́ kꞌirãpáji. Chi ne–inaa pia oo bɨpa oopari Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda chi kꞌachia oo bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e bɨ.

Ma tꞌẽepaita Abrahampa mãga ooji. Mãga ookꞌãri, akꞌɨpiji ichia wãara ijãa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨda, ma ijãa bɨ kꞌaurepa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abraham mãgá akꞌɨda perã ma tauchaa bɨi naaweda, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tauchaa wẽe beerã aukꞌa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneedai Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, ijãadakꞌãri Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa. Mãgá ijãadakꞌãri, Abraham warrarãkꞌa padaipata, ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa wẽe pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Tachi eperã kꞌapꞌɨa piukꞌãri, ne–inaa waa tachimaa oopi–e pai, pia wa kꞌachia. Mãga pɨkꞌa tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa piu pɨkꞌakꞌãri Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa ome, ne–inaa kꞌachia waa tachimaa oopi–e pai.

Tai wãrutamaa jɨrɨpata peedaitꞌee Jesús peedapꞌedaakꞌa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripapari ãchi juadeepa, eperãarãpa kꞌawaadamerã irua aupaita tai kꞌaripapari. Mãga oopari Jesucristo Jaure tai ome bapari perã.
Apemaarãpa jɨrɨmaa pꞌanɨ oodaitꞌee ne–inaa ãchia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, oodai kꞌãyaara Jesucristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Abraham audú chonaa baji warra ooitꞌee. Ichiaba Sara warra tꞌokꞌaa paji. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa warra oopiji Abrahammaa, ijãa bada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa.
Ma–itꞌee mɨ pëiji; jõmaweda mɨ jua ekꞌari bɨdaarã akꞌɨ bamerã apida atuanaamerã. Mãgá Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate ãra chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee.

Mamĩda tachi ijãapataarã–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõreta Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Ijãapata irua ne–inaa jõmaweda ooji, eperãarã paara. Ma jõmaweda oopiji ichi Warra Jesucristomaa, tachia irude ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa irua oopi bɨkꞌa oodamerã.

Mamĩda mãga–e paji. Parã akꞌɨnapꞌeda, Timoteo waya chekꞌãri, pedee pia nepɨrɨ cheji. Jaraji parã Tachi Akꞌõre ome pia nidá mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia pꞌanapata. Ichiaba jaraji parãpa tai kꞌirãpapata mãikꞌaapa tai unu kꞌinia jõnapata, taipa parã unu kꞌinia jõnɨkꞌa.

Mãgá pꞌanaruta pɨrã, tachi akꞌɨpari waibɨara bɨpa ichi waya unupikꞌãri jõmaarãmaa, parã́pata atadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩra wãree mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome. Mãgɨ́ pipɨara bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema poro jɨ̃ra atai kꞌãyaara, Cristo kꞌĩra wãree jõkꞌaa perã.
Kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Akꞌõrepa ũraa chiwidi jara pëida mãgá pipɨara bɨ chi naawedapema jarada kꞌãyaara, taipa mãgɨ́ ũraa jĩpꞌa jarateepata, waaweeda–ee.

Ma seewa jarateepataarã ne–animalaarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Ne–animalaarã kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa eperãarãkꞌa. Oopata ãchi kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tꞌopata eperãarãpa jita atadamerã mãikꞌaapa peedamerã. Mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ ma seewa jarateepataarã. Pedee kꞌachia jarapata ne–inaa jõma ãchia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ ãpɨte. Ma kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi jõpiitꞌee, eperãarãpa ne–animalaarã jõpipatakꞌa.
Mamĩda Judapa mãga jara–e paji chupɨria beerã kꞌaripa kꞌinia bada perã. Ma kꞌãyaara mãga jaraji nechɨayaa bada perã. Ichia ãra pꞌaratꞌa anipapachi mãikꞌaapa aɨdepema chɨa atapachi.

Mãgá tachia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa ijãa pꞌanɨ irua tachi kꞌinia iru bapari. Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bapari perã, eperãpa aukꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bakꞌãri, tꞌãri a–ba bapari iru ome.

Esteban piuda tꞌẽepai, Jesucristode ijãapataarã jɨrɨmaa pꞌanadakꞌãri peedaitꞌee, ũkꞌuru mirukꞌoodachida Fenicia eujãdee, Chipre isladee mãikꞌaapa Antioquía pꞌuurudee. Ãchi wãdapꞌedaa chaa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jarateepachida judiorãmaa aupai.
Jõdee Cristode wãara ijãapataarã nãga pꞌanapata: tꞌãri o–ĩa; kꞌãiwee; awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata. Pꞌaratꞌa iru pꞌanɨ jida wa wẽe pꞌanɨ pɨjida, aukꞌa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata.

Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ ichiakꞌau bɨda perã, jura chõo beeji Cristodeerã, chi atꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ome, ãra pꞌoyaarumaa. Ichiaba mãgá ichiakꞌau bɨda perã, mãgɨpa ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌe wãji eperãarã ëreerã chaadepema, pꞌuuru chaadepema, pedee chaadepema mãikꞌaapa eujã chaadepema.

Jõdee mãgá akꞌɨ–e paitꞌee parãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodapꞌeda, kꞌĩrau–ee chooruta pɨrã miapidakꞌãri ma kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda parã kꞌĩrau–ee chooruta pɨrã miapidakꞌãri ne–inaa pia oodapꞌedaa perã, mãgara Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌinia bairã, Cristo pëiji irua oomerã Akꞌõre Ũraa chiwidide jara bɨkꞌa. Mãgá chonaarãwedapema Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapatapꞌedaarãpa aukꞌa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee ne–inaa jõma irua kꞌĩsia iru bada ãchi–itꞌee. Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapiji ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa, tachide ome aukꞌa. Mãga ooji Cristo piuda perã jõmaarã pari, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe ichita pꞌanapataadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Parãdepemapa iidii: “Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨ bɨ pɨrã, ¿pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia waapɨara oodaipia bɨ–ekꞌã, mãgá Akꞌõrepa waapɨara tachi pia akꞌɨmerã?”

Ichiaba parãpa nãgee kꞌachia oopata apida oodaikꞌaraa bɨ: bɨsɨ pedeepata; pariatua pedeepata maa–e pɨrã bɨsɨ pedee pedeepata ëidamerã. Cristopa apidaamaa mãgá pedeepikꞌaa. Mãgá pedeedai kꞌãyaara, gracias jarapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa.

Akꞌɨkꞌãri, unuji caballo kꞌuarakꞌuaraa bɨ. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ bada Piuda apachida. Mãgɨ́ tꞌẽe cheda Piudaarã Pꞌanapatamãi apachida. Mãgɨɨrã juade Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã kꞌĩmariidepema chaa aba bɨji, ma eperãarã piudamerã jura chõo jõnɨpa, jarra oo jõnɨpa, kꞌayaapa mãikꞌaapa ne–animal kꞌachia beerãpa.

Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa, ichia Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee, ãrapa ijãapata perã Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa; ma kꞌaurepapai. Maperã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Abraham jõmaarã akꞌõchona, judiorã akꞌõchona mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã akꞌõchona, ijãadakꞌãri irua ijãadakꞌa.
Romadepemaarãpa mɨmaa iididakꞌãri kꞌãare kꞌachiata oo bɨ, kꞌena pëidaitꞌee paji, maarepida kꞌachia oo–e pada perã mɨ peedaitꞌee.

Mãga jarada perã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã jɨrɨtꞌerapari kꞌaripaitꞌee, ichia ãchi chupɨria kꞌawaa kꞌinia bairã. Jɨrɨtꞌera–e ãchia mãga kꞌinia pꞌanadairã maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa pia wa kꞌachia oo pꞌanadairã.
Ichiaba pariatua pꞌekꞌau oonáatɨ, ma kꞌaurepa ewari abaade Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãradepemaarã veintitrés mil kꞌiniipida perã.
Mamĩda mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa presokꞌa bɨ. Mãgɨ́ chõo pɨkꞌa bɨ mɨchi tꞌãri ome, atꞌãri mɨ chipari ba kꞌinia bairã.

Mapa oodáma Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa iru ũraa pipɨara kꞌawaa wãdáma. O–ĩa pꞌananaadáma tachimaa naapɨara jarateedapꞌedaa ome. Nãga jarateejida tachimaa: Eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaadaipia bɨ, ma kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã ichi bɨmãi tꞌĩupi–e paitꞌee perã. Ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëiji eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã, mãgá ãra pꞌanapataadamerã Akꞌõre truade iru ome, waa piuda–ee.
Iru oo iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara pia akꞌɨ pꞌanátɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripátɨ, o–ĩa chemerã apemaarã ijãapataarã ome mɨa nɨmaa bɨmãi.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌĩsíatɨ mɨa jararude. Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨda ai. Mamĩda mãgɨpa chĩara kꞌaripakꞌaa pɨrã Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, ichi kꞌinia mãga jara bɨ. Mãga jara bɨpapai ɨtꞌaa wã–e paitꞌee.
Maapai Jerusalén pꞌuurudepemaarãpa iidi para beeji: —¿Nãgɨ́ eperã–ekꞌã ajida, tachi poroorãpa jɨrɨmaa pꞌanɨ peetꞌaadaitꞌee?
Mãga jarapꞌeda, jãrapꞌuaji ãchi ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa mãgaji: —Akꞌõre Jaure auteebáitɨ, parã ome ba chemerã.
Kꞌawa kꞌiniadakꞌaa Akꞌõrepa Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe beepipari. Kꞌĩsiapata ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨitꞌee. Maperã Cristode ijãa kꞌiniada–e.

Mapa chi Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade ijãaparipa kꞌawa bɨ iru wãara Tachi Akꞌõre Warra, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepata ma eperã tꞌãride mãga kꞌawapipari perã. Mamĩda chi mãga ijãa–e bɨpa jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpimaa bɨ ichi kꞌĩsiade Tachi Akꞌõrepa seewa jara bɨ.
Mɨa wãarata jararu. Chi mɨde wãara ijãa bɨpa aukꞌa ooyada aji, mɨa ne–inaa oo bɨkꞌa. Ma awara ne–inaa pi–iara ooyada aji, mɨ wãitꞌee perã mɨ Akꞌõre bɨmaa.

Ũráaji esclavoorã ijãa pꞌanɨɨrãmaa: ãchi chipariirã jua ekꞌari chokꞌekꞌee pꞌaneedaipia bɨ; ne–inaa jõmaata tꞌãri pia oodaipia bɨ chipariirãpa oopi pꞌanɨkꞌa; pedee kꞌachia pꞌanaudaikꞌaraa bɨ mimiade chokꞌa pëidakꞌãri.

¡Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãa amaa pꞌaneedai Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëida, ichia tachi kꞌinia iru bairã! Ichiaba apidaapa ũridaikꞌaraa bɨ ijãa amaapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ Jesucristopa oodade. Ma jaratee pꞌanɨ neera kꞌachíakꞌata bɨ, todakꞌãri, chokꞌara peepari perã.

Ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari tꞌɨ̃ pia tꞌo pꞌanadaipia bɨ, Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa paara. Mãga–e pɨrã, Netuara Poro Waibɨapa iru ãpɨte ne–inaa kꞌachia nepɨrɨpii eperãarãmaa, jõmaarãpa ma kꞌaurepa iru pia–e akꞌɨdamerã.
Mamĩda tachi ijãapari chaa Cristopa ne–inaa pia awara–awaraa oo kꞌawaapipari, mãgá awaraarã kꞌaripadamerã. Tachi chaachaa aukꞌa oo kꞌawaapi–e. Oo kꞌawaapipari ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mãpai araarepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji pꞌusa jãde. Mãpai pania aɨde nɨ̃bɨ eperã piuda waakꞌa padachi. Mapa ne–inaa chokꞌai pꞌanadapꞌedaarã aɨde nɨ̃bɨ jõmaweda piudachida.

Edaare esclavo kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa mimiapari chiparipa akꞌɨ bɨ misa aupai, ichi mimiayaa bɨda amerã. Mamĩda parãpa mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara aukꞌa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa mimiapataadaipia bɨ, chipariirãpa akꞌɨda–e pꞌanɨ pɨjida. Mãgá tꞌãripa ichiaba oopatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, Cristo parã chipari jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã.

Mamĩda mãga óotɨ tꞌãri pia, audua–ee, Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepata perã. Ne–inaa pia aupaita oopatáatɨ. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanada–e paitꞌee. Ma awara parã ɨmɨateepataarãpa parã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, awaraarãpa ãchi kꞌĩra nejasiapidaitꞌee, parã wãara pꞌanapata perã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Mɨ Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ jõmaweda ichi Warra kꞌawa pꞌanɨɨrã mãikꞌaapa irude ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã. Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate mɨata mãgɨɨrã pꞌirabaipiitꞌee.
Aramata, angelpa Herodes kꞌayaapitꞌaaji, irua ɨtrɨa–e pada perã mãga jaradakꞌãri. Mapa mokꞌitꞌa kꞌida pꞌuapa piuji.
¡Wãara, Tachi Akꞌõre, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo Akꞌõre, jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ! Ichia tachi chupɨria kꞌawaapari mãikꞌaapa ichiata tachi tꞌãri o–ĩapipari.
Mamĩda ɨ̃rá jãpemaarã ũkꞌuruurãpa mãga ooda–e pꞌanɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara awaraa kꞌĩsia atajida. Mapa pariatua pedee wãpata.

Mɨ kꞌĩra nejasia–ee jarateeitꞌee Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre, ichi juapa aɨde ijãapataarã kꞌaripaitꞌee perã atuanaadamerã. Naapɨara mãga jara pëiji judiorãmaa mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃rá mãga ichiaba jara pëiru judio–eerãmaa.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrépata ichi Warra Jesucristo bɨda perã ma te choma te basakꞌa bamerã. Irua aupaita tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai. Mapa apidaapa awaraa basa jɨrɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Mapa waya jara kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa: Ɨmɨkꞌĩra chaa ichi wẽra kꞌinia iru baipia bɨ ichi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa. Jõdee wẽra chaa ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra waaweeipia bɨ ichi poro waibɨakꞌa.

Ma awara parã araa pꞌanapata perã Cristo ome, jaradai Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo chokꞌai bapikꞌãri, parã aukꞌa chokꞌai pꞌanapiji. Cristode ijãadai naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee parã piu pɨkꞌa pꞌanajida parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba piu pɨkꞌa pꞌanajida, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. ¡Mamĩda ɨ̃rá mãga pꞌanɨ–e! Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi ijãapataarã chokꞌai pꞌanapikꞌãri Cristo ome, tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jõmaweda wẽpapiji.

Kꞌirãpáji Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa jaradapꞌedaa pɨmaa, ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarãpa ãchi jua bɨdakꞌãri pɨ ɨ̃rɨ. Mãga oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ne–inaa oopiji pɨmaa kꞌawaamerã kꞌãare mimia ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mãga óoji Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Mãpai mɨa unuji pajã chiwidi mãikꞌaapa eujã chiwidi, naapema pajã mãikꞌaapa eujã pꞌusa ome jõdarida perã.
Ichita tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ.
Mãgá eperãarã kꞌaa jõnɨde, ma eperãarã audú piu kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee. Mamĩda piuda–e paitꞌee.

Mamĩda mãga–e tachi ijãapataarã ome, tachia ijãapata perã Jesús piupꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji. Mapa ijãa pꞌanɨ Jesús kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa irude ijãapataarã aukꞌa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee. Mãga ooitꞌee Jesús waya chekꞌãri ãchi jaureerã ome.
Mapa chi jara bɨpa Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra tꞌãri a–ba bapari Tachi Akꞌõre ome.

Ma kꞌaurepata kꞌawaajida parãpa naaweda oopatapꞌedaa kꞌachia baji Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mapa waa mãga pꞌanapataadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Oo amáatɨ parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌaurepa kꞌachiade pꞌanapachida mãikꞌaapa pãchi itu kꞌũrapipachida kꞌachia oo kꞌiniapa.

Mɨda aji, puertakꞌa bɨ. Mɨa eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atapari tꞌĩudamerã mɨchi jua ekꞌari mɨchideerã ome. Oveja akꞌɨpari pia bɨpa ichi ovejaarã akꞌɨparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa mɨchideerã akꞌɨpari mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripapari pia pꞌanapataadamerã.

Awaraarã mãupa batꞌa peejida maa–e pɨrã serruchopa esajĩakꞌa tꞌoopꞌe peejida. Ũkꞌuru peejida espadapa. Ũkꞌuru chupɨria oveja e maa–e pɨrã cabra e jɨ̃ nipapachida; jarra oopachida mãikꞌaapa chĩarapa ãra kꞌachia ooruta choopachida.
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesucristo, Tachi Akꞌõre Warrapa ichita oopari ichi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba kꞌawadaipia bɨ chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa aukꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre warra.

Mãga oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã: ‘Kꞌõpꞌãyoorã ome lámpara pëipatakꞌa ɨ̃daamerã ode pꞌãrikꞌua nipadakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa pɨ pëiru mɨ o akꞌɨpimerã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãmaa. Mɨa mãgá pëiru kꞌinia bairã pɨa chi tꞌɨmɨara beerã paara o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã.’ (Isaías 49.6)

Taipa oodaamaa pꞌanapata ne–inaa kꞌachia awaraarãpa mera oopata; ne–inaa eperãarã jĩpꞌaarã kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌanapata oodaitꞌee. Madepema ũkꞌuruurãpa imeraa jarateepata chĩara kꞌũradaitꞌee. Maa–e pɨrã ãchi kꞌĩsia pꞌoirapata Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨ ome, irua jara kꞌinia bɨ awara uchiamerã. Mamĩda taipa mãga ooda–e. Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jarateepata. Mãga oo pꞌanɨpa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite taipa wãarata jarateepata.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru ɨtꞌaa ateeji ichi juaraare akꞌɨ banamerã. Maapꞌeda ichia jaradakꞌa ichi Jaure teeji Jesumaa, irua pëimerã irude ijãapataarãmaa. Mãgɨta parãpa etꞌewa unujida mãikꞌaapa ũrijida.
Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌaneejida eperãarã chiwidi pꞌanɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre, tachi oodapa parã ichi kꞌĩrakꞌa papimerã. Mãga pꞌanadai iru wãara kꞌawa wãdakꞌãri.

Jesupa mãga ũrikꞌãri, mãgaji chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorãmaa: —Ma kꞌayaapa jai–idaaru pɨjida, chokꞌai pꞌirabaiitꞌee. Iru kꞌayaa bɨ eperãarãpa kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Warrapa ne–inaa jõma ooi ichi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga ookꞌãri, jarapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari eperãarã ome; chi Warra jida aukꞌa.

Mãgɨ́ jara pëida kꞌaurepa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarãpa kꞌawaadakꞌãri Cristopa ooda ãchi–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa irude ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpariitꞌee. Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã: ‘Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrede wãara ijãapari ichita bapariitꞌee iru ome, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bairã iru kꞌĩrapite.’ (Habacuc 2.4)
Jesumaa kuruso ateepidapꞌeda, uchiajida pꞌuurudeepa taawaa wãdaitꞌee “Tachi Poro Bɨɨrɨ” apatapꞌedaamaa. (Hebreo pedeede Gólgota apachida.)

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripakꞌãri, ne–inaa awara–awaraa oopata, irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa tachi chaachaa. Ichi ũraa jarapiru pɨrã tachidepema abaamaa, mãgɨpa mãga ooipia bɨ tꞌãripa, Akꞌõremaa kꞌaripa iidi bɨ misa.
Aba león kꞌĩrakꞌa baji; awaraa pꞌakꞌa chakꞌe kꞌĩrakꞌa; awaraa eperã kꞌĩrakꞌa mãikꞌaapa chi apema nejɨ̃pɨ wãabai wãkꞌa baji.
Maperã kꞌĩrakꞌaupai pꞌanadai kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapatáatɨ.

Mãga jara bairã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ judiorã, judio–eerã ome aukꞌa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Iruta Jõmaarã Waibɨa. Aukꞌa kꞌaripapari chi chupɨria iidirutaarã ichimaa, ãchi aukꞌa kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Mamĩda Cristopata ichideerã uchiapipari Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa, oopataadamerã irua jara bɨkꞌa. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari.
Makꞌɨara kꞌĩsianáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa jõma pꞌasarutade ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Mãgá ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ bɨde gracias jarátɨ irumaa mãikꞌaapa iidítɨ irua parã kꞌaripamerã.

Tachia mãgɨ́ chonaarãpa oodapꞌedaade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawaadaipia bɨ ãrapa oodapꞌedaa kꞌachia baji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mapa kꞌĩrakꞌaupai mãgá oodai ãrapa oodapꞌedaakꞌa. ¡Oonaadáma tachia ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa!
Ma uria tꞌai ewakꞌãri, narira uchia nɨ̃beeji, nari waibɨa uchiaparikꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau waibɨadeepa. Ma nari kꞌaurepa pꞌãriudachi. Akꞌõrejĩru mãikꞌaapa pajã perá unu–e paji nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa nɨ̃bɨpa.
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai pãchi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌũradai, mãga oo pꞌanɨpa ãchi wẽraarã ome. Mãgá kꞌachia ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã miapiitꞌee, taipa naaweda jaradapꞌedaakꞌa.

Eperã araa bakꞌãri Cristo ome ijãapari perã irude, mãgɨ́ eperã tꞌãri awaradaipari. ¡Pia kꞌĩsíatɨ! Cristode ijãai naaweda, ma eperã kꞌachiade nipapachi. Mamĩda irude ijãadakꞌãriipa waa mãgá nipa kꞌinia–e. Jĩpꞌa nipa kꞌinia bɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mãga bɨ chi Akꞌõrepa ichi Warra kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Mapa jõma ichia oo bɨ akꞌɨpipari chi Warramaa. Wãara na ewari ne–inaa pi–iara akꞌɨpiitꞌee chi warramaa. Mãga unudakꞌãri, parã pꞌera pɨkꞌa para beeitꞌee.
Ichiaba mɨa jara bɨ chi nechɨayaa bɨmaa waa nechɨanaamerã. Ma kꞌãyaara mimia piata ooipia bɨ, ne–inaa iru bamerã pɨchi juadoopa. Mãgá pɨa chupɨria chedeerãmaa teei.

Mãga oo bɨ misa, cuarto awara bɨ́ji mɨ–itꞌee, mɨ jãma panakꞌãri. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ ijãa bairã parã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ uchiapiitꞌee na carceldeepa mãikꞌaapa waya pëiitꞌee parãmaa.

Parãmaa naawedapema jarateepataarãpa jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëiji eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atade, tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Ma wãara perã, tꞌãripa waapɨara ijãadáma irude. Ijãanáatɨ awaraa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo jarateepataarã pedee. Mãɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌaripapari kꞌo pꞌanadairã ne–animalaarã peedapꞌeda, paadapꞌedaa altarde. Mamĩda mãga oo bɨpa apida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bakꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, taipa enenee jõnɨ waaweedamerã pãchi ijãapataarã poro waibɨarã, ãchi audú mimiapata perã parã–itꞌee. Ãchia parã ũraapata mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨpata Tachi Waibɨapa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Chi akꞌõreerãpa mãga jarajida judiorã waidoopa. Aɨ naaweda judiorã poro waibɨarãpa pedeeteejida chi eperã Jesús Mesías aru pɨrã, waa tꞌĩupida–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede.

Tachia, jõdee, ne–inaa piara iru pꞌanɨ tauchaa iru pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara tachi kꞌapꞌɨade, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure bapari perã tachi tꞌãride. Iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõremaa mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata Jesucristodeerã perã. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi piara akꞌɨ–e paitꞌee tauchaa bɨpiruta pɨrã tachi kꞌapꞌɨade. Mapa jɨrɨpata oodaitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa, jɨrɨdai kꞌãyaara ne–inaa eperãarãpa jɨrɨpata pia pꞌanadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ tachia nãga oodamerã: Ijãadaipia bɨ Jesucristo wãara Tachi Akꞌõre Warra mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ irua jaradakꞌa.
Ma tꞌẽepai mɨa unuji awaraa ne–animal kꞌachia eujãdeepa uchiaru. Cacho omé iru baji Oveja Chakꞌepa iru baparikꞌa. Mamĩda pedeepachi je choma pedeeparikꞌa.
Maperã ɨ̃pemaarã, warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsianáatɨ. Ãrakꞌa pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, pꞌanadaipia bɨ warra ewaa tꞌodakꞌa; audua–ee. Pia kꞌĩsíatɨ chonaarãpa kꞌĩsiapatakꞌa.
Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, parãdepema aba chupɨria nɨ̃bakꞌãri, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ipia bɨ. Jõdee o–ĩa bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌariipia bɨ.
Maperã tꞌãridepai choopatáatɨ ijãa pꞌanɨde. Parã ũkꞌuru pꞌirapataarã́kꞌata pꞌanɨ. Mãɨrã ĩyapaadaidakꞌãri, juatau tꞌũmaadaipata mãikꞌaapa bɨɨrɨ wëredaipata. ¡Mãgá pꞌananáatɨ!

Tachi Akꞌõre, “Akꞌõreda” a pꞌanɨ pɨrã, iru waaweedaipia bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa kꞌĩra tewaraarãkꞌa. Iru waaweedaipia bɨ irua jõmaarãpa ne–inaa oopata aukꞌa akꞌɨpari perã jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.
Mapa choo pꞌanapatáatɨ pãchi ijãa pꞌanɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oodaitꞌee. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, unudaitꞌee jõma irua jarada teeitꞌee parãmaa.
¿Kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨma Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari? Ijãapata perã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ wãarata uchiaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, waide mãga unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Tachi Waibɨapa mɨmaa nãga jarapiru. Waa pꞌananáatɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa. Ãchi pariatua kꞌĩsiapata.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma jõma ooda perã tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee, kꞌĩsianáatɨ awaraarãpa parã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jararuta pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌopata kꞌaurepa maa–e pɨrã topata kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba kꞌĩsianáatɨ mãga ooruta pɨrã, parãpa ɨada–e pꞌanadairã ewari, atane mãikꞌaapa año, ãrapa ma ɨ̃ipata ewate mãikꞌaapa fiesta ewate ɨapatakꞌa.

‘Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ pꞌanɨ. Ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida ãchia oopata Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ichi ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨade. Ma rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨpa ãra ichita akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee, ichita ãra ome bapariitꞌee perã.
Mãpai Pablo ɨrabaipꞌeda, ma kꞌũtrãa kꞌapꞌɨa wëre ataji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa: —¡Pꞌeranáatɨ! ¡Iru chokꞌai bɨpɨ!

Maperãpɨ mɨa ne–inaa jõma choopari, mia nɨ̃bɨ mĩda. Mãgá choopari eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌerada Jesucristode ijãadamerã, o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadamerã mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌanapataadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree eujãde.
Chikꞌinia saludaa para bátɨ. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ parã Cristodeerã jõmaarã pari, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã. Mãgapai paji.
Akꞌɨpidaitꞌee Cristo wãara pãchi poro waibɨa, ũripatáatɨ awaraa ijãapataarãpa ũraa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa oopatáatɨ ãrapa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, ɨ̃rá parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanadairã mãgee seewa jarateepataarã uchiadaitꞌee ijãapataarã tꞌãide, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãadai ãrapa jarateepata. Ichiaba kꞌĩrakꞌaupai oodai ãrapa oopatakꞌa, oodakꞌaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa. Ɨ̃rá parãpa pia ijãapata. Mamĩda kꞌũrapiruta pɨrã ãramaa, parã ãyaa atadaridai Cristo ikꞌaawaapa.
Wẽraarã, ɨmɨkꞌĩra paraa beerã, chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanapatáatɨ pãchi kꞌima ome, Tachi Waibɨapa kꞌinia bairã wẽraarã irude ijãa pꞌanɨ mãga pꞌanapataadamerã.
Mamĩda ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã kꞌachiade baai jõnaruta pɨrã, jõmaarã taide ɨtrɨakꞌóoji. Mãgá awaraarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–e paitꞌee waaweepa.
Maperã akꞌɨnaadáma awaraa ijãapataarãpa oopata pedee kꞌachia pedeedaitꞌee ãra ãpɨte. Ma kꞌãyaara jõma óotɨ awaraa ijãapataarã pipɨara ijãadamerã, mãikꞌaapa oodamerã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Jõdee pia oopataarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanadaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨitꞌee perã mãikꞌaapa ichi trua kꞌĩra wãreedee wãpiitꞌee perã. Mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee naapɨara judiorã, maapꞌeda judio–eerã.

Awaraarã tꞌɨpɨtaudeepa paa–ee uchiajida; awaraarã chokꞌai uchiajida espadapa pee kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaarã juadeepa; ũkꞌuru juatau tꞌũmaa pꞌanadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa juataura papiji; awaraarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa sõcharra papipꞌeda, chõojida ãchi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã ome; ũkꞌuruurãpa ãchi eujãdeepa jërekꞌoojida awaraa eujãdepema chõode chedapꞌedaarãpa.
Mãpai na pedeepapai na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã aupaitꞌee. Waa apidaapa mɨ ome nepɨra jɨrɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mɨ kꞌapꞌɨade jidikꞌada–idaa unurutapa kꞌawaadai mɨa oopari Jesucristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Mãpai ángel juataura bɨpa mãu tapɨa kꞌũrumakꞌa bɨ jira ataji mãikꞌaapa batꞌatꞌaaji pꞌusade. Maapꞌeda mãgaji: —Jãgá pɨ baaiitꞌee, pꞌuuru waibɨa Babilónia. Pɨ waa unudakꞌaa paitꞌee.

Jõdee parã, ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mãga pꞌanadakꞌaa. Mapa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapatáatɨ waapɨara Cristode ijãadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pipɨara kꞌawaadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata pedee jara pëida. Ma awara ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Oonáatɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa oopatakꞌa. Mãɨrãpa kꞌĩsiapata ãchia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨdepai. Parã jõdee, kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgá kꞌawaadaitꞌee Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ ne–inaa pia, kꞌachia wẽe; ne–inaa irua pia akꞌɨpari.
Mãga ooji mɨ jõmaweda apemaarã pëida kꞌãyaara ekꞌariara bɨ mĩda. Mɨ–itꞌee piara bakꞌaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌera–e pada paara, mɨa Cristode ijãapataarã miapipachi perã.
Pꞌananáatɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã pꞌanapatakꞌa. Jɨrɨnáatɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo na pꞌekꞌau eujãde paraa. Mãga jɨrɨruta pɨrã, chikꞌinia pꞌanada–e pai Tachi Akꞌõre ome.

Mãgee kꞌachia oopataarã akꞌɨkꞌãri, parãdepema abaapa kꞌĩsiai: “Mɨa mãga oo–e pakꞌaji”. Mamĩda pɨa pida ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Maperã kꞌĩrakꞌaupai jarai Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee kꞌachia oopataarã miapiipia bɨ. Aukꞌa Akꞌõrepa pɨ miapii, pɨa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.

Kꞌawaadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãara mɨ kꞌaripa bɨ judio–eerãmaa jarateenamerã, Santiago, Pedro Juan ome, chi ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã waibɨarãda apata, ãchi jua teejida mɨmaa mãikꞌaapa Bernabemaa. Mãga oojida akꞌɨpidaitꞌee aukꞌa kꞌõpꞌãyoorãkꞌa taipa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee judio–eerã tꞌãide jarateedaipia bɨ. Jõdee ãchia judiorã tꞌãide jarateedai.
Soldaorãpa Jesús kurusode baijira bɨdapꞌeda mãikꞌaapa iru pꞌaru atadapꞌeda, ãchi kꞌĩmariirãmaa jedetꞌaajida. Mamĩda chi edupema pꞌaru teesoo baji, kꞌaatꞌɨ–ee; jĩpꞌa kꞌa baji.

Parãpa awaraarãmaa jarateepata Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oodaipia bɨ. ¿Mãga–ekꞌã? Mamĩda parãpa pida ooda–e pꞌanɨ ma pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Ũraapata awaraarãmaa nechɨanaadamerã. Mamĩda edaare parãpa mãga oopata.
¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa Akꞌõre Jaure tachi kꞌapꞌɨade bapari, Tachi Akꞌõre ichi te waibɨade baparikꞌa? Mapa Tachi Akꞌõreta tachi kꞌapꞌɨa chipari.

Jesucristopa tai kꞌinia iru bapari. Maperãpɨ tai jaratee nipapata irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Wãara na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bapari perã, kurusode piuji tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mãgá piuji jõmaarã kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ara Cristo piudakꞌa jõmaarã pari, iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari eperã chaachaa piu pɨkꞌaji.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi awara bɨda perã ichi ome ɨtꞌari pꞌanapataadamerã, kꞌĩsíatɨ Jesucristopa oo bɨde tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pëiji jarateemerã iru ũraa chiwidi mãikꞌaapa Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨakꞌa ɨtꞌaa iidipariimerã tachi pari, irude ijãapata perã.
Mɨa parãmaa atꞌapai jarateedoo, aukꞌa mimiadamerã mãikꞌaapa chikꞌaripa para bamerã. Kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesupa jarada: “Pipɨara bɨ teeitꞌee, jitai kꞌãyaara.”

Miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarã ome kꞌãináatɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bairã chi miakꞌãidapa awaraa iru baikꞌaraa bɨ. Ichiaba tuu bɨpa awaraarã jɨrɨikꞌaraa bɨ mãɨrã ome kꞌãiitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa chi mãga oo pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌachia ooitꞌeeda a bɨ.
Ɨ̃jaabaikꞌãri akꞌɨitꞌee edaa, chi pꞌaru aupai unuji. Mamĩda tꞌĩu–e paji.

Mãga jararude pa baaiji, pa jĩwaa nɨ̃baji mãikꞌaapa awẽrachaipa na pꞌekꞌau eujã golpe wëretꞌaaji. Audú golpe wëreji. Eperãarã na eujãde pꞌaneedakꞌãriipa awẽrachai apida ma kꞌãyaara golpeera wëre–e paji.

Mɨa mãga ũrikꞌãri, bedabaidachi ma ángel kꞌĩrapite irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃itꞌee. Mamĩda ichia mãgaji: —¡Jãga oonáaji! Mɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mimiapari pɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa pɨ ɨ̃pemaarãkꞌa; chi awaraarãmaa jarapataarãpa Jesupa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõremaa aupaita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃páde aji. Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepata Jesupa ooda jarapi bɨ iru pedee jarapataarãmaa.
Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdakꞌãri, kꞌawada–e pꞌanapachida irua kꞌĩsia iru bada. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ne–inaa jõma kꞌawapari perã, mãgɨ́ kꞌĩsia paara tachimaa kꞌawapii.
Iru o–ĩa auteebáitɨ Cristodeerãpa ãchi ɨ̃pemaarã auteebaidaipia bɨkꞌa. Iru mãikꞌaapa iru jĩakꞌaarã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanátɨ.
Warrarã, ichita oopatáatɨ pãchi akꞌõreerãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bairã mãga oodamerã.

Parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa jara pꞌanɨ taipa eperãarã kꞌũra nipapata. Mamĩda mãga–e. Tai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ jõmaarã tꞌãide jaratee nipadakꞌãri, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapata perã. Mãgá nipajida parã tꞌãide. Audua nipadakꞌaa paji parãpa kꞌĩsiadamerã tai kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara pꞌanɨ awaraarã kꞌãyaara. Mãga–e. Parã tꞌãide tꞌãri pia pꞌanapachida, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripa bada perã. Mãga ooji ichia tai kꞌinia iru bapari perã.

Chi mɨ ũraa ũri bɨpa mãikꞌaapa oo bɨpa ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa wãara mɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ. Mɨ Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ eperã ichiaba kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee. Ma awara mɨa pida iru kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa irumaa unupiitꞌee.

Ũkꞌuruurãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ jĩpꞌa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daikꞌaraa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa, tachi audú kꞌachia pꞌanadairã. Ichiaba jaratee pꞌanɨ tachi kꞌapꞌɨa pia akꞌɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ, makꞌɨara pia–e bairã. Wãara eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa mãgee ne–inaa jaratee pꞌanɨ pia akꞌɨpata, pia pɨkꞌa ũripata perã. Mamĩda tachia jõma ooruta pɨjida mãɨrãpa jaratee pꞌanɨkꞌa, atꞌãri uchiada–e pai tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌariipa. Cristopapai tachi mãgɨdeepa uchiapii.

Mapa nama chedakꞌãri, jõmaarã ijãapataarã taide nepɨrɨpata pɨa ãra kꞌaripada, ãra kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Mãgá kꞌaripaparíiji ãchi ode pia wãdamerã. Ãra kꞌaripáji Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, ãrapa iru mimia oomaa pꞌanadairã.
Aupedeenáaji kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã ome, pariatua pedee wãpata perã. Pɨa kꞌawa bɨ mãga ooru pɨrã, nepɨra jɨrɨdai pɨ ome.

Mãgá ma naawedapema ũraa jua ekꞌariipa tachi uchiadapꞌedaa perã, tachi tꞌãri waa wãkꞌa pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ–e. Ara espejode tachi kꞌĩra unuparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree unupata iru ũraa chiwidi jara pëidade Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ma awara Cristo Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa oodakꞌãri, tꞌãri pia padaipata irukꞌa. Waapɨara iru Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa oodai, waapɨara tꞌãri pia padaridai irukꞌa.

Mamĩda Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa pipɨara oopari. Cristopa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia maarepida oo–e paji mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa kꞌaripaji iru tachi pari piumerã. Mãgá iru waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapipari ne–inaa kꞌachia jõmaweda tachi atuapipari, ne–inaa tachi kꞌĩsia pꞌuapipari paara. Tachi Akꞌõre ichita baparipa mãga oopari kꞌinia bairã tachia irude ijãapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa oopataadamerã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Mãgá mɨa kꞌawaaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ba chepi kꞌinia bɨ ãra ome tachi ome ba chepidakꞌa, aukꞌa ijãapata perã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode. Mãga bɨta ¿sãga mɨa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda kꞌachia bɨda ayama? aji.

Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure tꞌãri pꞌuapináatɨ, parãpa mãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨpa. Kꞌirãpátɨ iru kꞌaurepata kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi Tachi Akꞌõredeerã. Iruta tachi ome bapariitꞌee na eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨadeepa uchiarutamaa Cristo cheru ewate.

Kꞌĩsíatɨ parãpa naaweda ũridapꞌedaade Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jaratee chedakꞌãri. Parãpa ma jarateedapꞌedaa ijãajida. Mapa ɨ̃rá oopatáatɨ ma jaradakꞌa. Parãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amáatɨ. Mãga ooda–e pɨrã, atu bɨde nechɨapari cheparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ cheitꞌee. Parãpa kꞌawada–e ewari mɨ cheitꞌee parã miapide.
Warrarã, kꞌũrapináatɨ apida seewapataarãmaa. Chi ooparipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa tꞌãri pia bapari Tachi Akꞌõrekꞌa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde seewa–idaa beerã chokꞌara paraa. Mãɨrãpa “Tai Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepataarãda” apata mĩda, ijãanáatɨ ãchia jara pꞌanɨ. Pia ũridaipia bɨ jõmaarãpa jaramaa pꞌanɨ, kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara jara pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa wa mãga–e.
Maperãpɨ, tachi aukꞌaarã, kꞌawaadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapipari Jesús piuda kꞌaurepa.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ, Tachi Waibɨa parã ome bapari perã. Ɨ̃rá mɨa parãmaa waya ũraaitꞌee naaweda ũraadakꞌa. Sẽ–ee mãga ooi, parãpa waya ũridaipia pꞌanadairã. Nãgá ũraa bɨpa mɨa parã kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ apidaamaa kꞌũrapinaadamerã.
Apida jarrapisia bɨ pɨrã, chei naaweda, ichi temãi nekꞌoipia bɨ. Parãpa mãga ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa miapi–e paitꞌee pariatua kꞌo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Mɨ parãmaa wãkꞌãri, waapɨara jarateeitꞌee.

Mãpai Pilatopa mãgaji: —Mãgara pãchia atadarítɨ mãikꞌaapa iru akꞌɨ́tɨ pãchi ũraade jara bɨkꞌa. Maapꞌeda óotɨ pãchia oo kꞌiniata. Mamĩda ma judiorãpa pꞌanaujida: —Pãchi Romadepemaarã ũraade jara bɨ tai judiorãpa chĩara peedaikꞌaraa bɨ irua ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa.
Maperã parãpa iididaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parãmaa madepema pipɨara bɨta bɨmerã. Mãgá pipɨara pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Mãgá oo pꞌanɨ mĩda, mɨa akꞌɨpiitꞌee sãga wãara pipɨara pꞌanapataadai.

Nãgɨ́ Jesús Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa tachia kꞌinia pꞌanɨ. Irua pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ookꞌaa, kꞌachia wẽe bairã. Kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiakꞌaa. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bakꞌãri, bapachi mĩda eperãarã kꞌachia oopataarã tꞌãide, mãgá ookꞌaa paji. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara papiji.
Mɨa ne–inaa jõma ooi Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari, irua mɨ kꞌaripapari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ awara pꞌanapataadamerã ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌãyaara. Kꞌinia bɨ parãpa ne–inaa jõmaweda oodamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa taipa nãga ũraa pꞌanɨ. Pꞌekꞌau oonáatɨ awaraarã ome.
Ɨ̃rá parã jõmaarãmaa mɨa ũraaitꞌee: Ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai kꞌĩra atuadai ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee. Parã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌanɨde ichita gracias jarapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa.
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, Moisés mirudachi. Maapꞌeda tꞌɨmɨ́ wãji Madián eujãdee. Mama banaji kꞌĩra tewaraakꞌa. Ariipema wẽra atapꞌeda, warrarã omé paraaji.

Pia jaraitꞌeera, ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi poro wãkꞌaikꞌaraa bɨ ichi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrakꞌa bairã mãikꞌaapa ichi Tachi Akꞌõrepa bɨda perã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nɨ̃bɨ poro waibɨa bamerã. Jõdee wẽrapa ichi poro wãkꞌaipia bɨ akꞌɨpiitꞌee ɨmɨkꞌĩra ichi poro waibɨa.

Oopítɨ Cristomaa irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pãchi tꞌãride. Irua parã tꞌãri o–ĩapi kꞌinia bɨ, kꞌãiwee para bamerã. Ma–itꞌeeta Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨji, kꞌapꞌɨa apai pɨkꞌa, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã. Mapa gracias jarapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa.

Ne–inaa jõma nɨ̃bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Ichiata pia kꞌĩsia iru baji ichi Warra piuda kꞌaurepa awaraa warrarã chokꞌara ichi ome pꞌanapataadamerã, ichi eujã kꞌĩra wãree bɨde. Mapa chi Warra chupɨria piupiji. Cristopa jõma ooji ichi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa, mia nɨ̃baji mĩda mãga ooitꞌee. Mapa ichia wãara Tachi Akꞌõre o akꞌɨpii eperãarãmaa, aɨde tꞌĩudapꞌeda, ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã.

Ma kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ mãga bapari mĩda, parãdepema chokꞌara kꞌãiwee pꞌanadakꞌaa. ¿Wãara–ekꞌã? Aupedee para bapari mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩrau para bapari, pãchi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru pꞌanadairã. ¿Kꞌãare kꞌaurepata mãga para bapari? ¿Pãchia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa–ekꞌã?
Ɨ̃rá mɨa jaraitꞌee mɨmaa nepɨrɨdapꞌedaa. Parã tꞌãide abaapa ichi nawekꞌaa chi wẽrakꞌa iru bɨ. ¡Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa pida mãgee kꞌachia oodakꞌaa!

Edaare tachi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsia pꞌaneepata ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee. Ma awara netuarapa kꞌĩsiapipari ne–inaa kꞌachia oodamerã. Mãga pꞌasapari jõmaarã ome. Mamĩda mãga pꞌasakꞌãri parã ome, ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripaitꞌee choodamerã, kꞌachia ooda–ee.
Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ ne–animal kꞌachia beerã atu chepatakꞌa eperãarã peede, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ nãikꞌaapa wãda tꞌẽepai awaraarã chedaitꞌee Cristode ijãapataarã ijãa amaapide.

Mãgá pꞌanapata perã, taipa mãga o–ĩa nepɨrɨpata awaraa Akꞌõrede ijãapataarãmaa, ãra tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri. Nepɨrɨpata sãga parã choopata Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde. Mãgá choopata ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa parã jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda miapidaitꞌee, ma ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba mãgá choopata chupɨria chitoonɨ mĩda.

Apidaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuda–e pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda tachi chikꞌinia pꞌanaruta pɨrã, tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Mãgá tachi kꞌapꞌɨa pari irua jõmaarãmaa unupiitꞌee wãara irua ãra jida kꞌinia iru bapari.

Mɨ, Pablopa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãru parã Galacia eujãdepema Cristode ijãapataarãmaa. Eperãarãpa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌerada–e paji. Ichiaba mɨ pëida–e paji. Tachi Akꞌõre, Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipidapata mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji mãikꞌaapa Cristopa mɨ pëiji.

Parãpa kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ Jesús chupɨria nɨ̃bada ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌaurepa. Ãchia ijãadaamaa pꞌanajida irua ooda unudakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa irua jarada ũridakꞌãri. Mãgá oojida mĩda, iru choopachi. Mãgá parã aukꞌa choodaipia bɨ irude ijãa pꞌanɨde. Sẽdaikꞌaraa bɨ mãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaa choo–eda adaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Cristo ome araa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, tachi aukꞌa piu pɨkꞌajida pɨrã iru ome, mãgara aukꞌa pꞌirabaidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa iru ome pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapataadaitꞌee, irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Awara ãi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade ichiaba jara bɨ: ‘Awaraa eujãdepemaarã, o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ Tachi Akꞌõre eperãarã ome.’ (Deuteronomio 32.43)

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jĩpꞌa jara bɨ: Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate pai naaweda, eperãarã ũkꞌuru ma wãarade ijãa amaadaitꞌee. Cristode ijãadai kꞌãyaara, kꞌũrapidaitꞌee netuaraarãmaa mãikꞌaapa ijãadaitꞌee ma netuaraarãpa jarateepirutade.

Kꞌirãpapíji jãpema ijãapataarãmaa ãra ichiaba pꞌanapata Creta isladepema poro waibɨarã jua ekꞌari. Maperã oodaipia bɨ mãgɨ́ poroorãpa oopi pꞌanɨkꞌa. Ichita oo kꞌinia pꞌanadaipia bɨ ne–inaa pia awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee.
Mãɨrãpa mãga jarapata kꞌirãpa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa naaweda ooda. Ichi pedeepapai pajã beeji mãikꞌaapa aukꞌa ichi pedeepapai pania ũkꞌuru ãyaa pëiji eujã uchiamerã paniadeepa.

Ichiaba Cristo miaji piukꞌãri tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee. Iru pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe baji mĩda, piuda aba piuji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã pari, mãgá tachi ijãapataarã tꞌĩudamerã Tachi Akꞌõre ode iru ome. Eperãarãpa iru peejida. Mamĩda aramata Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure waya araa paji iru jaure ome.

Piara bakꞌaji kꞌawada–e pada paara sãga pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, mãga kꞌawa pꞌanadapꞌeda, uchiadai kꞌãyaara iru jua ekꞌariipa, ijãadaamaa pꞌanadairã irua ũraa pia jara pëida eperãarãmaa.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa jara pëiru ichide ijãapataarã mimiadaipia bɨ, taipa naaweda jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa. Ijãaparipa ma ũraa ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, iru ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pꞌanéetɨ.

Adanpa oodade kꞌĩsiadáma. Chi naapema eperãpa naapɨara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooji, oo–e pada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa. Piuji ma kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa. Ma kꞌachia oodakꞌãriipa jõmaweda ichideepa uchiadapꞌedaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo pꞌaneejida. Mãgá Adanpa naapɨara kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, maadamãiipa eperãarã piupata.

Mãgɨɨrãpa ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌaripaji nãga oodamerã. Ũkꞌuru jura chõo pꞌoyaajida; awaraarãpa pia akꞌɨjida ãchi jua ekꞌari pꞌanadapꞌedaarã; awaraarãpa unujida Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌeeda ada ãchi chonaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee; awaraarãpa león itꞌai jɨ̃apijida, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripapꞌeda;
Edaare awaraarãpa tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai atabaibëikꞌaa. Ichiaba edaare tai pꞌua oopata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripapari chokꞌai uchiadamerã ãchi juadeepa.

Pãchia oo kꞌiniata oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌiniada–e. Ara wẽrapa chi kꞌima amaaparikꞌa awaraa ome banaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa parãpa oodaamaa pꞌanɨ ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨ, oonadaitꞌee irude ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa oopatakꞌa. ¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã mãga oodakꞌãri, tꞌĩu pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã eere?
Ma wãrutade wãyaajida Frigia eujãde mãikꞌaapa Galacia eujãde, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarateepi–e pada perã Ásia eujãde.

Mamĩda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe beerã Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, mãgɨɨrãpa aukꞌa jaradai Moisepa jaradakꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa: ‘Kꞌĩsianáatɨ pãchi tꞌãridepai: “¿Kꞌaita wãima Akꞌõre eujãdee irua kꞌinia bɨ kꞌawaade?” ’ (Deuteronomio 30.12) (pia jaraitꞌeera, Cristo chemerã Akꞌõre eujãdeepa.)

Aramãgá ma naapɨara ángel wãji mãikꞌaapa ichi vasode iru bada wetꞌaaji eujã ɨ̃rɨ. Mãpai eperãarã jõmaweda ma nemĩsia kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaarã mãikꞌaapa ichi tauchaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã kꞌayaadachida ne–inaa kꞌachiapa aida–idaa bɨkꞌa. Mãgɨpa ãchi audú mia pꞌaneepachida, pꞌua nɨ̃bada perã.

Mãga ookꞌãri, ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨɨrã kꞌĩmari weda mãikꞌaapa ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro weda bedabaidachida iru kꞌĩrapite. Ma chonaa chaachaa iru baji arpa mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌu nẽedee ooda. Ma pꞌaratꞌu chaa ipuru baji ne–inaa bajũbakꞌa tꞌũa bɨpa. Mãgɨ́ jara kꞌinia bɨ Cristodeerãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata.

Jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre warrarãpa nãga ijãapata: Jesús, Cristo, ichi aɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida eperãarã rey pamerã. Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperã abaapa awaraa eperã kꞌinia iru bakꞌãri, ma eperã warrarã paara kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee.
Tachi kꞌinia nãga pꞌananaadáma: audua; pedee–idaa; nepɨra jɨrɨyaa; chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa ne–inaa iru bɨ kꞌaurepa.
Ijãapataarã tꞌãidepema chonaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooru pɨrã, ɨtrɨanáaji. Ma kꞌãyaara pedéeji iru ome, pɨchi akꞌõre ome pedeeparikꞌa. Jõdee, kꞌũtrãarã ũráaji pɨchi ɨ̃pemaarã ũraakꞌajikꞌa.

Ma kꞌãyaara ãchi tꞌãide kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Mãgá pꞌanaruta pɨrã, ãchia “kꞌachia beerãda” aruta pɨjida parã ãpɨte, unudaitꞌee parãpa ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre cheru ewate jaradaitꞌee iruata parãmaa mãga oopiji.

Maapai ne–inaa jõma aukꞌa ooji ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe ba kꞌinia bada perã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mãgá audú ijãa bada perã tai judiorãpa ijãapatade, mɨa Cristode ijãapataarã jɨrɨji miapiitꞌee.
Ichia iidikꞌãri chisãgɨ́ horade jɨpa beeji, pꞌanaujida: —Nuweda la una kꞌɨamia tuu beejida ajida.

Ma ewate Pascua fiesta ɨ̃ipata ewate norema paji. Judiorãpa mãgɨ́ ewate ɨapata perã, kꞌiniada–e pꞌanajida piuda kꞌapꞌɨa kurusode pꞌaneedamerã. Maperã iidijida Pilatomaa kurusode pꞌanadapꞌedaarã jĩru kꞌõrapikꞌoomerã, mãgá isapai piudamerã. Mãgá chi piuda kꞌapꞌɨa kurusodeepa ɨrabai atapidai.

Maadakꞌãriipa Pilatopa kꞌĩsiapachi sãga Jesús kꞌena pëii. Mamĩda judiorãpa biapachida: —¡Jãgɨ́ eperã peepi–e pɨrã, pɨ César kꞌõpꞌãyo–eda! apachida. ¡Eperãpa ichi reyda a bɨ pɨrã, mãgɨpa César kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨda! ajida.
—Kꞌĩsia paraa pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ijãapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrede mãikꞌaapa mɨde.

Mãga oo pꞌanɨ misa, mɨa ichiaba ũri kꞌinia bɨ parã maarepida waawee–ee pꞌanɨ, Cristo kꞌaurepa parã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa parã jɨrɨdakꞌãri miapidaitꞌee. Mãgá waawee–ee choodakꞌãri, parã kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãɨrãmaa kꞌawapiitꞌee ãchi atuadaitꞌee. Jõdee parãmaa kꞌawapiitꞌee parã ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee, wãara ichideerã perã.

Parãpa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌerada–e paji. Mɨata parã jɨrɨtꞌeraji mãikꞌaapa awara bɨji mɨ ũraa jarateenadamerã. Mãgá parã kꞌaurepa eperãarãpa ma ũraa ũridapꞌeda, mɨde ijãadai mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌanapataadai mɨ ome. Ma awara ma jarateenadapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa parãpa mɨ tꞌɨ̃de ne–inaa iididakꞌãri mɨ Akꞌõremaa mɨchideerã perã, irua ooitꞌee parãpa iidi pꞌanɨkꞌa.

Abelpa ijãa bada perã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa ne–inaa pipɨara teeji Caínpa teeda kꞌãyaara. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia akꞌɨji Abelpa teeda mãikꞌaapa irumaa jaraji: “Pɨ pia bapari mɨ kꞌĩrapite.” Abel piuji mĩda, atꞌãri tachimaa kꞌawaapipari Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa oodaipia bɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Parãpa tai Cristo–itꞌee mimiapataarãkꞌa iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ, iruata tai jarateede pëida perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada; ne–inaa eperãarãmaa naaweda jara–e pada.
Lucero pajãdeepa jurrukꞌoodachida na eujãde, higojõ chikꞌaa jurrupatakꞌa higuera bɨɨrɨdeepa nãumia pꞌuakꞌãri.
Maperã, ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, parãpa kꞌĩsiaruta pɨrã wãdaitꞌee awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apata kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de, ¡mãgá oonáatɨ!
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ne–inaa kꞌachia oodai. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌachia pꞌoyáatɨ ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨpa.

Mɨa jara bɨ kꞌirãpapíji ijãapataarãmaa. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite ũráaji aupedeenaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida pedee jara kꞌinia bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, apemaarã maarepida kꞌaripada–e pꞌanɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ijãa amaapi pꞌanɨ ãchia jara pꞌanɨ ũrirutaarãmaa.

Parãdepema ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨɨrãpa jarátɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa jõma kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa, irua mãgɨ́ wẽpapikꞌoomerã. Maapꞌeda kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo amáatɨ. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri, irua waya ũriipɨ. Ichiaba pariatua kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨɨrãpa mãga oodaipia bɨ. Mãgeerã eda kꞌĩsiapata “mɨa ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa” mãikꞌaapa eda kꞌĩsiapata “mɨa ooitꞌee mɨchia oo kꞌiniata”. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá pariatua kꞌĩsiapikꞌaa.

Mãgá parãpa eperãarã ũkꞌuru akꞌɨ pꞌanɨ pɨrã pãchi kꞌapꞌɨa akꞌɨpatakꞌa, mamĩda mãga ooda–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã jõmaarã ome, kꞌachiata oomaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mãgá oodakꞌãri, ooda–e pꞌanɨ iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi jɨrɨ–e paji kꞌachiade pꞌanapataadamerã. Jɨrɨji pꞌanapataadamerã ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Ɨtꞌariipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ijãapataarã mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨ bɨ mĩda, ichia jõmaarãmaa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ mãgá akꞌɨ–e ichide ijãadakꞌaa beerã. Kꞌĩrau bɨ ãchi ome pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapata perã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata perã apemaarãpa ijãanaadamerã irua wãarata jara pëidade.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadáma, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopi bairã. Jõmaarãpa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata mãgá pꞌanapataadai, Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã perã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa pꞌanapata perã.

Ma jara aupada wãara mĩda, parãdepemapa jarai ichia awaraarã kꞌinia iru bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, wãara mãga oo–e bɨ. Atꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde ookꞌajikꞌa.
Ichiaba o–ĩa pꞌanátɨ ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri parãmaa Cristode ijãapata perã. Mãgá pꞌanadai kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure, chi jaure pipɨara bɨ, parã ome bapari perã.
Pablopa saludaapꞌeda, nepɨrɨji jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda ichi kꞌapꞌɨa pari judio–eerã tꞌãide.
¿Kꞌaipa akꞌɨpii mɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia aba pida ooda? ¡Mãga pꞌoyaa ooda–e! Mãga bɨta, mɨa wãarata jarakꞌãri, ¿parãpa sãapꞌeda mɨ pedee ijãada–ema?
Mãga jarapꞌeda, ichiaba jaraji: ‘Mɨa waa kꞌirãpa–e paitꞌee ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa.’ (Jeremías 31.34)

Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa jõmaade parã Corinto pidaarã kꞌaripaji. Pia pedeepiji iru ũraa jarateedamerã. Ichiaba poro wẽsaapiji kꞌawaadamerã irua oopi kꞌinia bɨ ichide ijãapataarãmaa.

Mamĩda, ɨ̃pemaarã, mãga paru misa, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã mɨ pari. Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ɨtꞌaa iidipatáatɨ Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripamerã, mɨ unukꞌãri Cristopa ooda ũridaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã ome. Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa kꞌinia bɨ tachi mãgá chikꞌaripa pꞌanadamerã. Mapa Akꞌõre Jaurepa Cristodeerã jõmaweda chikꞌinia pꞌanapipari.
Arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mãgajida: —¿Netuara pɨ kꞌapꞌɨade merãtɨa bɨ–ekꞌã? ajida. ¿Kꞌaipa pɨ jɨrɨ bɨma ajida, peetꞌaaitꞌee?

Jesucristopa eperãarã mãgá kꞌaripai Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru piupida perã eperãarã pari. Chonaarãweda eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa choopachi mãikꞌaapa irua ma kꞌachia ãyaa bɨpachi. Mamĩda ma kꞌachia wẽpapi–e paji. Jõdee eperãarã taide ichi warra kurusode piukꞌãri, iru waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda wẽpapiji, chonaarãpa chonaarãweda oopatapꞌedaa paara.

Jĩsua nɨ̃bada perã, pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa mimiapataarãpa mãikꞌaapa te jɨ̃apataarãpa tꞌɨpɨ orojida mãikꞌaapa kꞌara pꞌaimaa pꞌaneejida. Bainɨ̃ pꞌanɨde tꞌɨpɨtau ikꞌaawa, Pedro ichiaba ãchi ome kꞌara pꞌaimaa beeji.
Nãgá tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ɨ̃rapema soldaorãpa armadura jɨ̃patakꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa armadura teeda jɨ̃patáatɨ, Netuara Poro Waibɨapa parã kꞌũranaamerã.
Pedropa mãgaji: —Tachi Waibɨa, ¿sãapꞌeda mɨ pɨ tꞌẽe wã–e payama? aji. ¡Pɨ ome wã kꞌinia bɨ, pɨ kꞌaurepa piuru pɨjida!

Mãga ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee. Tachi kꞌĩradoopa pia kꞌawada–e pai mĩda, irua mãgá ooi Tachi Akꞌõre perã. Iruata parã kꞌĩsia mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri jɨ̃apari Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Mãgá audú kꞌĩsia jõnada–e paitꞌee.

Tachi kꞌĩramepa pedee pia jarapari Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri. Mamĩda mãgɨpa ichiaba ikꞌachia pedee jarapari chĩaramaa. Mãgá pedee kꞌachia jaradakꞌãri awaraarãmaa, ikꞌachia jara pꞌanɨ́kꞌata bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua eperãarã jõma ooda perã.

Mãga jarakꞌãri, jara kꞌinia–e baji ãyaa pꞌaneedamerã nãgee ijãadakꞌaa beerã ikꞌaawaapa: pariatua pꞌekꞌau oopataarã; pꞌaratꞌa waapɨara iru pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã; nechɨapataarã maa–e pɨrã awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apatade ijãapataarã. Mãgeerã ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pꞌaneedapꞌedaa paara, ichita uchiadaitꞌee paji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdeepa.
—Naaweda mɨa pida kꞌĩsia baji judiorãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mapa Jesús Nazaretdepema tꞌɨ̃de ijãapataarã miapipachi.

Ãchia wẽraarã unudakꞌãri, audú kꞌãi kꞌinia pꞌanapata mãɨrã ome. Ichita kꞌĩsia pꞌanapata ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee. Kꞌũrapata pia ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrã, aukꞌa kꞌãi kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã ãchi ome. Jɨrɨpata waapɨara ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌɨ̃apata ne–inaa jõma ãchia iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌachia ooitꞌee, ichia ooda mĩda.

Mamĩda mãga–e mimiapari jĩpꞌaa ome. Chĩara ovejaarã akꞌɨ bɨde, mãgɨpa ne–animal kꞌachia cheru unukꞌãri, mirudaipari ma ovejaarã kꞌiniakꞌaa perã. Maperãpɨ ne–animal kꞌachia bɨpa ma ovejaarã ũkꞌuru ata chepari mãikꞌaapa apemaarã awara ãyaa jĩchoopipari.
Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã tachi–itꞌee, kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ iru ũraa ũridamerã. Mamĩda pia kꞌĩsíatɨ pedeedai naaweda. Ma awara isapai kꞌĩraunáatɨ.
Mãga pɨkꞌa Cristopa jaraji ichi ũraa jarateepataarãpa ne–inaa jitadaipia bɨ awaraa ijãapataarã juadeepa.
Mɨta chi ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨ. Mɨ cheji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee mɨde ijãapataarã pꞌananaadamerã pꞌekꞌau oopataarã pꞌanapatakꞌa pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde.
Ma tꞌẽepai, Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade Jesupa ma eperã unukꞌãri, irumaa mãgaji: —¡Ũríji! Ɨ̃rá pɨ jɨpa bɨda aji. Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amáaji ne–inaa kꞌachiara pꞌasanaamerã.
Ma awara parãpa oo pꞌanɨ jõmaweda chikꞌinia oopatáatɨ.
—Parãpa mɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, oopataadaitꞌeeda aji, mɨ ũraade jara bɨkꞌa.

Mapa parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũridaipia bɨ. Ma ee ɨtꞌɨa bɨdeepa pedeekꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa chupɨria kꞌawa–e paji pɨrã ichi ũraa ũridaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã, audupɨara tachi iru juadeepa uchiada–e pai, ũridaamaa pꞌanɨ pɨrã iru ũraa jara pëida ɨtꞌariipa ichi Warra kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Naaweda parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ weda, Tachi Akꞌõre–ee beemaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida mãikꞌaapa ma jua ekꞌari pꞌanapachida esclavoorãkꞌa.

Ichia jaradakꞌa Abrahammaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia ooji, ichi Warra piupꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabai atakꞌãri parã tꞌãide. Mãga ooji kꞌinia bada perã parãpa naapɨara ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa pãchia kꞌachia oopata oo amaadamerã.
Tai iru ome nipapatapꞌedaarãpa unujida jõmaweda irua ooda Judea eujãde mãikꞌaapa Jerusalén pꞌuurude. Ichiaba pꞌanajida iru kurusode peedakꞌãri.

Ma jara aupada jõmaweda wãara mĩda, Cloe tedepemaarãpa mɨmaa kꞌawapijida parã nepɨrade para bɨ, aukꞌa kꞌĩsiada–e pꞌanadairã. Ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa mɨ pëida perã, ¡ũrítɨ mɨ ũraa! Tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ, aupedeeda–ee, Cristode ijãapata perã. Óotɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa ichideerãmaa.

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ nãgɨde! Parã ijãadai naaweda, tꞌɨmɨ́ pɨkꞌa pꞌanapachida Tachi Akꞌõre ikꞌaawaapa. Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapachida. Tꞌãri kꞌachia pꞌanapachida parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.

Maperã oonáaji ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌũtrãarãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara jɨrɨ́ji ne–inaa jõma ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipaparíiji Cristode ijãapari perã. Awaraarã kꞌinia iru báji mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee baparíiji jõmaarã ome. Mãga ooru pɨrã, ooitꞌee jõma Cristomaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarãpa oopatakꞌa, wãara tꞌãripa irude ijãapata perã.

Mɨa naaweda jaradakꞌa parã pꞌirabai pɨkꞌajida Cristo ome, iru chokꞌai pꞌirabaikꞌãri. Mãgá eperã chiwidi pɨkꞌa pꞌaneejida; pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaa pꞌanapataarãkꞌa. Mapa jɨrɨpatáatɨ ɨtꞌaripema ne–inaa, Cristo mama bapari perã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo ichi juaraare bɨji, tachi jõmaweda akꞌɨ bamerã.

Chi naapɨara angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, angeleerãpa hielo kꞌoi taukꞌa batꞌajida na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Ma hielo pꞌoira baji tꞌɨpɨtau ome mãikꞌaapa waa ome. Perá eujã esajĩakꞌa paadachi. Ichiaba pakꞌuru õpeedepema chaa aba mãikꞌaapa pꞌũajara jõmaweda paadachi.
Mãgapachida: —Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨta ichita bapari mãikꞌaapa ichita bapachi. Gracias jara pꞌanɨ pɨmaa. ¡Pɨta jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, jõmaarã rey paru!

Jesupa pꞌanauji: —Pɨa kꞌawada paara jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa oo kꞌinia bɨ eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌawada paara kꞌaipata pɨmaa pania iidimaa bɨ, mɨmaa iidikꞌaji teemerã pania eperãarã ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapipari.
Maperã Cristo, chi ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapipari waya chekꞌãri, parã aukꞌa chedaitꞌee iru ome iru kꞌĩra wãree unupide jõmaarãmaa.
Mamĩda nãgɨ́ pꞌãji parãpa ijãapataadamerã Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra; irua pëida eperãarã kꞌaripamerã. Jesude ijãa pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee jai–idaadakꞌãri.

Mamĩda mãga–e tai ome, tai Tachi Akꞌõredeerã perã. Taipa wãarata jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Mapa chi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa beerãpa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata taipa jarapata. Mamĩda chi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e beerãpa ũri kꞌiniadakꞌaa taipa jarateepata. Ãchia ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨ seewa jarateepataarã, Netuara Poro Waibɨapa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Nãga kꞌawaadai chisãgɨ́ wãarata jarateepataarã mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ seewa jarateepataarã. Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa beerãpa wãarata jarateepataarã ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata. Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e beerãpa seewa jarateepataarã ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata.

Parã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri ne–inaa jedekꞌodaitꞌee, kꞌĩra nejasiadaipata mãgɨ́ seewa jarateepataarã kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda ãchi kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe, waibɨa kꞌopata mãikꞌaapa waibɨa topata, ãchita poro waibɨarãkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mãgá oodakꞌãri, chupɨria chitoonɨɨrã akꞌɨdakꞌaa. Jõmaweda ãchi–itꞌee aupai oopata. Jɨ̃arara pania wẽe bɨ́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ, nãupa ateepari eujã pꞌũasaadee. Ichiaba nejõ bɨɨrɨ́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ chaukꞌaa bakꞌãri, chaujara bɨ mĩda. Ãchi piu pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ ma pakꞌuru ẽtꞌadakꞌa mãikꞌaapa pꞌoodakꞌa.

Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, eperãarãpa ãchi kꞌayaa beerã calle jã ikꞌaawa uchia atapachida joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ ɨ̃rɨ, Pedro wãyaa wãkꞌãri, chi jaurepa pida ãra tꞌõbaimerã mãikꞌaapa jɨpamerã.
Soldaorãpa escudo ateepatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa waapɨara Cristode ijãapatáatɨ. Mãgá jautꞌɨ pɨkꞌa pꞌanadai Netuara Poro Waibɨapa kꞌachia oopi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa.
Mimiapataadai kꞌãyaara eperãarã–itꞌee aupai, tꞌãripa ne–inaa jõma oopatáatɨ Tachi Waibɨa Cristo–itꞌee, iru parã chipari waibɨara bairã.

Apida awaraa ome kꞌãikꞌaraa bɨ, miakꞌãi–e bɨ pɨrã. Ichiaba oodaikꞌaraa bɨ Esaúpa oodakꞌa. Ichia Tachi Akꞌõre waaweekꞌaa paji. Jacobmaa teeji chi akꞌõre netꞌaa ataitꞌee pada mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨitꞌee pada, warra naapema pada perã. Mãga teeji chikꞌo pꞌaratꞌu abaa pari.

Mãpai arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarã jõmaweda waya biajida: —¡Jãgɨ́ kꞌena pëináaji! ¡Barrabata kꞌena pë́iji! Barrabás nechɨayaa bapachi mãikꞌaapa chõoyaa bapachi Romadepemaarã ome, ãchi jua ekꞌariipa uchia kꞌinia bada perã.

ãchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã paara traicionaapata; kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa ne–inaa ooi naaweda; auduayaa, pedee–idaa nipapata; ãchia oo kꞌiniata ooi awaa pꞌanɨ ne–inaa oodai kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanadairã.
Ichi itu mãgá chupɨria papida perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara papiji mãikꞌaapa irumaa tꞌɨ̃ pipɨara bɨji, jõmaarã tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãyaara.

Taipa parãmaa jarateejida Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa ooda mãikꞌaapa iru waya cheitꞌee. Maapai jarateeda–e paji eperãarãpa oopatakꞌa, ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa nepɨrɨdakꞌãri awaraarã kꞌũradaitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara tachi taupa taipa iru kꞌĩra wãree unujida.

Irua kꞌartꞌa jõma pꞌãdade ma ũraa jaradoo, madepema pedee ũkꞌuru tachia pia pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda. Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pꞌanɨɨrãpa mãikꞌaapa waide pia ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrãpa oopata mãgɨ́ pedee ome, awaraa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa pꞌãpida ome oopatakꞌa. Ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa ma ũraa seewa papipata mãikꞌaapa awaraarãmaa ma seewa jarateepata. Maperãpɨ ãchi atuadaitꞌee.
Mamĩda Bernabé Pablo ome kꞌawaadakꞌãri mãgá oo pꞌanɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee ãchi kꞌĩrapite, ãchi pꞌaru jẽtꞌaajida tꞌãri pꞌuapa. Maapꞌeda nãga bia tꞌĩudachida eperãarã tꞌãide:
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo pëiji tai judiorã kꞌaripade, ichia jaradakꞌa tai chonaarãmaa. Mãga ooji akꞌɨpiitꞌee wãara ichia oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa.

Eperãpa kꞌĩsiai Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oo bɨ, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari perã maa–e pɨrã primisia teepari perã. Mamĩda ikꞌachia pedeeru pɨrã awaraarã ãpɨte maa–e pɨrã audua pedeeru pɨrã, ichi itu kꞌũramaa bɨ, wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oo–e bairã.

Kꞌirãpátɨ mɨa jarada: “Mimiapari ichi poro waibɨa kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ–e.” Mɨ jɨrɨ nipapatapꞌedaakꞌa ichiaba parã jɨrɨ nipapataadaitꞌee. Jõdee mɨa jarateeda ijãajida pɨrã, parãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ ichiaba ijãadaitꞌee.
Mãpai Jesupa judiorã irude ijãadapꞌedaarãmaa mãgaji: —Parãpa oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã mɨa ũraa bɨkꞌa, wãara mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorã.
ʼMa tꞌẽepai jarra oojida Egipto eujãde mãikꞌaapa Canaán eujãde. Maperã makꞌɨara nekꞌodaitꞌee wẽ–e paji.
Mɨ o–ĩa beeji kꞌawaakꞌãri parãdepemaarã ũkꞌuru pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidade jara bɨkꞌa.
Ijãaparipa ichi ëreerã wa audupɨara ichideerã akꞌɨ–e pɨrã, baamaa bɨ Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌãyaara kꞌachiara bɨ.

Mapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨde tꞌãri pia wãdáma Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌaitꞌa. Irua oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadáma mãikꞌaapa ijãadáma irua tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨ bɨ. Kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌananaadáma tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa, Cristo waapa ma jõma wẽpapida perã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaa kꞌinia pꞌanɨda ada perã paniapa sɨɨdakꞌãri.
Aba na pedee ũrijida awaraarã ijãapataarã itꞌaideepa: “Tachi jɨrɨ nipadapa ɨ̃rá jarateemaa bɨ Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, naaweda irude ijãa amaapi kꞌinia baji mĩda.”
Mapa nekꞌótɨ ma–ãri pida, juatau paraadamerã. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia pꞌuanáatɨ, apida piuda–e paitꞌee perã.
Maapai parãpa choopachida, mãɨrãpa nepɨra jɨrɨpachida mĩda parã ome. Sẽ–ee mãgá choopachida, nepɨrade baaijida mĩda mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa.

Ũráaji ijãapataarã chonaarãmaa: ne–inaa oodai naaweda pia kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachiade baainaadamerã; kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanadaipia bɨ apemaarã kꞌĩrapite, pia kꞌĩsiadamerã ãchide; ne–inaa pariatua oodaikꞌaraa bɨ; wãara Cristode ijãadaipia bɨ; awaraarã wãara kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌa; chupɨria jõnɨ jida, Cristode ijãadaipia bɨ.

Naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa miapi–e paji mãgee kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaarã, iru waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá jõmaarãmaa jara bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa ichide ijãadamerã.
Soldaorãpa mãga oo pꞌanɨ misa, kuruso kꞌaitꞌa bainɨ̃ pꞌanajida Jesús nawe chi nawe ɨ̃pewẽra ome, awaraa María, mãgɨ́ Cleofás wẽra pada, mãikꞌaapa María Magdalena.
Ichi ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru jɨ̃ bada bekꞌee baji waapa. Ichi tꞌɨ̃jarapata Tachi Akꞌõre Pedee.
Mamĩda, mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨde, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai kꞌĩsia pꞌuapidai maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia oopidai chi mãga waide pia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨɨrãmaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji ichi Warra chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee, waa piu–e paitꞌee ichi ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa: ‘Rey Davidmaa jaradakꞌa mɨa ooitꞌee, mɨa wãarata jarapari perã.’ (Isaías 55.3)
Maapai parãpa wãara kꞌawaadaitꞌee mɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa ome araa bapari mãikꞌaapa parã mɨ ome ichiaba araa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee, tꞌãri a–ba.
Tachia kꞌawadai Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ, iru ũraade jara bɨkꞌa oodakꞌãri.

Mapa mɨa jaraji parã atuadaitꞌee pãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Wãara mãgá atuadaitꞌeeda aji, ijãada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã Mɨta jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Mɨa aupaita eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapii.

Mɨa unuji mãgɨ́ wẽra piu pɨkꞌa bɨ. Eperã itꞌuapa piudaikꞌãri, o–ĩadaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mãgɨ́ wẽra o–ĩadachi Tachi Akꞌõredeerã, Cristode ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã peepida perã. Mãgá akꞌɨmaa bɨde mɨ pꞌera pɨkꞌa beeji.

Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma tꞌẽepai pia kꞌĩsiakꞌãri, chi akꞌõrepa teeitꞌee pada netꞌaa audú ata kꞌinia baji mãikꞌaapa audú kꞌinia baji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi pia akꞌɨmerã. Mamĩda audupai jẽeji mĩda, mãga uchia–e paji, aɨ naaweda chi akꞌõrepa jarada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa; Jacob pipɨara akꞌɨitꞌee Esaú kꞌãyaara.
Eperãarã chokꞌara ãchi pitapai osausawaa pedeepachida iru ãpɨte. Ũkꞌuruurãpa mãgapachida: —Jã eperã tꞌãri pia bapari. Mamĩda awaraarãpa mãgapachida: —Jã eperãpa eperãarã kꞌũramaa nipapari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌaripaji. Mapa judio–eerã chokꞌara Jesucristode ijãa pꞌaneejida.

Ma kꞌãyaara jĩpꞌa jarateejida Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa jarateepidakꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrépata tai jɨrɨtꞌeraji jarateenadamerã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Maperãpɨ mãga jaratee nipapata. Jarateeda–e eperãarãpa tai tꞌo pꞌanadamerã. Jĩpꞌa jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai pia akꞌɨpariimerã. Iruata kꞌawa bɨ tai tꞌãride kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨ.

Mamĩda Jesucristo piuda perã tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee, mãikꞌaapa chokꞌai pꞌirabaida perã, tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji. Maperã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias jaradaitꞌee. ¡Iruta jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ, irua kꞌĩsia iru bada perã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo pëiitꞌee tachi kꞌaripade!
Jõdee pꞌẽtrãa ëreerã wẽe kꞌɨrɨpa nɨpari Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripamerã. Ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌaripamerã. Mãgee pꞌẽtrãa kꞌaripaipia bɨ.
Waide mɨ tꞌɨ̃de parãpa maarepida ɨtꞌaa iidida–e pꞌanɨ. Iidítɨ mɨ Akꞌõrepa teemerã parãpa iidi pꞌanɨ. Mãgá parã wãara tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Esclavo paji pɨrã ijãa beekꞌãri, kꞌĩsianáaji pɨ eperã jua ekꞌari bɨ perã. Jõdee chiparipa pɨ pëi kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, kꞌãiwee uchíaji.

Parã tꞌãide mãgá pꞌasa bɨ. Mãgee seewa jarateepataarãpa parã kꞌĩraupipata pãchi aukꞌaarã ome. Mapa awara–awaraadaipata. Ãchia oopata na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa oopatakꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure wẽe pꞌanadairã.

Mamĩda mɨ pꞌera pɨkꞌa bɨ taarã–e weda parãpa ijãa amaadaruta perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru badade ooitꞌee Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã chupɨria kꞌawaaji mãikꞌaapa jɨrɨji irude ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã. Mamĩda parãpa mãga ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ijãa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ awaraa ne–inaa kꞌaurepa ɨtꞌaa wãdai.

Jɨrɨdaipia bɨ kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee jõmaarã ome mãikꞌaapa oo pꞌanapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ooda–e pꞌanɨɨrã irumaa pꞌoyaa wãda–e.
Mãpai Jesupa mãgaji: —Barco juaraare tꞌɨrɨ tꞌaadapáde aji. Mãgara peedayada aji. Irua jaradakꞌa oodakꞌãri, ma tꞌɨrɨ pꞌoyaa jirada–e paji chikꞌo chɨkꞌɨapa.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee pꞌua–e bairã eperãpa tauchaa iru bɨ wa wẽe bɨ. Jĩpꞌa Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ tachia oodamerã ichia jara bɨkꞌa.

Awaraa kꞌariparu pɨrã chĩara tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee, mãga ooipia bɨ. Awaraamaa pꞌaratꞌarapiru pɨrã, tꞌãri pia pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa teeipia bɨ chupɨria beerã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Awaraamaa eperã waibɨa papiru pɨrã, pia akꞌɨipia bɨ ijãapataarã ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã. Awaraa kꞌariparu pɨrã chĩara chupɨria kꞌawaamerã, tꞌãri o–ĩa mãga ooipia bɨ.
Mãpai Pablopa iidiji: —Parãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, ¿Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure parã kꞌapꞌɨade ba chejikꞌã? aji. Pꞌanaujida: —Taipa kꞌawada–eda ajida, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ba chepari ijãapataarã kꞌapꞌɨade.
Mamĩda parã tꞌãidepemapa na kꞌartꞌade ũraa jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia–e pɨrã, awaraa ijãapataarãmaa nepɨrɨ́tɨ mãikꞌaapa mãgɨ́ ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pꞌanéetɨ, kꞌĩra nejasia beemerã.
Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, parãpa kꞌawaadaipia bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaa tꞌĩukꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõre eujãde, ne–inaa mikꞌiadaipari mama tꞌĩukꞌaa perã.

Mimianáatɨ chikꞌo kꞌodaitꞌee aupai, mãgee chikꞌo jõpari perã. Ma kꞌãyaara mimíatɨ kꞌawaadamerã mɨ, chi ne–inaa jõkꞌaa. Mɨ, chi Eperã Akꞌõre Truadepema kꞌaurepata parã ichita pꞌanapataadai Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Irua akꞌɨpi bɨ mɨ pia akꞌɨ bapari, iru juapa mɨa ookꞌãri ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõremaa iididakꞌãri, pãchi–itꞌee aupaita iidipata. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa teekꞌaa pãchia iidi pꞌanɨ, mãgá kꞌachia iidi pꞌanadairã.
Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode ijãapata perã, ichita gracias jarapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa, jõma irua oo bɨ pari tachi–itꞌee.
Kꞌĩsiadáma judiorã chonaarãwedapema Abrahamde. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa pꞌãpidade chonaarãmaa jara bɨ: ‘Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãaji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpachi.’ (Génesis 15.6)
Ma pꞌuurude pꞌanɨɨrãpa akꞌõrejĩru jẽra wa atane ɨ̃daa faltada–e paitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãreepa jẽraitꞌee perã ma pꞌuuru ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa ma Oveja Chakꞌe ɨ̃daaitꞌee perã lamparakꞌa.
Jõdee Akꞌõre Jaure pãchi tꞌãride baparida a pꞌanɨ. Mãga pɨrã, parãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ iru Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristo Jaure wẽe beerã Cristodeerã–e.

Jõdee, naaweda Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ijãaruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨitꞌee Cristodeerã akꞌɨparikꞌa. Ãra waya tꞌɨ pɨkꞌa bɨitꞌee ãra naaweda pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Mãga ooi Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee ne–inaa audú chaaree wẽ–e perã.
Ãchia maarepida seewa jaradakꞌaa paji, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda oo amaadapꞌedaa perã.

Wãara mɨa ijãa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ode Pꞌanɨɨrã apata ijãa pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari tachi chonaarãwedapema Akꞌõremaa mãikꞌaapa ijãa bɨ Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ, ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaade jara bɨ. Nata mɨa kꞌachia ooda a pꞌanɨ nama pꞌanɨɨrãpa.
Tewe paraa pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara, chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ. Mãga pꞌanaruta pɨrã, oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:

Mãgá eperãarã jõmaweda mia pꞌaneepachida ma paada pꞌuapa. Mamĩda ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amaa kꞌiniada–e paji mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre waawee kꞌiniada–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara ikꞌachia jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua ma kꞌachia ãchimaa pëida perã.

Ma pꞌuuru tꞌɨakꞌau nɨ̃baji muralla waibɨa ɨtꞌɨa bɨpa. Aɨde tꞌĩupata doce paraaji. Ma tꞌĩupata chaa ángel aba bainɨ̃ baji. Ichiaba ma tꞌĩupata chaa Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaa ëreerã docedepema tꞌɨ̃ aba pꞌã baji.

Mamĩda tai judiorãpa oodakꞌaa jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mapa o kꞌachiade pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa atuadaitꞌee paji. Mamĩda Cristopa tai uchiapiji ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa, ma kꞌaurepa atuanaadamerã. Mãga ooji kurusode piukꞌãri. Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌachia ooji, tai kꞌachia ooi kꞌãyaara. Mãgá tai kꞌaripaji. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristo kꞌachiade baji Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã: ‘Eperã pakꞌurude baijira bɨ kꞌachiade banaitꞌee.’ (Deuteronomio 21.23)
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mɨa ooda atꞌãri judiorãpa ijãapatade ijãa bakꞌãri. Tachi Akꞌõredeerã audú jɨrɨ nipapachi peeitꞌee, mãɨrã jõpi kꞌinia bada perã.
Ichia jita ataji mãgɨ́ je choma bɨ; mãgɨ́ chonaarãwedapema taama; Netuara Poro Waibɨa maa–e pɨrã Satanás apata. Ma cadenapa mãgɨ́ jɨ̃ nɨ̃bɨji mil años wãyaaru misa.
Mamĩda mama bapachi eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Simón. Mãgɨpa petau tau kꞌawaa baji mãikꞌaapa ma eujãdepemaarã kꞌũra pꞌe iru bapachi ichia oo bɨ kꞌaurepa. Mapa ãchi tꞌãide eperã waibɨakꞌa bapachi.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ mãgá bapii, Cristopa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda pꞌoyaada perã, Akꞌõre juapa chokꞌai pꞌirabaikꞌãri. Maperã Cristo pipɨara kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ. Mɨa ne–inaa jõmaweda oo kꞌinia bɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa, ma kꞌaurepa mɨ jɨrɨruta pɨjida miapidaitꞌee, maa–e pɨrã mɨ piuru pɨjida irukꞌa.

Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãapari audú isapai awara bɨi ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari mimia–itꞌee. Ma–itꞌee pɨ jua bɨi naaweda mãgɨ́ ɨ̃rɨ, iru bapata pia akꞌɨipia bɨ. Iru ne–inaa kꞌachiade ni pɨrã, awaraarãpa iru ãpɨte kꞌachia pedeedai mãikꞌaapa pɨ ãpɨte aukꞌa mãgadai, irua oopata pɨa pia akꞌɨi jĩakꞌaapa. Mapa maarepida ne–inaa kꞌachia oonáaji. Ichita óoji Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mãga pɨkꞌa chõtrãarãmaa ũráaji: Tachi Akꞌõre ome ewari chaa chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadaipia bɨ; chĩara ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeedaikꞌaraa bɨ; itꞌuapa piudaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ãchi mãgá pia pꞌanadaipia bɨ apemaarã wẽraarã ne–inaa pia oo kꞌawaa wãdamerã.
Mãpai ma miakꞌãi kꞌinia bɨpa pia kꞌĩsia bɨ. Mamĩda ma miakꞌãi kꞌinia–e bɨpa pipɨara kꞌĩsia bɨ.

Mãga ooda–e pɨrã, pãchi kꞌinia ijãa pꞌanɨ́kꞌata bɨ. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌĩsiadai perã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũri bɨpapai oo pꞌanɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda pãchi itu kꞌũrapi pꞌanɨ. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũridakꞌãri, oodaipia bɨ irua jara bɨkꞌa.
Ma tꞌẽepai Jesús nipaji Galilea eujãde. Judea eujãde ba kꞌinia–e paji, judiorã poro waibɨarãpa iru jɨrɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã peepitꞌaadaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapari perã, tachimaa kꞌawaapiji Cristopa ooda tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Cristopa tachi neto pɨkꞌa ataji uchiadamerã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa. Mãpai irude ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi awara bɨji araa pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome. Mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneejida Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ma awara mãgá Cristopa tachimaa kꞌawapiji Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ.
Mãpai jarrade pania wee atapꞌeda, chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã bɨɨrɨ sɨɨmaa beeji. Maapꞌeda ma toallapa pꞌookꞌooji.
Mapa naaweda mɨa Tachi Akꞌõre Ode Pꞌanɨɨrã apata miapipachi. Ãchi jita atapꞌeda, carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨpachi. Wẽraarã mãikꞌaapa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã aukꞌa mãgá oopachi.
Mapa eperãarã kꞌĩsia awara–awaraadachida. Ũkꞌuruurãpa ijãajida Jesús Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida; ũkꞌuru ijãadakꞌaa paji.

Mapa akꞌɨ pꞌanapatáatɨ ijãapataarã parã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ. Ãra akꞌɨ pꞌanadaipia bɨ oveja akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã akꞌɨparikꞌa. Mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ apidaapa mãga oopi pꞌanadairã parãmaa. Ãra akꞌɨ pꞌanadaipia bɨ, tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba ma mimia oodaikꞌaraa bɨ pꞌaratꞌa atadaitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara óotɨ awaraarã kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã.
Mãga jaradaipia bɨ eperãarã piupata perã ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ jõmaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia eperãarãpa oopata, ma jõma jara bairã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpidade.

¡Ũrítɨ! Parãpa mimiapataarã jɨrɨpata pãchi ne–uudapꞌedaa chauda pꞌedamerã. Mamĩda ma mimiapataarãmaa pꞌaadakꞌaa. Mapa chupɨria iidipata abaapa ãchi kꞌaripamerã. Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ãra chupɨria iidida ũri bɨ.

Maperã oo amáatɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo. Seewanáatɨ mãikꞌaapa seewata ne–inaa oonáatɨ. Awaraarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌananáatɨ ãrapa netꞌaa iru pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Pedee kꞌachia apida chĩara ãpɨte jaranáatɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ wẽra miakꞌãi bɨpa awaraa jɨrɨikꞌaraa bɨ, ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra chokꞌai bɨ misa. Jõdee ichi kꞌima piukꞌãri, pia bɨ waya jɨrɨmerã, mamĩda Cristode ijãapari jɨrɨipia bɨ.

Ãchia Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata jarateeda–e pꞌanɨ, jara pꞌanadairã tachi Cristode ijãapataarã ɨ̃rá ichita chokꞌai pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Maperã piudakꞌãri, chokꞌai pꞌirabaida–e paitꞌeeda apata kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidide Cristopa oodakꞌa. Ma seewa jarateepata kꞌaurepa ijãapataarã ũkꞌuru ijãa amaadaruta.

Mãgá nɨ pꞌanɨ kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa tauchaa iru beerã apemaarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara akꞌɨ–e. Ma awara pipɨara akꞌɨ–e tauchaa bɨpida–eerã. Jĩpꞌa pipɨara akꞌɨpari eperã awaraarã kꞌinia iru bɨpa, Jesucristode ijãapari perã.
Mapa chi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bada oo aupakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru bɨji tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã. Mãga bɨji irude ijãapataarã Akꞌõre truade ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome, waa piuda–ee.
Ɨ̃rá jaraitꞌee sãga pꞌaratꞌa pꞌedaipia bɨ pëidaitꞌee apemaarã ijãapataarã–itꞌee. Óotɨ mɨa jaradakꞌa Galacia eujãdepema ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata chaa.
Wẽraarãpa oopataadaipia bɨ ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, Tachi Waibɨapa mãga kꞌinia bairã.

Mãpai Jesupa waya jarateemaa beeji eperãarãmaa: —Mɨda aji, ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã–itꞌee, mɨa ãramaa Tachi Akꞌõre o akꞌɨpipari perã. Mɨde ijãa bɨ pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde nipa–e paitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–ee. Ma kꞌãyaara ichita chokꞌai bapariitꞌee, ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde Tachi Akꞌõre ode nipapari perã.
Mamĩda ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, parã mãga pꞌanadakꞌaa. Mapa kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa jaradapꞌedaa:
ichi–itꞌee pꞌua–e bairã ne–inaa eperãarãpa oopata ichi–itꞌee. Ichiata eperãarã chokꞌai pꞌanapipari, ĩyapaapipari mãikꞌaapa tachimaa ne–inaa jõmaata teepari pia pꞌanapataadamerã.

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Eperãarãpa charraarã kꞌĩrapite ne–inaa jaradakꞌãri, ijãapata mãɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨ. Maperã audupɨara ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa jarakꞌãri, ichi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bapari perã. Ichia jaramaa bɨ Jesucristo ichi Warra ma jarada õpeepa.
Parã, jõdee, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode ijãapata perã, pꞌanapatáatɨ iru na pꞌekꞌau eujãde badakꞌa. Kꞌĩsianáatɨ parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oo kꞌinia bɨde.

Israel pidaarãpa ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, ewari siete parumaa ewari chaa pꞌɨrrabaijida Jericó pꞌuuru ikꞌaawa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa oodamerã. Mãgá oodapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa muralla choma ma pꞌuuru tꞌɨakꞌau bada baaipiji.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõrepa Pablomaa oopipachi ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Jesupa pꞌanauji: —Mɨa wãarata jararu. Jõmaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanɨda aji, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata perã.
Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi mãgá audú kꞌinia iru bapari perã, tachi jida chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.
Akꞌõre eujãdee wãpari o mɨmaa akꞌɨpiji. Mapa mɨ o–ĩa baitꞌeeda aji, pɨ kꞌĩrapite.’ (Salmos 16.8-11)
Mɨ jãmaa wãru misa, ijãapataarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, léeji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdapꞌedaa. Jaratéeji kꞌasaa jara kꞌinia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ũráaji ijãapataarã pꞌanapataadamerã ma jara bɨkꞌa.

Mãga jaratee pꞌanɨ misa iru–itꞌee, tai wãrutamaa ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa nepɨra jɨrɨpata tai ome. Mamĩda ãramaa pꞌoyaapidakꞌaa. Mãga pꞌanadai Tachi Akꞌõrépata tai kꞌaripapari perã choodamerã. Edaare kꞌawada–e sãgapɨ oodai. Mamĩda ijãa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõrepa taimaa ichia kꞌinia bɨ kꞌawapiitꞌee.
Mamĩda ũkꞌuru, chĩara oo kꞌiniapa, mãgapachida: —¡Vinopata piu para bɨ! ¡Mapa pariatua pedee pꞌanɨda! apachida.
Ma muralla mãu pi–ia jaspedee ooda paji. Chi pꞌuuru nẽedee ooda paji; nẽe pi–ia, maarepida nejarra wẽe. Bëi–sãa baji vidriokꞌa.

Mãpai unuji ma te waibɨadeepa angeleerã siete uchia pꞌanɨ. Mãɨrã paji ne–inaa kꞌachia ateepataarã pꞌasapidaitꞌee eperãarãmaa. Pꞌaru linodee jɨ̃ pꞌanajida. Ma pꞌaru maarepida tꞌãu–ee baji. Urua pɨkꞌa baji tꞌo–tꞌoo bada perã. Ne–inaa kꞌɨrrɨde jɨ̃patakꞌa nẽedee ooda nẽrabai jɨ̃ pꞌanajida ãchi tꞌũade.
Awaraarãpa parã jɨrɨdakꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee, ɨtꞌaa iidítɨ Akꞌõrepa ãra chupɨria kꞌawaamerã mãikꞌaapa bendiciamerã. Iidináatɨ Akꞌõrepa ãra maldiciamerã.
Chi bɨɨrɨ jida urua baji, bronce ɨrradakꞌãri uruaparikꞌa. Chi otau ũriji to kꞌida chaaree jĩwaaparikꞌa.

Mɨa pɨ ãramaa kꞌawapiji mãikꞌaapa atꞌãri kꞌawapiitꞌee, mɨ ãra tꞌãride bapariitꞌee perã. Mãgá pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa, ãra jida ichiaba kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌeeda aji, ãrapa jõdee awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãakꞌa–e paji pɨrã ichi Warra piupikꞌãri tachi pari, audupɨara wãakꞌa–e paitꞌee ne–inaa awaraa ichia jara bɨ teeitꞌee tachi Cristode ijãapataarãmaa.
—Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate pai naaweda, ijãapataarã tꞌãide uchiadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa oo iru pꞌanapataarã. Mãgɨɨrãpa oodaitꞌee ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã judio–eerã ome mãgá ooji mĩda, kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ parã pipɨara pꞌanɨ judiorã kꞌãyaara. Ãra parã naaweda ma pakꞌuru kꞌarradepema juakꞌa pꞌanajida. Ma pakꞌuru kꞌarrakꞌa bɨ chokꞌai–e bɨ parã, chi jua tꞌɨ pɨkꞌa bɨda kꞌaurepa. Parã chokꞌai pꞌanɨ ma pakꞌuru kꞌarrakꞌa bɨ kꞌaurepa. Judiorã kꞌaurepata parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa pꞌanɨ.

Tai, chi jarateepataarãpa, parãmaa ijãapi kꞌiniada–e taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa. Parãpa aukꞌa Cristode ijãapata. Iruata parãmaa ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oopii. Taipa jõdee parã kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ waapɨara ijãapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã.
Eperã, tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Lázaro kꞌayaa baji. Ma eperã chi ɨ̃pewẽraarã María, Marta ome Betania pꞌuurudepema paji.

Maperã na ũraa jara aupada ijãa kꞌiniada–e pɨrã, mɨa jara bɨ pedee ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨ–e. Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee jarada ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨ. Akꞌõrépata ichi Jaure ba chepipari parã ijãapataarã ome, ijãadamerã ichia jara bɨ.

Parãpa kꞌawaadai chisãgɨ́ eperãpa wãara jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Chi jara bɨpa: “Jesucristo eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde ba cheji” jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapi bɨkꞌa, wãara Cristode ijãapari perã.

Mãgɨ́ ijãadakꞌaa beerã parã tꞌãide pꞌanɨɨrãpa aukꞌa oopata. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma kꞌachia beerãmaa mãga ooji mĩda, ɨ̃rapema seewa jarateepataarãpa mãɨrã jĩakꞌa ãchia oo kꞌiniata oopata. Kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌapata perã, ãchia oopata ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ma awara merapata Tachi Waibɨa ãchi chipari mãikꞌaapa angeleerã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarapata.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo amaaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia ooipia bɨ. Jɨrɨipia bɨ kꞌãiwee bapariitꞌee jõmaarã ome.

Wãara mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee, ijãa wãruta pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida eperãarãmaa. Ma jara pëida naa ijãadakꞌãri, kꞌawaajida parã piudakꞌãri, wãara ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee. Mãga ijãapatáatɨ. Chokꞌaraarãpa ũrimaa pꞌanɨ ma ũraa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida. Ma ũraata mɨ, Pablopa jarateepari, Cristopa mɨ pëidakꞌãriipa jarateemerã.
