Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ãchia mãu pꞌe atajida batꞌadaitꞌee Jesumaa, ichi Tachi Akꞌõreda ada perã. Mamĩda Jesús mirudachi mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre te waibɨadeepa uchiadachi.

Pꞌanapatáatɨ kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi iru pꞌanɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichideerã mãga pꞌanapi kꞌinia bairã. Tachi ooi naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru baji tachi ichikꞌa pꞌanadamerã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe. Mãga pꞌanadai, jõma oodakꞌãri irua wãarata jara pëida jara bɨkꞌa.
Mapa Tachi Akꞌõredeerãpa choodaipia bɨ ãchia oo pꞌanɨde iru ũraade jara bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa ãchi Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji.
ʼMɨ chi ovejaarã akꞌɨpari tꞌãri piara bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa eperãarã mɨ ovejaarãkꞌa. Ovejaarã akꞌɨpari tꞌãri pia bakꞌãri, chi ovejaarã pia akꞌɨpari, mãga oo bɨ kꞌaurepa piuru pɨjida.
¿Parãpa nãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã? Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari perã, parã pia oo kꞌinia bɨ. Mapa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji na mimia oomerã parã–itꞌee.

Eperãpa ijãapataarãmaa kꞌĩraupikꞌãri, tachi ijãapataarã awara–awaraadaipata. Mãgee eperã parã tꞌãide paraa pɨrã, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ũráaji mãgɨ́ kꞌachia oo amaamerã. Ũri kꞌinia–e bɨ pɨrã, waya ũráaji. Mãga ũraapꞌeda, atꞌãri ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, ijãapataarã tꞌãide waa tꞌĩupináatɨ.
Ma pedee ũridakꞌãri, judiorã waya kꞌĩsia awara–awaraa pꞌaneejida.
Mamĩda eperãpa irua jara bɨ ijãakꞌãri, kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita wãarata jarapari.
Maperã ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, parã nɨ pꞌanɨ misa Akꞌõrepa oomerã ichia jaradakꞌa, jɨrɨpatáatɨ kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite. Mãgá tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanapataadai iru ome.

Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, parãmaa chupɨria iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ tai pari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã. Iidítɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripamerã, jõmaarãmaa irua jara pëida isapai jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Iidítɨ ma jaratee pꞌanɨ ũrirutaarã tꞌãripa Cristode ijãadamerã, parã ijãadapꞌedaakꞌa.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipidakꞌa, tai jida aukꞌa pꞌirabaipiitꞌee parã ome mãikꞌaapa tachi ateeitꞌee Jesucristo bɨmaa ichi truade. Mãga ooitꞌee tachi Cristodeerã perã.

Ma awara parãdepema aba kꞌayaa bakꞌãri, jara pëidaipia bɨ tachi ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarãmaa, ãra chedamerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃damerã iru pari. Iru ikꞌaawa pachedakꞌãri, ãrapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ Jesucristopa iru jɨpamerã. Mãɨmisa ãradepemapa iru kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌuruipia bɨ aceitepa.
ʼ‘Cuarenta años iru bakꞌãri, kꞌĩsiaji wãitꞌee Israel pidaarã akꞌɨde, ichi aukꞌaarã pada perã.
Na eperã mɨa pëiru pɨmaa judiorãpa jita atajida mãikꞌaapa perá peetꞌaajida. Mamĩda mɨa kꞌawaakꞌãri iru Romadepema, mɨchi soldaorã ome wãdapꞌeda, ãra juadeepa kꞌaripa ataji.

Mãpai eperãarã waapɨara cheepuru nɨ̃beeji mãikꞌaapa pꞌuuru pidaarã jõma kꞌĩraupikꞌa para beeji. Mãpai Gayo, Aristarco ome jita atajida mãikꞌaapa atadachida ãchi chipꞌedaipatamaa. Ma eperãarã omé Macedonia eujãdepemaarã paji. Ichiaba Pablo ome nipapachida.
Eperã tꞌãri pia bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe kꞌena pëidai kꞌãyaara, chĩara peeparita parãpa uchiapitꞌaajida.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi aukꞌa akꞌɨpari tachikꞌa. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata aukꞌa wẽpapikꞌooda perã Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, tachi ome oodakꞌa.
Maperãpɨ Cristode ijãapari chaa ma pan kꞌoi naaweda mãikꞌaapa ma vino toi naaweda, ichi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiaipia bɨ kꞌawaaitꞌee wãara kꞌoru mãikꞌaapa toru kꞌirãpaitꞌee Cristo piuda ichi pari wa mãga–e.
Maperã ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mɨa jarateeda ijãa pꞌanapatáatɨ. Ma awara ichita óotɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã mãga oodakꞌãri, pari ne–inaa ooda–e paitꞌee.
Maperã oodaipia bɨ mɨa oo bɨkꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõre mãga bapari perã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa iru pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e ãchi kꞌĩsiadoopa. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee taimaa jarateepiji, ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ mĩda tai kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda chi ijãarutaarã taipa jarateepatade o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadaitꞌee.

Mɨa parã wẽraarã miakꞌãi beerã ũraaitꞌee oodamerã pãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, chi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã ijãadakꞌaa pꞌanɨɨrãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida ijãadai parã kꞌaurepa. Cristopa ooda ãchimaa jarada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, ãchia irude ijãadai,

Ma–itꞌee Cristopa tai pëiji, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa pari taipa jaradamerã irua jara kꞌinia bɨ. Mapa taipa parã jõmaarãmaa enenee jõnɨ: Ijã́atɨ Jesucristode, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨmerã parã tꞌãri ome.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa chokꞌai pꞌirabai ataji. Mãgá chokꞌai pꞌirabai atada perã, waa piu–e; ichita chokꞌai baitꞌee.

Ma awara ãchia Jesucristo tꞌɨ̃ ichi kꞌinia ikꞌachia jarapata. Mãga oopata Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa jõmaarãmaa pia oopari mĩda. ¡Iru tꞌɨ̃deta parã poro choopijida! Mãga bɨta, ¿sãga ãrata pipɨara akꞌɨdaima chupɨria beerã kꞌãyaara?
toyaa bakꞌaa; kꞌĩrauyaa mãikꞌaapa nepɨra jɨrɨyaa bakꞌaa; ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa pia oopari; pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniayaa bakꞌaa.

Mamĩda mɨa pania teerudepema todakꞌãri, waa opisiada–e paitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara ara pania poatrɨ uchiaparikꞌa eujãdeepa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa pania teeru uchiaitꞌee ãra tꞌãrideepa mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa kꞌawaadaitꞌee ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome.
Mamĩda eperãpa ookꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia bapari iru ome. Nãgá kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi, Tachi Akꞌõredeerã.
Mãpai mɨa unuji jaure kꞌachia beerã õpee, baso kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨ. Mãgɨɨrã uchiajida je choma bɨ itꞌaideepa, nemĩsia itꞌaideepa mãikꞌaapa ma ne–animal kꞌachia; chi seewa jarapari itꞌaideepa.
Ma kꞌãyaara oodaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa waibɨara bɨde jara bɨkꞌa ichi ũraa pꞌãpidade: ‘Awaraarã kꞌinia iru baparíiji pɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa.’ (Levítico 19.18)

Mapa taipa jarateedakꞌãri, jarateeda–e tachi kꞌĩsiadeepa tai akꞌɨdamerã pãchi poroorãkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa jarateepata Jesucristo, Tachi Waibɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa. Taipa irua oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapata perã, tai mimiapata parã–itꞌee.
¡Mãga–e! Apidaamaa kꞌũrapináatɨ. Wãara jara pꞌanɨ nãga jaradakꞌãri: “Kꞌõpꞌãyo meraa bɨ pɨrã kꞌachia oopataarã ome, aukꞌa oodai.”

Tachi Akꞌõrépata tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapipari. Jesús waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa ichia eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiji, mãikꞌaapa Jesucristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji. Maapꞌeda ichi ũraa chiwidi kꞌaurepa Cristo bɨji tachi akꞌɨpari waibɨa, irude ijãapataarã ichita akꞌɨ bamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripamerã, oveja akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã akꞌɨparikꞌa.

Mɨa nãgapai kꞌinia bɨ: parãpa oodamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëidakꞌa Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari mãikꞌaapa pꞌanapataadamerã Cristodeerãkꞌa. Mɨ na chupɨria nɨ̃bɨdeepa uchiaru pɨrã, parã mãgá unui jãmaa wãkꞌãri. Mamĩda uchia–e pɨjida, mɨa ũri kꞌinia bɨ parã tꞌãri a–ba choo pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ichiaba ũri kꞌinia bɨ parã aukꞌa jɨrɨmaa pꞌanɨ awaraarãpa aukꞌa ijãadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida Cristode.

Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌapꞌɨa jõpi–e paitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara ichi ewari waibɨa ewate tachi kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌirabaipidakꞌa. Mãgá ooi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bapari perã.

Mapa kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa pɨmaa oopida, mɨ jua pɨ ɨ̃rɨ bɨkꞌãri. Irua ichita mãga oopi kꞌinia bɨ pɨmaa. Mapa tꞌãripa óoji irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá ijãapataarã pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ pipɨara kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Ma piudapꞌedaarã chokꞌai pꞌanadakꞌãri, miapachida kꞌapꞌɨade mãikꞌaapa piujida kꞌapꞌɨade eperãarã jõmaarãkꞌa. Mamĩda ijãadapꞌedaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee pia jara pëida Cristode ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadaitꞌee irukꞌa, ma ijãadapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa ãra jaure araa padaida perã iru Jaure ome. Ma–itꞌeepɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëiji Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Cristopa parã neto pɨkꞌa ataji ichi waa kurusode batꞌakꞌãri. Mãgá ichi piuji parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa parã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Maperãpɨ parã ichideerã. Maperã óotɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa, oodai kꞌãyaara eperãarãpa oopi kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeenáatɨ ãradepemaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa. Mãga oodapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ɨtꞌariipa ichi ángel pëiji; mãgɨpa chokꞌara peemerã.

Táipata mãga jarateedai. Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai jɨrɨtꞌeraji. Tai kꞌĩsiadoopa jarateedakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa taimaa jarapipari. Tai nipadakꞌaa awaraarãkꞌa. Ãchi kꞌĩsiadoopa Akꞌõre netꞌaa jaratee nipapata, eperãarãpa ãchi pia akꞌɨdamerã mãikꞌaapa ãchimaa pꞌaratꞌa teedamerã. Taipa jõdee mãga oodakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai ichita akꞌɨpari perã, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jarateepata irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá jarateedai Cristo tai ome bapari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pia kꞌawaa beerãpa choodaipia bɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pia kꞌawada–e beerã ome ne–inaa awara ijãadakꞌãri. Tachia oo kꞌiniata oodai kꞌãyaara, oodaipia bɨ ãrapa kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Mamĩda mɨa atꞌãri ijãa bɨ Tachi Waibɨapa mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee ichiaba taarã–ee wãmerã.

Ma tꞌẽepai mɨa unuji angeleerã kꞌĩmari; aba bainɨ̃ bɨ norte eere; aba sur eere; aba akꞌõrejĩru uchiapari eere; chi apema chi baaipari eere. Mãgɨɨrãpa madepema nãu tꞌɨdɨkꞌa pꞌanajida pꞌuanaamerã eujã ɨ̃rɨ, pꞌusa ɨ̃rɨ wa pakꞌuru ɨ̃rɨ.

Cristode ijãadai naaweda parãpa audupai oopachida ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa nãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapatakꞌa: pariatua pꞌekꞌau ooyaa; ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa; itꞌua toyaa; wẽraarã pariatua jɨrɨyaa mãɨrã ome kꞌachia oodaitꞌee; kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃i awaa ne–inaa juapa oodamaa; mãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia.
Apidaapa ma omé jɨrɨruta pɨrã miapidaitꞌee, tꞌɨpɨtau uchia bɨ ãchi itꞌaideepa paapeeitꞌee ãra kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã. Mãgá piudaitꞌee jõmaweda ãra miapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã.

Mãpai Pablopa pꞌanauji: —Mɨchi aukꞌaarã, mɨa kꞌawa–e pajida aji, iru pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ: ‘Pedee kꞌachia jaranáatɨ pãchi pꞌuuru pidaarã poroorã ãpɨte.’ (Éxodo 22.28)

Mamĩda ma pꞌuurude unudakꞌaa paitꞌee nãgee eperãarã: kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapataarã; jaipanaarã; petau tau kꞌawaa beerã; pꞌekꞌau oopataarã; chĩara peepataarã; ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda seewa jarapataarã chĩara kꞌũrapataarã ome. Mãgeerãta unuda–e paitꞌee ma pꞌuurude.

Parã mãgá choopachida mĩda, mɨa pia akꞌɨ–e nãgɨ́ ne–inaa parãpa oopata. Pãchi tꞌãide ũkꞌuruurãpa jarateepata Balaampa chonaarãweda jarateedakꞌa. Mãgɨpa Balacmaa jaraji sãga kꞌũrai Israel pidaarã, ãrapa kꞌodamerã nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite eperãarãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Ichiaba kꞌũraji ãrapa kꞌachia oodamerã awaraarã ome. Israel pidaarãpa ma ne–inaa omé oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra pia akꞌɨ–e paji.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, ichita gracias jarapata Tachi Akꞌõremaa parã jõmaarã pari. Taipa wãara mãga oodaipia bɨ, ɨ̃rá parã waapɨara Cristode ijãapata perã, naaweda ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara. Ichiaba ɨ̃rá audupɨara chikꞌinia pꞌanapata awaraa ijãapataarã ome.

Kꞌirãpa pꞌanɨ parã pꞌanapatapꞌedaa Cristode ijãadai naaweda. Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite kꞌachia oopachida ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaa perã ne–inaamaa, Tachi Akꞌõre awara. Mãga oopachida mãgee ne–inaa pedeedakꞌaa beemaa, chokꞌai–e pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãpa jõdee ãchi wẽraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ, Cristopa ijãapataarã kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa. Irua tachi ijãapataarã audupai kꞌinia iru bada perã, piuji tachi pari.
Awaraarãpa parã kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, aukꞌa oonáatɨ. Ichita ne–inaa pia óotɨ awaraarãpa unudamerã Cristo kꞌaurepa parãpa ne–inaa pia oopata.
Maperãpɨ audua–ee pꞌanapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari, irua kꞌinia bɨ ewaride irua parã awaraarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara papimerã.
Mamĩda ichia ãra akꞌɨ baji. Mãga oo bɨpa akꞌɨpiji ichi Tachi Akꞌõre. Ichiata parã–itꞌee kꞌoi chepipari ne–uu pia chaumerã. Mãgá iru pꞌanɨ nekꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee.

Wẽraarã ijãapataarãpa awaraa ijãapataarã ichiaba kꞌaripapataadai. Ãchi tꞌãri pia pꞌanadaipia bɨ; kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa; chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia pedeeda–ee; ne–inaa pia oopata mãikꞌaapa ichita oopata ãchia jara pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Mɨa jaraji ma kꞌachia oopata oo amaamerã. Mamĩda mãga oo kꞌinia–e.

Maapai Herodes kꞌĩrau baji Tiro pꞌuurudepemaarã ome mãikꞌaapa Sidón pꞌuurudepemaarã ome. Mapa ãchi wãjida iru ome pedeede. Mamĩda panadakꞌãri, pꞌaajida Herodes mimiapataarã poro aba, Blastomaa, irua naapɨara chupɨria iidinamerã ãchi pari, chõoda–e paitꞌee. Mãga oojida ãchia ne–inaa kꞌodaitꞌee netonapachida perã Herodes jua ekꞌari pꞌanadapꞌedaarã eujãde.
Jesupa pꞌanauji: —Mɨ kꞌapꞌɨade netuara wẽe bɨda aji. Ma kꞌãyaara mɨa mɨ Akꞌõre waawee bapari. Mamĩda parãpa mɨ waaweedakꞌaa.
Mãgá ãchi ituaba wãrutade pꞌusara tꞌo nɨ̃beeji, nãu golpe pꞌua nɨ̃bada perã.
Mɨchi tꞌãride mɨa nãga kꞌawa bɨ. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, tachi makꞌɨara miada–e pꞌanɨ kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachimaa unupiitꞌee ichi kꞌĩra wãree eujãde.
Warrarã, mɨa parãmaa pꞌãru, Jesucristo piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapida perã.

Ichiata tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji mãikꞌaapa tachi jɨrɨji ichideerã papiitꞌee. Tachi mãgá kꞌaripa–e paji ne–inaa pia oopata perã. Jĩpꞌa mãga ooji na eujã ooi naaweda, ichia kꞌĩsia iru bada perã tachi pia ooitꞌee Jesucristo kꞌaurepa.

Jesús unu atadakꞌãri, pꞌaareerã poroorãpa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa jɨ̃apataarãpa biapachida: —¡Kurusode peepitꞌáaji! ¡Kurusode peepitꞌáaji! Mamĩda Pilatopa mãgaji: —Mãgara pãchia atadaidapáde aji, mãikꞌaapa peetꞌaanadapáde aji. Mɨa maarepida unu–e bɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda ma kꞌaurepa peepiitꞌee.

Chonaarãweda Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pi–ia akꞌɨjida Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda kꞌawaadaitꞌee sãga Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã, parã ome oomaa bɨkꞌa. Mãgá akꞌɨ pꞌanɨ misa, ãchia jõma pia kꞌawada–e paji mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapiji ãramaa sãga irua parã ɨ̃rapemaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee baji, eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bairã.

Ma Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada mɨa parãmaa kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde seewa–idaa beerã chokꞌara paraa perã. Mãgɨɨrãpa ijãadakꞌaa Jesucristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãde ba cheji eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa. Jaradakꞌaa Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõre Warra. Mãgá tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ãchia seewa jaratee nipapata. Ãchi Anticristo jĩakꞌaarã.
Jãgɨ́ eperã nepɨra jɨrɨyaa bapari ichi wãrumaa na eujãde, judiorã chõopi nipapari perã ãchi aukꞌaarã ome. Ma awara ichi nazareno eere pꞌanɨɨrã poro.

Wãara, awaraarãpa ma wãarata jara pëida kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa pipɨara wẽ–e. Mapa Tachi Waibɨamaa nãga kꞌaripata: Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãmaa pɨa unupipachi eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa. Kꞌachia oo–ee bapachi Akꞌõre Jaure kꞌaurepa. Angeleerãpa pɨ unupachida. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa ũripachida pɨa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chokꞌaraarãpa pɨde ijãapachida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ ateeji ɨtꞌaa, ichi trua kꞌĩra wãree nɨ̃bɨde ichita bapariimerã.

Mãga nɨde ɨtꞌariipa hielo kꞌoi tau tapɨa bɨkꞌa baai cheji eperãarã ɨ̃rɨ. Ma chaachaa cuarenta kilos waa paji. Mãga bakꞌãri, eperãarãpa ikꞌachia jarajida Tachi Akꞌõremaa ma hielo tau tapɨa kꞌaurepa, audú golpe tee bada perã.
Mamĩda irua jaraji ma tꞌẽepai pajã chiwidi mãikꞌaapa eujã chiwidi ooitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ eujãde eperãarãpa irua oopi bɨkꞌa oodaitꞌee, aɨde ne–inaa kꞌachia wẽ–e perã. Mãgɨ́ eujãta tachia nɨmaa pꞌanɨ.
Pajã pɨratꞌɨdaji joipꞌaru pɨratꞌɨpatakꞌa. Mãpai wẽpadachi. Ma awara eera, isla ome ãyaa wãjida ma badamãiipa.

Cristopa ooda perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia badakꞌa, kurusode piuda aba piu chekꞌãri tachi kꞌapꞌɨa pari, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiji. Maperãpɨ ɨ̃rá tachi ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Tai ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõremaa, ichita gracias jarapata parã jõmaarã pari.

Akꞌɨkꞌãri, unuji caballo pꞌoree. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ bɨmaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa espada choma teeji mãikꞌaapa mãgɨ́ juade bɨji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda, mãgɨ́ kꞌaurepa waa eperãarã kꞌãiwee pꞌananaadamerã. Maperã eperãarãpa chĩara pee para beeji.
Esclavo Cristode ijãa bɨpa chipari waaweeipia bɨ, ichi kꞌaurepa ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ikꞌachia pedeenaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa taipa jarateedapꞌedaade.

Seewa jaranáatɨ awaraa ijãapataarãmaa, parãpa mãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Irude ijãadakꞌãri, oo amaajida ne–inaa jõmaweda pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Ɨ̃rá mãga oomaa pꞌanɨ mĩda, mɨa pia akꞌɨ–e nãgɨ́ ne–inaa parãpa oopata. Ichiakꞌau bɨpata jã chonaarãwedapema wẽra Jezabel jĩakꞌaa, ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia jarateemerã pãchi tꞌãide. Ichi Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jaraparida apari. Mamĩda mãga–e. Kꞌũrayaa bapari. Ichia jarateepari pia bɨ mɨchideerãpa pꞌekꞌau oodamerã mãikꞌaapa pia bɨ ãrapa kꞌodamerã nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite eperãarãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa naaweda kꞌĩsia iru baji judio–eerã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee, wãara ijãadakꞌãri. Mãga kꞌawapiji Abrahammaa. Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa nãga pꞌãpida perã: ‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pedee pia Abrahammaa mãgaji: “Mɨa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda kꞌaripaitꞌeeda aji, pɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pari.” ’ (Génesis 12.3)

¿Kꞌĩra atua pꞌanɨkꞌã Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã ũraada, eperãpa chi warra ũraa bɨkꞌa? Iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ: ‘Warra, pia kꞌĩsíaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarateekꞌãri ɨtrɨa pɨkꞌa bɨde. Irua kꞌirãpapikꞌãri pɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata, kꞌĩra pia–ee beenáaji.

Ma awara oopatáatɨ pãchi akꞌɨpataarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, ãchia parã akꞌɨ pꞌanadairã mãikꞌaapa parã kꞌaripa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawaadamerã. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa pꞌanɨde ãrápata jaradaitꞌee ãchia parã akꞌɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa parãpa oodapꞌedaa. Maperã oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã ãchia jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, ãchi o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, parãpa ijãapata perã. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e pɨrã, ãchi kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite.
Canaán eujãde panadakꞌãri, ichia Canaandepema awara–awaraa to pidaarã siete kꞌiniipiji, ãra eujã tai judiorã chonaarãpa atadamerã.
Timoteo, abaapa jarateeru pɨrã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa pedee wãara jarateeda awara maa–e pɨrã iru jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ awara, mãgɨpa ooamaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Maperã mãgee Cristopa jarateedakꞌa ooda–e pꞌanɨɨrãdepema aba parã tꞌãide cheru pɨrã, iru auteebaidaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mãgee jarateepataarã parãmaa chepidaikꞌaraa bɨ.

Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa Cristo kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanajida irua jarada kꞌaurepa. Mãgá ɨ̃rá awaraarãpa tai aukꞌa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ taipa jarateepata kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda Cristopa tai kꞌaripapari choodamerã. Waapɨara ãchia tai mãga iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, waapɨara Cristopa tai tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee.

¡Aai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌachiadee pëiitꞌeepɨ! Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachiade nipapata Caínpa oodakꞌa. Ichiaba oopata Balaampa oodakꞌa. Pꞌaratꞌa jita kꞌiniapa ichia Tachi Akꞌõre eere pꞌanadapꞌedaarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachiade baaipiji. Ma awara ãchi poroorã ome chõo jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ, Corepa oodakꞌa ichi eere pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ome. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi ichiaba kꞌenakꞌooitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite panadakꞌãri.

Mamĩda mãgɨ́ seewa jarateepataarãpa mãga ooda–e. Ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrede pia kꞌawada–e pakꞌãri, oo iru pꞌanapata pedee kꞌachiapa. Ne–animalaarãkꞌa ãchi kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa oopata, kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsiapiparikꞌa. Mapa mia jõnɨpa ãchi itu jõkꞌoodaitꞌee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa kꞌaurepa.

Noépa ijãaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarakꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõma paniapa ũutꞌaaitꞌee, mãga waide unuda–e paji mĩda. Tachi Akꞌõre waawee bada perã, ooji barco choma ichi ëreerã ome bataudaitꞌee, mãgá piuda–e paitꞌee. Ma barco mãgá ookꞌãri, apemaarãmaa akꞌɨpiji ichia ijãa bɨ. Mãga unujida mĩda ijãada–e paji. Maperãpɨ kꞌiniijida. Mamĩda Noépa ijãa bada perã, Akꞌõrepa jaraji: “Noé pia bapari mɨ kꞌĩrapite.”
Israel pidaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre te cuarto omeede oodapꞌeda, pꞌaareerã ewari chaa tꞌĩupachida naapema cuartode ãchi mimia oode, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa jaradakꞌa.

Mãpai Estebanpa mãgaji: —Parãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanɨda apata mĩda, tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanapatada aji, ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa. Ma awara kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanapata, oo kꞌiniadakꞌaa perã Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Pãchi chonaarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.

Ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãpi–e paji tꞌãri pia beerã–itꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌãpiji nãgeerã–itꞌee: oodaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã iru ũraade jara bɨkꞌa; tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerã; pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa beerã; irude ijãadakꞌaa beerã; akꞌõreerã peepataarã mãikꞌaapa eperã peepataarã;
Mɨa naaweda kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdade jaraji kꞌõpꞌãyo meraanaadamerã wẽraarã maa–e pɨrã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã pariatua pꞌekꞌau ooyaa beerã ome.
Mãga baji mĩda, ɨ̃rá mɨa kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru baji mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraitꞌee oomerã ichia oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooji mɨ tꞌoi naaweda, ichi wãara tꞌãri pia bapari perã.
Kꞌawa–e sãgapꞌeda oopari mãgɨpa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mɨa oo–e wãara mɨchi tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara oopari ne–inaa mɨa ooamaa bɨ.

Ma kꞌãyaara pipɨara kꞌawa wã́tɨ Tachi Waibɨa, Tachi O Kꞌachiadeepa Kꞌaripa Atapari Jesucristo mãikꞌaapa irumaa iidítɨ parã kꞌaripamerã. Mãgá pꞌanapataadaitꞌee irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. ¡Irua Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree ichita unupiitꞌee, na eujã jõru pɨjida! ¡Amén! Mãgapai paji.

Tai kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ, Cristo–itꞌee mimiapata perã. Jõdee parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨda apata perã. Taipa makꞌɨara kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ, tai kꞌĩsiadoopa kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã. Mamĩda parãpa jõmaweda kꞌawa pꞌanɨda apata. Jõmaarãpa parã kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ, tꞌãri pia pꞌanadairã. Jõdee tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ, jõmaarã ekꞌariara pꞌanadairã.

Ichia parã mãgá jɨrɨ chekꞌãri, chóotɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa oonáatɨ mãgɨpa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Kꞌirãpátɨ ichia aukꞌa jɨrɨpari parã ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa miapiitꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde para bee chaa.

Esclavoorã, ichita oopatáatɨ pãchi chipariirãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Oonáatɨ esclavoorã ũkꞌuruurãpa oopatakꞌa. Mãɨrã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa mimiapata ãchi chipariirãpa akꞌɨ pꞌanɨ misa aupai, ãchi mimiayaa beeda adamerã. Mamĩda parãpa mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara aukꞌa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa mimiapataadaipia bɨ, pãchi chipariirãpa akꞌɨda–e pꞌanɨ pɨjida. Mãgá akꞌɨpidai Tachi Waibɨa wãara waaweepata.
ʼMãgɨ́ cacho diez pɨa unuda jara kꞌinia bɨ reyrã diez waide uchiada–e pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda ma nemĩsia uchiakꞌãri, taarã–e ma reyrã ichi ome eperãarã iru pꞌanadaitꞌee ãchi jua ekꞌari.

Mapa tachi ijãapataarãpa Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaarãpa kꞌĩsiapatakꞌa kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure pëiji tachimaa kꞌawapimerã ne–inaa jõma irua ooitꞌee bɨ tachi–itꞌee Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Akꞌõrepa mãga oo–e paji tachia ne–inaa pia oopata perã. Jĩpꞌa ooji tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Ɨ̃rá ũrítɨ pꞌaratꞌara beerã. Jẽ́etɨ mãikꞌaapa bíatɨ, parã miadaitꞌee perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨkꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa.

Waaweenáatɨ mãgeerãpa parãmaa ooruta. ¡Ũrítɨ! Mãgeerã kꞌapꞌɨa pari Satanapa parã ũkꞌuru tꞌɨpiitꞌee carcelde, mɨde ijãa amaadai jĩakꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa. Ewari diez mama pꞌanadaitꞌee. Mamĩda chóotɨ mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde, mama parã peeruta pɨjida. Mãgá chooruta pɨrã, mɨa ɨtꞌaripema poro jɨ̃ra teeitꞌee parãmaa, ichita pꞌanapataadamerã mɨ ome mɨchi truade.

Timoteo, oonáaji mãɨrãpa oopatakꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jɨrɨtꞌerada perã ichi–itꞌee. Jĩpꞌa óoji Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, irude wãara ijãa bairã. Chóoji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida kꞌawa bɨde mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri pia ma wãarata jaratéeji ãramaa. Ãra kꞌinia iru báji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌa.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, jõmaweda pãchia oo kꞌiniata oopata mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa kꞌiniata pꞌe wãpata. Pꞌakꞌa poreepidákꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda taarã–e ewari cherude pꞌakꞌa ateepatakꞌa chi peepatamaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌachia ooitꞌee, ooda–e pꞌanadairã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Ma su–akꞌɨ beepari wapꞌɨra baji awaraa su–akꞌɨ beepari veinticuatropa. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ pꞌanajida chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro. Pꞌaru tꞌo–tꞌoo jɨ̃ pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa poro jɨ̃ra nẽedee ooda jɨ̃ pꞌanajida.

Ichi audú tꞌãri pꞌuapítɨ mãikꞌaapa miapítɨ audua pedeeda pari mãikꞌaapa netꞌaara iru bɨ pari. Ichi tꞌãridepai audua pedee jarapari: “¡Mɨta nama su–akꞌɨ bɨ reinakꞌa! Eperãarã jõmaweda mɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ. Mɨ tꞌãri pꞌua ba–e pꞌẽtrãakꞌa. Mɨ kꞌima wẽ–e perã, mɨ chi–ɨa–eda” aji.

Ichiaba ũraaitꞌee parã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã Cristode ijãapataarã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanadamerã pꞌanapataadaitꞌee pãchi wẽraarã ome. Ãra kꞌaripapatáatɨ juatau makꞌɨara wẽe pꞌanadairã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãkꞌa. Ma awara ãra pia akꞌɨpatáatɨ, aukꞌa Cristode ijãapata perã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripapꞌeda. Ãra mãgá pia akꞌɨdaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãpa ɨtꞌaa iidipata pꞌanaumerã.
Mɨa wẽraarãmaa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã jarateepikꞌaa maa–e pɨrã chokꞌa pëipikꞌaa. Kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌanadaipia bɨ ijãapataarã see jõnɨ misa.
Mãga ooitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa oopari perã. Parã jɨrɨji ichi Warra Jesucristo ome araa pꞌanapataadamerã.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨji pꞌanapataadamerã Cristo jua ekꞌari, ma chonaarãweda ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataadai kꞌãyaara. Mamĩda kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ oodaitꞌee pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripadaitꞌee.

Mamĩda parãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, ma ũraa pꞌãda jua ekꞌariipa uchiajida. Mapa parãpa pia pedeedaipia bɨ awaraarãde mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã aukꞌa akꞌɨdaipia bɨ, ewari cherude Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨitꞌee perã ichide ijãapataarãpa oopatapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa pedeepatapꞌedaa. Mãgá kꞌawaaitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa oojida wa ooda–e paji.
Ichia ma ne–inaa jõma oopipari Cristo, Tachi Poro Waibɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Ãra uchiajida tai chonaarã Abrahamdeepa, Isaacdeepa, Jacobdeepa. Maapꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa Jesucristo, chi ne–inaa jõmaweda akꞌɨpari tꞌokꞌãri eperã kꞌapꞌɨade, ãchi aukꞌaa paji, ichiaba ma chonaarãdeepa uchiada perã. ¡Maperã ichita gracias jaradáma irumaa! ¡Amén!

Wãara, chupɨria jõneeruta pɨjida Cristopa jarada jarateepata kꞌaurepa parãmaa, tai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ. Tai mãgá pꞌanadai ma jarateepata kꞌaurepa parã o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadapꞌedaa perã. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai tꞌãri o–ĩapi bɨkꞌa chupɨria jõnɨde, aukꞌa parã tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee parã aukꞌa chupɨria jõneedakꞌãri. Irua mãga ooitꞌee parãpa choodakꞌãri taipa choopatakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrépata tai Cristode ijãapipari, parã jida aukꞌa. Ichiata tachi jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichideerã papiitꞌee.
Waya pedee ũriji: —Akꞌõrepa kꞌoipia papida kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨda anaapáde aji.
ʼNa pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaarã ma wẽra ome mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌara atadapꞌedaarã ichi kꞌaurepa jarajẽedaitꞌee unudakꞌãri nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa nɨ̃bɨ ichi paadadeepa.
Jesupa pꞌanauji: —Eperãpa mɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ pɨrã, mɨ ũraade jara bɨkꞌa oopariitꞌeeda aji. Mɨ Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ eperã kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨ Akꞌõre mɨ ome chedaitꞌee iru ome pꞌanapataade.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Warra mãgá pëikꞌãri, akꞌɨpiji tachi wãara kꞌinia iru bapari. Tachia iru mãgá kꞌiniada–e paji. Iruata tachi kꞌinia iru baji. Mapa ichi Warra pëiji piumerã tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee.

Mamĩda eperã wãara ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde bapari pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, araa bapariitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome mãikꞌaapa awaraa ijãapataarã ome. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee, iru Warra Jesús waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa.
Mapa parãpa kꞌawaadai ɨ̃rá esclavoorã–e. Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã. Mãgá iru warrarã perã, iru pꞌanadaitꞌee jõma irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.
Mamĩda nãga bɨda a bɨ chi Warra: ‘Tachi Akꞌõreda, a bɨ, pɨ ichita jõmaarã rey bapariitꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõru pɨjida. Kꞌachia wẽe bapari perã, pɨa pia akꞌɨ bapari pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã.

Ma judiorãpa pꞌanaujida: —Pɨa ne–inaa pia oo bɨ kꞌaurepa pɨ batꞌa pee kꞌiniada–eda ajida. Mãga oodaitꞌee pɨa Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeeda perã. Jaraji pɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ome aukꞌa, pɨ eperã bɨ mĩda taikꞌa.

Irua mãgɨɨrã mãgá ɨ̃i–ee miapi bɨpa nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa nɨ̃baitꞌee ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨɨrã mãgá miapi iru baitꞌee, ãchia ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaa perã ma nemĩsiamaa ichi kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨ ome mãikꞌaapa ichi tꞌɨ̃ tauchaa bɨpidapꞌedaa perã ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai chupɨria kꞌawaa bairã, ichi ũraa chiwidi taimaa jarateepi bɨ. Maperãpɨ waaweeda–ee pꞌanapata, awaraarãpa tai ome nepɨra jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Mapa waawee–ee tachia jaradaipia bɨ: ‘Tachi Akꞌõrépata mɨ kꞌaripapari. Mapa mɨa eperãarã jua waawee–e bɨ.’ (Salmos 118.6)

Maperã ma chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoparipa pia–ee akꞌɨikꞌaraa bɨ ma nechiara kꞌokꞌaa bɨ. Jõdee ma nechiara kꞌokꞌaa bɨpa kꞌachia pedeeikꞌaraa bɨ chi apema ãpɨte. Mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi aukꞌa pia akꞌɨpari perã Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa.

Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Akꞌõrepa parã mãgá kꞌaripamerã mãikꞌaapa choopimerã nepɨrade jõnɨde. Ichiaba iidi bɨ irua parã kꞌaripamerã tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadamerã apemaarã ijãapataarã ome, Jesucristopa mãga oopi kꞌinia bairã.

Cristo apemaarã Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨarãkꞌa bɨ–e. Mãgɨɨrãpa chokꞌapata apemaarã pꞌaareerã ewari chaa ne–animalaarã peedamerã paadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Ma awara ne–animalaarã peedakꞌãri paadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, naapɨara mãga oopata ãchi pari, maapꞌeda apemaarã pari, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Jõdee Cristo piuda aba piuji, tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee.

Mapa chi netꞌaa iru bɨpa ichi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa chupɨria nɨ̃bɨ unuru pɨrã, mamĩda chupɨria kꞌawa–e bɨ pɨrã, ma eperãpa akꞌɨpimaa bɨ ichia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia–e bɨ. ¿Sãga ichia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bɨda aima, chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌaripa–e bɨ pɨrã?
Maperãpɨ kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata. Piara bakꞌaji aweda uchiadaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨadeepa mãikꞌaapa iru truade pꞌananadaitꞌee tachi ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨade.

Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mɨa enenee nɨ̃bɨ oonaadamerã pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgɨpa chõo pɨkꞌapari tachi tꞌãri ome. Parã kꞌĩra tewaraarãkꞌa pꞌanapata ijãadakꞌaa beerã tꞌãide. Mapa oodaikꞌaraa bɨ ãchia oopatakꞌa.
Tꞌãri pia pꞌanapatáatɨ jõmaarã ome. Kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatáatɨ pãchi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa César waaweepatáatɨ, eperãarãpa ãchi poro waibɨarã waaweepatakꞌa.
Moisepa kꞌĩsiaji ichi aukꞌaarãpa ijãadai Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi pëida ãchi kꞌaripamerã. Mamĩda ãchia mãga ooda–e paji.

Taukꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ parã tꞌãide tꞌĩu kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã ome. Tauchaa bɨpipataarã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã kꞌapꞌɨade jõmaarã tꞌãide nipapata, ijãapataarã kꞌapꞌɨa tꞌɨɨpi kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Mãgɨ́ jarateepataarã kꞌachia pꞌanɨ, mimia kꞌachia oomaa pꞌanadairã.

“Taipa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanɨda” apata. Mamĩda seewata mãga jarapata. Tachia ãchia oopata unudakꞌãri, kꞌawapata ãchia tꞌãripa ijãadakꞌaa. Tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanadairã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrau bɨ ãchi ome. Oodakꞌaa irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgeerãpa ne–inaa pia apida pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa.
Mɨchi taupa unu bɨ ãrapa Akꞌõre netꞌaa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda wãara iru kꞌawadakꞌaa.
Mãgá oopari tai jarateepataarãmaa, chupɨria jõnɨde. Ichia tai mãgá kꞌaripapari, taipa, jõdee, awaraarã aukꞌa kꞌaripadamerã ãra chupɨria jõnadakꞌãri.
Pɨa, jõdee, jõmaweda tꞌãripa óoji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ akꞌɨmerã mimiapari piakꞌa. Mãga ooru pɨrã, kꞌĩra nejasia–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, irua wãarata jara pëida pia jarateepari perã.

Mamĩda iru na eujãde bɨ misa, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru baitꞌee. Ma awara kꞌĩra unuamaa iru baitꞌee ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, jõmaweda aɨ kꞌĩrapite na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Kꞌĩsiaitꞌee ichi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mãga kꞌĩsiaitꞌee perã, su–akꞌɨ beeitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre te edupɨara bɨ cuartode mãikꞌaapa jaraitꞌee ichita Tachi Akꞌõre.

Akꞌõreerã, pãchi warrarã kꞌĩraupináatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara pia akꞌɨ pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mãga oo pꞌanɨ misa, ũraapatáatɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã. Ma awara jarateepatáatɨ Tachi Waibɨade ijãapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa oopataadamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa.
Kꞌachia beerãpa tachi ijãapataarã atꞌãri mãgá iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, tachia ne–inaa jõmaade ãchi pꞌoyaapata, tachi kꞌinia iru baparipa kꞌaripapari perã.

Tai jõmaweda eujãde baainajida. Mãpai mɨa ũriji tai hebreo pedeede pedeeru: “Saulo, Saulo ¿sãapꞌeda mɨchideerã jɨrɨ nima? aji. Pɨchi kꞌĩradoopa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, pꞌakꞌapa ooparikꞌa ãpɨtee tꞌɨakꞌãri chipari nekꞌida misuamaa.”

Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Esmirnadepemaarã nepɨrade pꞌanapata eperãarãpa parã jɨrɨpata perã miapidaitꞌee. Unu bɨ parã chupɨria jõnapata, wãara chupɨria–ee pꞌanɨ mĩda, ɨtꞌari iru pꞌanadairã jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ parã–itꞌee. Kꞌawa bɨ pedee kꞌachia judiorã apataarãpa jara jõnɨ parã ãpɨte. Mãɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede chipꞌepata mĩda, wãara Tachi Akꞌõredeerã–e, mɨchideerã jɨrɨpata perã. Tachi Akꞌõredeerãkꞌa pꞌanapataadai kꞌãyaara, Satanadeerã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanapata.
O–ĩa pꞌanadakꞌaa unudakꞌãri awaraapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ. Jĩpꞌa o–ĩadaipata irua ookꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidakꞌa.

Maperã kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌĩsia amáatɨ. Pꞌananáatɨ naaweda pꞌanapatapꞌedaakꞌa, waide ijãada–e pꞌanadakꞌãri. Ma kꞌãyaara audua–ee óotɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba kꞌĩsiapatáatɨ irua wãarata jara pëidade, ma kꞌaurepata ijãapata perã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee perã.

Eperãpa ichi eujãde ne–uuparikꞌa, mɨa naapɨara parãmaa jaranaji Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mãpai ne–uu akꞌɨparipa ooparikꞌa, Apolopa waapɨara jarateepachi kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–uu jõmaata waripiparikꞌa, iruata taipa jarateedapꞌedaa parãmaa ijãapiji.

Mãpai mɨa awaraa ángel unuji mãgɨ́ uchiada tꞌẽe. Mãgɨpa jaramaa baji: —¡Jõdachi, jõdachipɨ pꞌuuru waibɨa Babilónia! Ma pꞌuuru kꞌaurepa eperãarã jõmaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopachida. Eperãpa vino topi bɨkꞌa awaraamaa piudaimerã, mãga pɨkꞌa ma pꞌuuru pidaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopipachida awaraarãmaa.
Parã wãara mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorã, mɨ ũraa jara bɨkꞌa oo wãruta pɨrã.
Chi mãga ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrã seewadeta ijãa pꞌanɨ. Ãchia ijãapata chi ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarãkꞌa. Mapa ijãanáatɨ ãchikꞌa. Mãgapai paji.

Ɨ̃raweda mãgeerã jĩakꞌa imeraa jara pꞌanɨpa eperãarã tede tꞌĩupata. Maapꞌeda iwarraa pedee pꞌanɨpa kꞌũrapata wẽraarã pia kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã. Ma wẽraarã kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanapata ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda kꞌachia oo amaadakꞌaa. Ma kꞌãyaara oopata ãchia oo kꞌiniata, ne–inaa kꞌachia bɨ mĩda.

Ma kꞌãyaara tachia ne–inaa wãara ijãapataadaitꞌee. Maperã pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidakꞌa. Ichita wãarata jarapataadaipia bɨ chikꞌinia pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Mãga pꞌanapataadakꞌãri, wãara jõma oodaitꞌee tachi poro Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa tachi jõmaweda iru kꞌapꞌɨa apai pɨkꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Mãgá chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee, wãara araa pꞌanapataadamerã awaraa ijãapataarã ome. Mapa ne–inaa jõma pia oodaipia bɨ mãga pꞌanapataadamerã.
Saulopa iidiji: —¿Pɨ, kꞌaima? aji. Chi pedee badapa pꞌanauji: —Mɨ Jesupɨ, pɨa jɨrɨ ni eperãarã poro waibɨa.
Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Waibɨa Cristo bapari pãchi tꞌãride mãikꞌaapa irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ. Apidaapa parãmaa iidiruta pɨrã sãapꞌeda Cristode ijãapata, ichita pꞌanáutɨ.
Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgaji: ‘Pɨchi chancla ẽratꞌaapáde aji, nama pɨ mɨ kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ bairã.

Maperã kꞌirãpátɨ parãpa naaweda ũridapꞌedaa, ewaa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Maapai kꞌawaajida Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida eperãarãmaa mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia pꞌaneejida irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá oo wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome mãikꞌaapa ichi Warra Jesucristo ome.
Mɨa wãarata jararu. Eperãpa mɨ ũraa ũripꞌeda, ooru pɨrã ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, piu–e paitꞌeeda aji.
Mãpai mɨa unuji rey su–akꞌɨ beepari waibɨa, tꞌorroo bɨ. Aɨde Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ baji. Ichi kꞌĩrapite na eujã mãikꞌaapa pajã wẽpadachida. Maarepida unu–e paji ma nɨ̃badamãi, wẽ–e pada perã.

Ichiaba jarapata: “Chikꞌo iru pꞌanɨ kꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa bi iru pꞌanɨ ma chikꞌo aɨde banamerã.” Mamĩda na ewari Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma omee weda jõpiitꞌee. Wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa bi ooji chikꞌo aɨde banamerã. Mamĩda tachi kꞌapꞌɨa oo–e paji pariatua pꞌekꞌau oodamerã. Jĩpꞌa ooji ichi Jaure ma kꞌapꞌɨade bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa tachia oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Parã ichiaba mãgá pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ, parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa piu pɨkꞌada perã Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa ome. Mapa ichita iididaipia bɨ Jesucristomaa, irua parã kꞌaripamerã oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgá ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaadaipɨ.

Taipa gracias jarapata Tachi Akꞌõremaa, iruata Netuara Poro Waibɨa pꞌoyaapari perã Cristo juapa. Maperãpɨ netuara apidaapa tai Cristodeerã pꞌoyaada–e pai. Mãgá ichideerã perã irua tai kꞌaripapari jarateedamerã jõmaarã tꞌãide.
Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa nãga jara pëiji. Tachi Akꞌõre ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨ. Ɨ̃daade maarepida pꞌãriu unuda–e pꞌanɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrede maarepida kꞌachia unuda–e.
Jõmaweda eperãarã mɨ Akꞌõrepa mɨ jua ekꞌari bɨda mɨmaa chedaitꞌee. Chi cherutaarãmaa mɨa kꞌinia–eda a–e paitꞌee.
Chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ Cristode ijãapataarã, iru kꞌaurepa ɨ̃pemaarã pꞌanadairã.
Mapa irua kꞌaripai ichide ijãapataarã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ichita bapari perã, ichita Tachi Akꞌõremaa chupɨria iidipariitꞌee tachi pari.

Mamĩda ãchia biapachida: —¡Ãyaa ateepíji! ¡Ãyaa ateepíji! ¡Kurusode peepitꞌáaji! Pilatopa iidiji: —¿Kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌã aji, mɨa pãchi rey peepimerã? Pꞌaareerã poroorãpa pꞌanaujida: —¡Taipa rey awaraa wẽe pꞌanɨda ajida, César kꞌãyaara!

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi eperãarã ũkꞌuru ichi jua ekꞌari iru badakꞌa Elías na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bakꞌãri, aukꞌa ɨ̃rapema Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichi jua ekꞌari iru bapariitꞌee. Mãga oopari ãchi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrãpa pꞌekꞌau oopachida, araa padakꞌãri mãgɨ́ wẽra ome. Ma awara na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa ooi awaa pꞌanapachida ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ichia oodakꞌa.
Chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ, tachi ëreerã ome pꞌanapatakꞌa. Audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara awaraa ijãapataarã pipɨara akꞌɨdaipia bɨ tachi kꞌãyaara.
Jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa pꞌanapi bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataarã Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã.
Mãpai ne–inaa awaraa waide unukꞌaa pada padachi pajãde. Unuji je choma. Pꞌoree baji mãikꞌaapa poro siete iru baji. Ma chaachaa poro jɨ̃ra jɨ̃ baji. Ichiaba cacho diez iru baji.

Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã pꞌanadairã, iru pꞌanadaitꞌee jõmaweda irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee ɨtꞌari pꞌananadakꞌãri. Ne–inaa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee iru Warra Cristopa iru bɨkꞌa. Iru na eujãde bɨ misa, ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa iru jɨrɨpachida miapidaitꞌee. Mãgá tachi aukꞌa jɨrɨpata. Mapa ɨtꞌari panadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi Cristokꞌa papiitꞌee, aukꞌa iru kꞌĩra wãreede pꞌanapataadamerã.

Ijãapataarã chonaarã waaweedaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa pꞌaadaipia bɨ ãchi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã pia akꞌɨdakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripadakꞌãri. Waapɨara pꞌaadaipia bɨ awaraa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã kꞌãyaara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jarateedakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã ũraadakꞌãri.

Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ne–inaa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõre–e. Mamĩda awaraarãpa waide pia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ. Ewaa ijãa pꞌanɨɨrãpa mãgee ne–inaa atꞌãri iru pꞌanɨ ãchi naawedapema iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaa akꞌõre waibɨakꞌa. Maperã ãchidepemapa kꞌoru pɨrã nechiara awaraarãpa bɨdapꞌedaa mãgee ne–inaa kꞌĩrapite, mãgɨ́ kꞌĩsia pꞌuadarii, ma nechiara kꞌorupa mãgɨ́ akꞌõre waibɨa apata atꞌãri waawee bai jĩakꞌaapa. Ma awara kꞌĩsia pꞌua bai waide kꞌawa–e bairã Cristode ijãa bɨde pia wa kꞌachia kꞌoitꞌee mãgee nechiara.
Mɨ kꞌarradepema jɨ̃kꞌara chau–e bɨ pɨrã, irua mãgɨ́ jɨ̃kꞌara tꞌɨapꞌetꞌaapari. Jõdee chi jɨ̃kꞌara chauparidepema jua chakꞌeerã jaritꞌaapari mãgɨ́ jɨ̃kꞌara waapɨara chaumerã.
Parã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã chipariirãkꞌa pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara tꞌãri pia pꞌanapatáatɨ ãra ome, ãra parã jĩakꞌa pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌaneedamerã.

Ɨ̃rá, ɨ̃pemaarã, taipa nãgɨ́ wãarata kꞌawapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ parãmaa. Tachi Jesucristode ijãapataarã jai–idaadakꞌãri, kꞌãi pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Maperã parã ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa jai–idaadakꞌãri, makꞌɨara jẽedaikꞌaraa bɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa. Mãɨrã Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanadairã, ijãada–e ãchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã piudapꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pꞌananadaitꞌee Akꞌõre eujãde. Mapa audú tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanɨ ãchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã piudakꞌãri.
Israel pidaarãpa ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Mar Rojo pꞌoo bɨde wãyaajida eujã pania wẽe bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda Egipto pidaarã aukꞌa wãyaadaitꞌee pakꞌãri, jõma toida kꞌiniijida.
Maapai tꞌoji Moisés. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ warra chai pia akꞌɨji. Mapa chi akꞌõreerãpa atane õpee warimaa iru pꞌanajida ãchi tede.
Mãgɨ́ pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa tachikꞌa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari perã, irua chupɨria kꞌawaai chi ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨɨrã, kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchimaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, tachi pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda taarã–ee Cristo waya chekꞌãri, ewari chiwidi pɨkꞌa unudaitꞌee. Mapa oo amaadáma ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopata mãikꞌaapa soldaopa armadura jɨ̃parikꞌa chõode wãi naaweda, mãga pɨkꞌa oodáma Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Parã, chi esclavoorã chipariirã ichiaba pia pꞌanapatáatɨ pãchi esclavoorã ome. Ijɨ̃atɨ pedeenáatɨ pꞌeradamerã. Kꞌirãpapatáatɨ parã ɨtꞌari chipari ichiaba iru pꞌanɨ. Mãgɨ́ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo. Iruata esclavo chipari pipɨara akꞌɨkꞌaa chi esclavo kꞌãyaara, ichideerã jõmaweda iru kꞌĩrapite aukꞌa pꞌanadairã.
Awaraarã o–ĩa pꞌanadakꞌãri, aukꞌa o–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Jõdee tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanadakꞌãri, aukꞌa jẽedaipia bɨ.

Mamĩda pɨa oo–e bɨ Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua bapari perã. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate irua pɨ audupɨara miapiitꞌee awaraa kꞌachia oopataarã kꞌãyaara. Mãga ookꞌãri, ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã.

Aɨ tꞌẽepai pachejida judiorã Antioquía pꞌuurudeepa mãikꞌaapa Iconio pꞌuurudeepa. Eperãarã ãchi eere pa atadapꞌeda, Pablomaa mãupa batꞌajida peetꞌaadaitꞌee. Piu bɨ jĩakꞌaapa, pꞌuuru kꞌidaa jidiu baibɨnajida.
Mãga jarapꞌeda, Jesús tꞌãri pꞌua nɨ̃beeji. Mãpai mãgaji: —Mɨa wãarata jararu. Parãdepema abaapa mɨ traicionaaitꞌeeda aji.

Mamĩda iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ eperãarã jõmaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Ara presoorã pꞌoyaa uchiada–e pꞌanɨkꞌa carceldeepa ãchi juadoopa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãarã pꞌoyaa uchiada–e pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa ãchi juadoopa. Aba uchiadai Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri, iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌaripapari perã, ichia jaradakꞌa Abrahammaa.

Mamĩda jara aupadakꞌãri jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada jarapiitꞌee ãramaa, nemĩsia uchiaitꞌee ma uria nãpɨa bɨdeepa mãikꞌaapa ãra ome chõo jɨrɨitꞌee. Mãgɨpa ãra pꞌoyaaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa peekꞌooitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadaipia bɨ tachi piurutamaa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, unudaitꞌee irua ne–inaa pia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee, Cristo tachi ome bapari perã.

Mamĩda Cristo pãchi tꞌãride bapari pɨrã, parã jaure ichita chokꞌai bapariitꞌee. Maperã parã kꞌapꞌɨa piudaruta pɨjida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa, Cristo kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari.

Parã chonaarãpa ichita Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã jɨrɨjida peedaitꞌee. Peejida chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ cheitꞌee bɨda apatapꞌedaarã. Maapꞌeda chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ chekꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ooitꞌee, iru ichiaba jita atapidapꞌeda, peepijida parãpa.

awaraarã netꞌaa kꞌinia pꞌanapata maa–e pɨrã ãchikꞌa pa kꞌinia pꞌanapata, ãchimaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌiniadarutamaa; chĩara peepata; itꞌua toyaa pꞌanapata; pariatua nekꞌoyaa, toyaa, kꞌachia oodaitꞌee jɨrɨyaa pꞌanapata fiestade; mãga bee. Mɨa naaweda jaradakꞌa waya jaraitꞌee. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai mãgá pꞌanadai. Mãgee ne–inaa oopataarã pꞌoyaa wãda–e Tachi Akꞌõre truadee.

Mɨ, chi ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨ parã ome bɨ misa, mɨde ijãapatáatɨ. Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida jarateepari, parãpa ma pedee ijãadapꞌeda, iru warrarã pꞌaneedamerã. Mãga jarapꞌeda, Jesús ãyaa wãji ichi ununaadamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëiji iru Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia bada perã, Moisepa oo kꞌinia badakꞌa, chonaarãweda Akꞌõre eperãarã kꞌaripakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ba chepikꞌãri tachimaa, pania waibɨa pɨkꞌa weeji tachi kꞌapꞌɨa ɨ̃rɨ. Mãga ooji Jesucristopa tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atakꞌãri.
Mãga ooji Leví ëreerãdepema Josepa. Mãgɨ́ eperã Chipre isladepema paji. Mãgɨmaa Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa pedida tꞌɨ̃ bɨjida Bernabé (jara kꞌinia bɨ “Tꞌãri O–ĩapipari”).
Maperã sẽnaadáma ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨ misa. Mãgá choo pꞌanɨ pɨrã, na ewari atadaitꞌee jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ mɨa pꞌoyaa oo–e pada perã jõma ma pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌaurepa mɨ piudakꞌa baji, ne–inaa oo–ee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mamĩda Cristode ijãakꞌãri, irua mɨ uchiapiji ma pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa, wãara oomerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mãpai pakꞌuru sĩautaa mɨmaa teeji, mãgɨpa ne–inaa chaamerã. Mãgaji: —Wã́ji chaade Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa chi altar ome. Ma awara aɨ tede ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã juasíaji.

Mãɨrã wẽraarã ome kꞌãida–e paji, ãchi pꞌanapata awara bɨdapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mapa ãchi wãpata ma Oveja Chakꞌe wãrumaa mãikꞌaapa oopata irua ooparikꞌa. Cristopa ãra na eujãdepemaarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji, awaraarã kꞌãyaara naapɨara primisiakꞌa pꞌanadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichi–itꞌee.
Mɨa sisira unuji caballoorã uchiapatakꞌa jura chõode. Ne–inaa poro jɨ̃ra nẽedee oodakꞌa jɨ̃ pꞌanajida ãchi porode. Ãchi kꞌĩra eperã kꞌĩrakꞌa beeji.

Parã esclavoorã–e. Mapa pꞌanapatáatɨ esclavo–eerãkꞌa. Mamĩda mãɨmisa kꞌĩsianáatɨ oodaitꞌee pãchia oo kꞌiniata, ne–inaa kꞌachia oorutamaa. Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌanapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre esclavoorãkꞌa, oomaa irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Ma–itꞌeeta tachi choopata na mimiade, eperãarãpa ma ũraa jara pëidade ijãadamerã. Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa tachia jarateepata ũridaamaa pꞌanɨ mĩda, ijãa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ichita bapari mãikꞌaapa irua aupaita na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda akꞌɨpari. Wãara, tachi Cristode ijãapataarã pipɨara akꞌɨpari, tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atapari perã.

Chonaarãweda mãga paji pɨrã, ¿audupɨara Tachi Akꞌõrepa nãgɨɨrã miapi–e paikꞌã? Ijãa amaa wãda Jesucristota Tachi Akꞌõre Warra mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oo bɨ eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõredepema–e. Ma awara jara pꞌanɨ ichi Ũraa chiwidi jara bɨkꞌa Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapi–e mãikꞌaapa mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanada–e Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Waya Jesupa mãgaji: —¡Kꞌãiwee pꞌanapatáatɨ! Mɨ Akꞌõrepa mɨ pëidakꞌa, mɨa parã jida aukꞌa pëiru.

Mãgɨɨrã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanadakꞌaa. Ikꞌɨ̃atɨ pedeepata awaraarãmaa, ne–inaa oodakꞌãri. Tꞌãride oodaamaa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, oopata ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Audua pedeepata awaraarãpa pia akꞌɨdamerã mãikꞌaapa pedee pia jara pꞌanɨpa kꞌõpꞌãyo meraa pɨkꞌapata, jõmaweda pia uchiamerã ãchi–itꞌee aupai.

Mãga unudakꞌãri, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã, eperãarã poro waibɨarã, soldaorã poro waibɨarã, pꞌaratꞌara beerã, juataura beerã, esclavoorã, esclavo–eerã; ma jõmaweda mirudachida mãu te uriade mãikꞌaapa eera jẽra bɨ eujãde mãu–idaa bɨmãi.

Mamĩda waawee–idaa beerã mɨde ijãadaitꞌee; ijãa amaarutaarã jõmaweda ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome; kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanɨɨrã; chĩara peepataarã; pꞌekꞌau oopataarã; jaipanaarã petau tau kꞌawaa beerã ome; ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda seewa jarapataarã; mãgeerã pꞌananadaitꞌee ma lagokꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau azufre ome jẽrajẽraa jira bɨde mãikꞌaapa tꞌẽepema piuda apata mama piudaitꞌeeda aji, ichita mãgá mɨ ikꞌaawaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ pꞌanapataadaitꞌee perã.
Mapa ɨ̃raweda poro choopipáde aji, mãikꞌaapa Jesumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃páde aji, irua pɨchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapimerã.”
Ãchi puda waree beeji; wẽraarãdekꞌa mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌida león kꞌidakꞌa beeji.

Tachi Waibɨa mimiapari nepɨrade baaikꞌaraa bɨ awaraarã ome. Ma kꞌãyaara tꞌãri pia baipia bɨ jõmaarã ome; awaraarã jaratee kꞌawaaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa chooipia bɨ, kꞌĩrau–ee, awaraarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooruta pɨjida.
Mɨ parã ome bɨ–e mĩda, mɨ kꞌĩsia parã ome bɨ. O–ĩa bɨ kꞌawa bairã parã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa wãara Cristode ijãapata.

Ma jõma ooipia bɨ Tachi Waibɨapa akꞌɨ bapari perã ne–inaa pia oopataarã mãikꞌaapa ũripari perã ãrapa ɨtꞌaa iidipata. Mamĩda mãga oo–e ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã ome. Mãɨrã kꞌaripa–epɨ.’ (Salmos 34.12-16)

Ɨ̃pemaarã, ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome mãga pꞌasaitꞌee mĩda, parã ãchikꞌa pꞌana kꞌiniada–e, Cristode ijãapata perã. Mapa taipa ichita gracias jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa parã pari. Tachi Waibɨapa parã kꞌinia iru bɨ. Maperã na eujã ooi naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨtꞌeraji ũridamerã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ijãadamerã iruata parã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai. Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure pëi kꞌinia baji parã awara bɨmerã ichi–itꞌee, ma wãarata ijãadakꞌãri.

Maperã awaraarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarãpa atꞌãri mãga oopataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapataarã atꞌãri mãga pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Jõdee ne–inaa pia oopataarãpa atꞌãri mãga oopataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa awara bɨdaarã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee atꞌãri oopataadaitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Pedropa pꞌanauji: —Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amáatɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapikꞌoomerã mãikꞌaapa Jesucristo tꞌɨ̃de poro choopítɨ. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure pëiitꞌee parã ome bapariimerã.

Pia pꞌanapatáatɨ parãdepema apidaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã. Mãga pꞌanadaipia bɨ awaraarãpa parãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooruta pɨjida. Ichita jɨrɨpatáatɨ ne–inaa pia oodaitꞌee pãchi tꞌãidepema ijãapataarãmaa mãikꞌaapa jõmaarãmaa.

Ichiaba ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãpa awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã audú jɨrɨpachida ãchi ome aukꞌa araa kꞌãidaitꞌee, wẽraarã ome kꞌãidai kꞌãyaara. Mãga oo pꞌanɨpa kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe, ãchi kꞌapꞌɨa miapipachida, Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa eperãarãmaa oodaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Parã jida o–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ mɨ ome.
Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru badade pia kꞌĩsiadapꞌeda, kꞌachia oo amáatɨ mãikꞌaapa irude ijã́atɨ, irua pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapikꞌoomerã.
Ma murallade tꞌĩupata jõmaweda ichita ewa nɨ̃baitꞌee. Jɨ̃adakꞌaa paitꞌee; mama pꞌãrikꞌua wẽ–e paitꞌee perã.
Chi mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌo bɨpa mãikꞌaapa mɨ waa to bɨpa Akꞌõre eujãde banaitꞌee. Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate mɨata iru chokꞌai pꞌirabai ataitꞌee.
Mãpai Jesupa pꞌanauji: —Pɨa mɨmaa maarepida oo–e pakꞌaji, ɨtꞌari baparipa pɨ eperãarã poro waibɨa papi–e pada paara. Maperã chi eperã mɨ nama pëidapa ne–inaa kꞌachiara oo bɨda aji, pɨ kꞌãyaara.
Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ chi jara bɨpa: “Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari.” Mamĩda mãgɨ́ eperãpa ookꞌaa pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ichi ũraade, ma eperãpa ichi kꞌinia mãga jara bɨ.

Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpidapa eperãarã pꞌoyaa kꞌaripa ata–e paji, eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa ooda–e pꞌanadairã ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ misa. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Warra pëiji eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa piumerã tachi pari, tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee. Mãgapɨ Cristopa tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaaji.

Mamĩda awaraarãpa parã miapiruta pɨjida ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, o–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Ma miapida kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨitꞌee. Mapa pꞌerapináatɨ parã jɨrɨpataarãmaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia jõnanáatɨ ãchi kꞌaurepa.
Akꞌõreerã, pãchi warrarã kꞌĩraupináatɨ, kꞌĩra pia–ee pꞌananaadamerã.

Mãgɨpa golpe pedeeji: —¡Jõdachi; jõdachida aji, jã pꞌuuru waibɨa Babilónia! Ɨ̃rá mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru badamãi jaure kꞌachia beerã te padachi, netuaraarã aupai mama pꞌanapata perã. Mama ichiaba pꞌanapata ipanaarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌiniakꞌaa eperãarãpa kꞌodamerã.

Maperã abaapa jara bɨ pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús pëi–e paji eperãarã rey pamerã, mãgɨ́ eperã seewamaa bɨ. Ma eperã Anticristo, jara bairã Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra–e mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre Jesús Akꞌõre–e.
Mãga jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpipata perã, eperãpa ma pan pariatua kꞌoru pɨrã maa–e pɨrã ma vino pariatua toru pɨrã, kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, ichi–itꞌee pꞌua–e bairã Cristo piuda jõmaarã pari.
Pariatua kꞌĩsianáaji. Ma kꞌãyaara óoji Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Kꞌawáaji wãara Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨpa oopari irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mapa Judapa mamaa ateeji Romadepema soldaorã chokꞌara mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa jɨ̃apataarã, judiorã pꞌaareerã poroorãpa pëidapꞌedaa; ichiaba fariseorãpa pëidapꞌedaa. Espada pakꞌuru ome, lámpara, ĩpirã paara anipajida.

Mamĩda kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨapa oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Iruata parã kꞌaripaitꞌee choodamerã parã ijãa pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripaitꞌee kꞌachia beerã poro, Satanapa parã kꞌachiade baaipi kꞌinia bakꞌãri.
Mamĩda pꞌoyaa waa merada–e paji. Mapa ituaba atabëidakꞌãri, Faraón kꞌaupa unu ataji mãikꞌaapa wari ataji ichi warrakꞌa.

Mãpai ma angelpa tꞌɨpɨtau atapꞌeda altardeepa, ma kꞌuurukꞌa bɨ ipurutꞌaaji. Mãpai batꞌatꞌaaji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Mãga oo bɨde mɨa ũriji pa jĩwaa nɨ̃bɨ pedee ome. Ichiaba unuji pa tau pꞌorepꞌorepari mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujã wëre nɨ̃bɨ awẽrachaipa.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaarãpa mãgɨ́ wẽra vino topachida piudarutamaa. Pia jaraitꞌeera, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌaneejida iru kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopachida mãgɨ́ wẽra kꞌaurepa. Ma awara na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema netꞌaa netopataarãpa pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa atapachidada aji, mãgɨ́ wẽrapa audú netꞌaa pꞌe wãda kꞌaurepa ichi–itꞌee.
Maperãpɨ judiorãpa mɨ jita atajida mãikꞌaapa perá peejida Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade.
Wãarata ũri kꞌinia pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara, chonaarãwedapema cuento nepɨrɨpatapꞌedaata ũri kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Mamĩda waide parã ũkꞌuru ijãada–e pꞌanɨ. Jesupa mãga jaraji aɨ naaweda kꞌawa bada perã kꞌairãpa ijãada–e pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌaipa ichi traicionaaitꞌee.
Jesupa pꞌanauji: —Nãgɨ́ pan pite sã atakꞌãri, mɨa teeitꞌeeda aji, mãgɨmaa. Aramata Jesupa ma pan pite sã ataji mãikꞌaapa teeji Judamaa. Mãgɨ́ Judas Simón Iscariote warra paji.
Timoteo, jɨ̃́aji Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata pɨmaa jara pëida. Ũrináaji jã pariatua pedee wãpataarã, ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa seewa jarateepata perã. “Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨda” a pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda mãga pꞌanɨ–e.

Judiorã Cristode ijãada–ee pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mãga unudakꞌãri, kꞌĩraudachida. Mapa jɨrɨjida eperãarã mimiadakꞌaa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã, pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩraupitꞌaadamerã Pablo mãikꞌaapa Silas ome, pedee jõnɨpa ãra ãpɨte. Mãgá pꞌuuru pidaarã jõma kꞌĩraupitꞌaadapꞌeda, Jasón tede tꞌĩudachida, Pablo Silas ome uchia atadapꞌeda, pꞌuuru pidaarãmaa teedaitꞌee.

Parãdepemapa unuru pɨrã pɨ ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ipia bɨ ma ɨ̃pema pari, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru chupɨria kꞌawaamerã. Mãgá pɨa ma ɨ̃pema kꞌaripai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru ɨtꞌaa wãpimerã. Mãga ooi ma ɨ̃pemapa oo bɨ pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia, ma kꞌaurepa tachi atuapi–e. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia paraa, ma kꞌaurepa tachi atuapipari. Irua mãgɨ́ oo bɨ pɨrã, mɨa parãmaa jara–e ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃damerã iru pari.
Mɨa wãarata jararu. Chi mɨa pëida auteebairupa mɨ jida auteebai bɨ. Mãga pɨkꞌa chi mɨ auteebairupa mɨ Akꞌõre, mɨ pëida, aukꞌa auteebai bɨ.

Mãgá tachi, Tachi Akꞌõre trua wërekꞌaade pꞌanadaitꞌee perã, gracias jaradáma irumaa mãikꞌaapa oodáma irua oopi bɨkꞌa, tꞌãripa mãga oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre waaweedáma, irua mãga kꞌinia bairã.

Mãpema judiorã ũkꞌuru Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa netuara merãtɨa bee eperãarã kꞌapꞌɨadeepa uchiapikꞌoopachida. Mãga oo nipajida judiorã pꞌaareerã poro Esceva warrarã. Ãra siete paji. Mãɨrãpa kꞌawaadakꞌãri netuaraarã uchia pꞌanɨ Pablo kꞌaurepa ichia Tachi Waibɨa Jesús tꞌɨ̃ jarakꞌãri, aukꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌaneejida. Mapa jarajida netuara merãtɨa bɨmaa: —¡Pablopa jara bɨ Jesús tꞌɨ̃de uchíatɨ!
Jõdee Pablopa jɨrɨtꞌeraji Silas ichi kꞌõpꞌãyo pamerã. Ijãapataarãpa ãchi omé Akꞌõre juade bɨjida irua ãchi pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã. Mãpai Pablo ichi kꞌõpꞌãyo ome wãji.

Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãadai ãchia jara pꞌanɨ. Mãga ijãaruta pɨrã, jõpidaitꞌee jõma parãpa oomaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa atadamerã jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee ichideerãmaa ɨtꞌari, oopatapꞌedaa perã irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ãramaa oopiji. Mapa ãrapa pajã jɨ̃a pɨkꞌadai kꞌoi chenaamerã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa jara pꞌanɨ misa. Ma awara ãrapa kꞌiniadakꞌãri, pania tachi waa papidai mãikꞌaapa eperãarã miapidai.
Pɨa na mimia pꞌoyaa oo–e, Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsia–e bairã.
Mɨchideerã pɨchideerã aukꞌa. Ichiaba pɨchideerã mɨchideerã aukꞌa. Ãrapa ne–inaa oodakꞌãri mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa, akꞌɨpipata mɨ waibɨara bɨ apemaarã kꞌãyaara.
Jõmaarãta o kꞌachiade pꞌanɨ ãchia oo kꞌiniata oo pꞌanapata perã. Apidaapa oodakꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, ne–inaa pia wãara pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa perã.’ (Salmos 14.1-3; 53.1-3)
Kꞌĩsianáatɨ pãchia oo kꞌiniata oodaitꞌee, audua pꞌanadairã. Ma kꞌãyaara, audua–ee awaraarã pipɨara akꞌɨ́tɨ.
Mãgɨ́ esajĩakꞌa unuji eperãkꞌa. Pꞌaru teesoo jɨ̃ baji. Kꞌɨrrɨde ne–inaa nẽedee ooda jɨ̃ baji. Nẽrabai baji ichi tꞌũade.

Ma pꞌuurude wẽ–e paitꞌee ne–inaa apida Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌachiade baaipida, naapema eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Mãga paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre, Oveja Chakꞌe ome su–akꞌɨ beepari ma pꞌuurude bapari perã. Mama ichideerãpa ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee irumaa.
Taarã–e na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõitꞌee. Mapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ kꞌawaadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapatáatɨ.

Mama barcode bataudapꞌeda, wãjida Antioquía pꞌuurudee, chi ijãapataarãpa Akꞌõre juade bɨdapꞌedaamãi, irua ãchi pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã. Mãgá irua kꞌaripapachi perã, ãchia oojida jõma irua kꞌinia badakꞌa oodamerã ma wãdade.

Mamĩda miakꞌãiru pɨrã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ichiaba wẽra tuu bɨpa ɨmɨkꞌĩra ataru pɨrã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo–e bɨ. Mamĩda chi miakꞌãirutaarã audú miadaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa. Mapa mɨa jara bɨ pipɨara bɨ tuu baitꞌee.

Tachi chõoda–e pꞌanɨ eperãarã jĩpꞌaarã ome. Jĩpꞌa chõo pꞌanɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema–eerã ome; chi Netuara Poro Waibɨa eere pꞌanɨɨrã ome. Mãgɨɨrã jua ekꞌari na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã jõmaweda pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanapata.

Mamĩda parãdepemapa kꞌawa–e bɨ pɨrã kꞌãata ooipia bɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bɨde, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́ji Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapimerã. Tachia chupɨria iidiruta pɨrã, iru kꞌĩrau–epɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌaripaitꞌeepɨ, ne–inaa jõmaade tachi kꞌaripa kꞌinia bapari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ijãaparimaa ne–inaa jarapiru pɨrã maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa oopiru pɨrã, ita–aria oopítɨ.
Ma te ne–edee oodade chi naapema cuartode baji lámpara bɨpata mãikꞌaapa mesa pan pꞌepari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mãgɨ́ Cuarto Awara Bɨda apachida Tachi Akꞌõre Netꞌaa–itꞌee.

Mãga pꞌanadairã mɨa ũraaitꞌee mɨmaata neto atadamerã ne–inaa nẽe ewaa atadakꞌa tꞌɨpɨtaudeepa. Ichiaba mɨmaa neto atátɨ pꞌaru tꞌorroo jɨ̃daitꞌee mɨa jɨ̃parikꞌa. Mãgá waa kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌanada–e, parã ãkꞌadaa pɨkꞌa pꞌanadairã. Ma awara mɨmaa neto atátɨ neera pãchi tau–itꞌee. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata pia unudai.
Mɨa jõma jara aupada na kꞌartꞌade pꞌãji parã, Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade ijãapataarã, kꞌawaadamerã wãara ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome.

Eperãpa ichi kꞌĩsiadoopa jarateekꞌãri, mãga oopari awaraarãpa ichi tꞌo pꞌanadamerã. Mamĩda eperãpa jarateekꞌãri awaraarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pia akꞌɨ pꞌanapataadamerã, mãgɨpa wãarata jarateepari. Seewa jarakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa eperãarã kꞌũrakꞌaa.

Tachi kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌo sorekꞌapɨ bɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa aɨde nẽe bɨdákꞌapɨ bɨ ichi kꞌĩra wãree taimaa unupikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa tai jɨrɨtꞌerakꞌãri Cristopa ooda jarateedamerã eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mãgá eperãarãpa ijãadakꞌãri taipa jarateepata kꞌaurepa, jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadai Tachi Akꞌõrépata taimaa jarapi bɨ. ¡Iruta tai kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ!

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, kꞌĩra jõ–ee pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ichiakꞌau bɨ́tɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãrapa oodapꞌedaa akꞌɨmerã mãikꞌaapa miapimerã ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã: ‘Mɨa aupaita eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨpari jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mɨata pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã miapiitꞌee.’ (Deuteronomio 32.35)
Jesupa pꞌanauji: —Mɨa jarada paara mɨ waibɨara bɨ awaraarã kꞌãyaara, pari mãga jarakꞌaji. Mamĩda mɨ Akꞌõrépata mãga jarapari. Mãgɨ́ Akꞌõre parãpa “Tachi Akꞌõre” apata.

Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai awaraarã tꞌãri ãriipii Tachi Akꞌõre ome, parãpa ne–inaa kꞌopata kꞌaurepa. Kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa chikꞌo jõmaweda ooji kꞌodamerã. Mamĩda pɨa chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌo bɨpa awaraa ijãapari kꞌachiade baaipiru pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ.
Judiorãpa oopatakꞌa piuda ɨadakꞌãri, ãchia Jesús kꞌapꞌɨa ma kꞌera ome pi–ia pɨratꞌaajida lienzode.

Ichiaba chupɨria kꞌawaa jõnapachida ijãapataarã carcelde pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa ãra kꞌaripajida. Parã o–ĩa pꞌanapachida ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa pãchi netꞌaa jõma jãri atadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã ɨtꞌari iru pꞌanɨ ne–inaa pi–iara. Ma ne–inaa jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee jõ–e paitꞌee.
ʼRey David ëreerãdeepa uchiaji Tachi Kꞌaripapari. Mãgɨ́ Jesús, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida Israel pidaarã kꞌaripamerã, ichia naaweda jaradakꞌa ichi pedee jarapataarã itꞌaideepa.

Ma awara tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨɨrãmaa kꞌawapi–e paji ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichide ijãapataarã–itꞌee, iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã: ‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa nãgɨ́ ne–inaa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee ichi kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨɨrãmaa: ne–inaa eperãarãpa waide unudakꞌaa; waide ũridakꞌaa; mãikꞌaapa waide kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa.’ (Isaías 64.4)

Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure pãchi tꞌãride bapari pɨrã, parã jai–idaadakꞌãri, irua parã kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee ichita pꞌanapataadamerã. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã Cristo ome, iru piupꞌeda pꞌirabaipikꞌãri.
Mãga jaradai Akꞌõre Jaurepa tachi tꞌãrimaa kꞌawapipari perã wãara Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã.
Kꞌũranáatɨ pãchi itu. Tachi Akꞌõre oo iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ne–uuparipa ne–uukꞌãri, ma ne–uuda jĩakꞌa ewaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari Cristode ijãapataarã ome. Mamĩda Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã pia akꞌɨ–e. Maperã pɨ ijãa beeru pɨrã, tꞌãri pia bapariitꞌee pɨ ome. Mamĩda ijãa amaaru pɨrã, waa pia akꞌɨ–e. Pɨ tꞌɨapꞌe pɨkꞌaitꞌee ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome ooparikꞌa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá ooitꞌee perã mãgeerã ome, choopatáatɨ chupɨria jõnadakꞌãri ãra kꞌaurepa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo cheitꞌee perã. Iru mãgá cheru misa, pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ ne–uupataarãkꞌa. Mãɨrãpa ne–inaa uudapꞌeda, kꞌãiwee nɨpata ijãa pꞌanadairã kꞌoi chekꞌãri, ãchi ne–uudapꞌedaa tꞌonoitꞌee mãikꞌaapa wariitꞌee. Aɨ tꞌẽepai waya nɨpata kꞌoi waya chekꞌãri, ma ne–uudapꞌedaa chaumerã.

Onesiforopa aupaita mãga oo–e paji. Atꞌapai mɨ kꞌaripa cheji. Mɨ carcelde nɨ̃bɨ mĩda, kꞌĩra nejasia–ee baji mɨ kꞌaripa cheitꞌee. Mapa mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Onesiforodeerã chupɨria kꞌawaamerã.
Warrarã, mãgá tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanaruta pɨrã Cristo ome, parãpa waaweeda–e paitꞌee iru waya chekꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Ma ewate iru kꞌĩrapite kꞌĩra nejasia–ee pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Maperã oo wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, ooda–e paitꞌee parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Jõmaarãpa nãgɨ́ pedee ijãadaipia bɨ wãara perã. Jesucristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee cheji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Mɨa ma pedee pia kꞌawa bɨ, mɨ chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari kꞌachiara bairã.
Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, ɨ̃rá mɨa parã ũraaitꞌee tꞌãridepai choopataadamerã, araa pꞌanadairã Tachi Waibɨa ome. Iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, parã kꞌaripaitꞌee oodamerã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mãpai parã tꞌãidepemapa kꞌĩsia bɨ pɨrã ichiata oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi.
Cristo piuda aba piuda perã tachi kꞌapꞌɨa pari, irude ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe ichita pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ma judiorãpa mãu pꞌe atajida iru batꞌa peedaitꞌee.

Mamĩda kꞌinia bɨ parãpa pipɨara kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Cristo iru jua ekꞌari bɨ mãikꞌaapa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã Cristo jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa wẽraarã ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ.
Ichiaba ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ũkꞌuru ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãmaa ikꞌachia jarajida mãikꞌaapa wɨjida. Ma awara cadenapa jɨ̃dapꞌeda, carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨjida.

Maperã tachia ijãapata; ijãa amaada–ee. Ara anclapa barco pia jita iru bɨkꞌa ãyaa wãpiamaapa, mãga pɨkꞌa tachia pia ijãapata, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi ateeitꞌee ichimaa, Jesupa ooda kꞌaurepa.
Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, tꞌĩunáatɨ ãchi ome, ãchi pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanapata perã. Ma kꞌãyaara ãchi ũraapatáatɨ kꞌawaadamerã atuadaitꞌee ãchia kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.

Mamĩda ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia pedeedai, kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã ãchia ooda–e pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãpidade jara bɨkꞌa. Mãgá eperãpa pedee kꞌachia pedeekꞌãri, ichiaba oo–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, ichi ũraade jara bairã chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia pedeeikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma awara ijãapataarãpa mãga oodakꞌãri, akꞌɨpipata kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ ãchia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌãyaara pipɨara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chĩarapa oo pꞌanɨ akꞌɨdaitꞌee.
Ma murallade tꞌĩupata doce perla docedee ooda paji; tꞌĩupata chaa perla abaadee. Calle jã nẽedee ooda paji; nẽe pi–ia, maarepida nejarra wẽe. Bëi–sãa baji vidriokꞌa.

Mamĩda Cristo Tachi Akꞌõre Warra perã, ichideerã pipɨara akꞌɨpari Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Tachita irudeerã ichiaba, Cristode ijãa amaada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã mãikꞌaapa o–ĩa unu kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã ne–inaa pia Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee.
Awaraarã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oodaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mãgee ne–inaa unuamaa iru pꞌanapatáatɨ. Pia aupaita jɨrɨdaipia bɨ oodaitꞌee.

Aramata awẽrachai golpe wëre nɨ̃beeji. Ma pꞌuuru pidaarã diezdepema chaa aba jõdachi; mãgá eperãarã siete mil kꞌiniidachida. Chi pꞌaneedapꞌedaarã pꞌerarutapa ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amaa kꞌinia pꞌaneejida. Mapa jarajida Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌari baparimaa, iruta wãara jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Mãgá tee pëiji mĩda ichi ũraa Moisés kꞌapꞌɨa pari, mãga oo–e paji jarakꞌãri Abrahammaa. Ichi itꞌaideepa jaraji ichia ooitꞌee bada Abrahamdeepa uchiada kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Mãpai Pilatopa mãgaji: —¿Mɨ pedee pꞌanau–ekꞌã? aji. ¿Kꞌawa–e bɨkꞌã aji, mɨa pɨ kurusode peepi kꞌinia baitꞌeera peepitꞌaai, maa–e pɨrã peepi kꞌinia–e baitꞌeera kꞌena pëi?
Isaíapa pꞌãdadepema ichia leemaa badade nãga pꞌã baji: ‘Iru ateejida oveja ateepatakꞌa chi peepatamaa. Ara oveja kꞌĩupꞌee baparikꞌa chi kꞌara tꞌɨɨmaa pꞌanadakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa iru kꞌĩupꞌee baji.
Mãpai ãchia iidijida Samuelmaa rey bɨmerã ãchi akꞌɨpari. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa Saúl ãchi rey papiji cuarenta años. Mãgɨ́ Quis warra paji, Benjamín ëreerãdepema.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ, mãgee ũridaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã chokꞌara paraa perã parã tꞌãide. Seewa ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa pariatua jarateepata mãikꞌaapa eperãarã kꞌũrapata. Mãgɨɨrãpa jarateepata Cristo eere pꞌanɨɨrãpa atꞌãri oodaipia bɨ Moisés eere pꞌanɨɨrãpa oopatakꞌa; tauchaa bɨpidaipia bɨ ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã kꞌapꞌɨade.
Mãgɨ́ pꞌarude ne–animalaarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo pꞌanajida: bɨɨrɨpa nĩuteepata, bipa nĩuteepata mãikꞌaapa wãabaipata.
Pɨa mɨmaa pia oodakꞌa mɨa ichiaba ãramaa pia ooji, tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadamerã, pɨ mɨ ome tꞌãri a–ba baparikꞌa.
Ma jarateepidata pɨmaa jaraji. Kꞌirãpáji wãara perã. Ichiaba awaraarãmaa ma jĩakꞌa jaratéeji. Mãga ooru misa, chóoji Jesucristode ijãa bɨde mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌinia iru báji iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari.

Mama bainɨ̃ pꞌanajida chokꞌo seis, mãudee ooda. Judiorãpa mãgee chokꞌo iru pꞌanapachida aɨde pania tꞌɨdaitꞌee. Mãgá sɨɨdai ãchi jua, bɨɨrɨ maa–e pɨrã netꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jaradakꞌa. Chokꞌo abaade cincuenta wa setenta litros araapachi.

¡Pia kꞌĩsíatɨ mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨ́tɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨɨrã parã tꞌãide! Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oonáatɨ ãchia oo pꞌanɨkꞌa jaradakꞌãri Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌirabaida–e paitꞌee. ¡Mãga jaratee pꞌanɨɨrãpa waide Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanɨ! Mɨa mãga jara bɨ parã kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee.

Nãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ: maarepida auduada–ee; tꞌãri pia jõmaarã ome; choopari nepɨrade bɨ mĩda mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩrau–ee choopari, awaraarãpa parã ome nepɨra jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ pɨjida. Mãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ chikꞌinia pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanadairã.

Eperãarã netuara o kꞌachiade nipapataarã kꞌaripátɨ ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa uchiadamerã tꞌɨpɨtau urua nɨ̃bɨdeepa uchiakꞌajidakꞌa. Eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bakꞌãri, ichiaba chupɨria kꞌawáatɨ. Mamĩda ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata unuamaa iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ, pꞌaru mikꞌia jo bɨkꞌa. Mapa kꞌĩrakꞌaupai oodai ãchia oopatakꞌa.
Mapa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia uchiapiitꞌee jõmaweda ne–inaa pꞌasaru ichi kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨɨrãmaa. Mãga ooitꞌee ichiata mãɨrã jɨrɨda perã Cristode ijãadamerã.

Jõmaarãpa jara pꞌanɨ parã Cristode pia ijãapata mãikꞌaapa pꞌanapata irua pëida eperãarãpa jarateepatakꞌa. Mãga ũrikꞌãri, mɨ o–ĩadaipari. Mãgá ne–inaa pia kꞌawaa wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ. Mamĩda kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ne–inaa kꞌachia oodai.

Ma pꞌaru teesoo bɨ kꞌaitꞌa baji altar nẽepa pꞌẽeda. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ ne–inaa tꞌũa bapari paapachida. Ma pꞌaru teesoo bɨ edupema eere baji baaltekꞌa bɨ nẽepa pꞌẽeda. Ma baaltekꞌa bɨ eperãarãmaa kꞌirãpapi baji Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa jarada. Mãgɨ́ edajãde baji maná chokꞌo nẽedee oodade. Ichiaba baji Aarón pakꞌuru jua tꞌono bada chonaarãweda mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa Ũraa mãude pꞌãpida.
Mamĩda eperãpa jarai: “Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨta pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee mɨa ne–inaa pia oopari perã”. Mamĩda mãga–e. Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee chi wãara Jesucristode ijãa bɨ aupai.

¿Ijãa–e bɨkꞌã aji mɨ, Akꞌõre Waibɨa ome araa bapari? Mɨ araa bapari iru Jaure ome; jõdee iru araa bapari mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa ome. Mɨa jaramaa bɨ mɨchi kꞌĩsiadoopa jara–e bɨda aji. Mɨ Akꞌõrépata mãga jarapi bɨ. Ma awara mɨa ne–inaa oo bɨ ookꞌaa mɨchi juadoopa. Mɨ Akꞌõrépata mãga oopi bɨ, mɨ ome bapari perã.
Mãpai pꞌuuru pidaarã chokꞌara seedachida. Ãchi poroorãpa Pablo Silas ome pꞌaru ẽrapijida mãikꞌaapa wɨpijida pakꞌurupa.
Parãmaa ũraa chiwidi jararu. Chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mɨa parã kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa, mãgá parã jida chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ.

Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi eperã kꞌapꞌɨa piuru pɨjida Cristo chei naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai pꞌanapiitꞌee ichia ooitꞌee bɨ ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidide. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨa jõpari. Mamĩda chi ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨa jõkꞌaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá oopari perã.
Maapꞌeda Jesupa golpe pedeeji judiorã arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa: —Chi mɨde ijãa bɨ mɨdepai ijãa–e bɨda aji. Ichiaba mɨ Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨ, iruata mɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee pëida perã.
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, Ananiapa mãgaji: —Tachi Waibɨa, mɨa ũridooda aji, jã eperãpa pɨde ijãapataarã miapida Jerusalende.

Nãga pꞌanadaitꞌee: ãchi–itꞌee aupai ooyaa; pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniayaa ãchi–itꞌee; auduayaa; ikꞌachia pedeeyaa; tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa; ãchi akꞌõreerã pedee ũriamaa; gracias jaradakꞌaa apidaamaa; oodakꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa;

Ichia mãga ooda perã tachi–itꞌee, ijãapata Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe papipari ichi kꞌĩrapite. Ma awara kꞌawapata Cristo kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi miapi–e paitꞌee ichi ewari waibɨa ewate.
Mɨ jida araa bɨ Cristo ome. Ijãa bɨ chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoipia bɨ, Akꞌõrepa ma chikꞌo kꞌoitꞌee ooda perã. Mamĩda awaraapa ijãa bɨ pɨrã chikꞌo kꞌĩra aba kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨ, ichi–itꞌee kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨ.

Arii pꞌanɨ ɨ̃pemaarãmaa mɨ ũraa jaratéeji. Mãga ooru pɨrã, pia ooitꞌee Jesucristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Iru mimiapari pia baitꞌee ijãa bɨ misa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaa wãru misa irua jarapida ichia jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa.
